GS40rajnighu:2683: suphalaś ca parivyādho vyādhiripuḥ paṅktibījako vasusaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_9.42
GS40rajnighu:2689: arujaḥ svarṇapuṣpaś ca svarṇadruḥ kuṣṭhasūdanaḥ // Rajni_9.45
GS40rajnighu:2691: karṇikāro mahādiḥ syāt proktaś caikonaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_9.46
GS40rajnighu:2695: uṣṭrikāpy aliparṇī ca dakṣiṇāvarttakī tathā // Rajni_9.48
GS40rajnighu:2697: karabhā bhūridugdhā ca karkaśā cāmarā ca sā // Rajni_9.49
GS40rajnighu:2715: śukeṣṭo barhipuṣpaś ca viṣahantā supuṣpakaḥ // Rajni_9.58
GS40rajnighu:2722: pūtiparṇo vṛddhaphalo rocanaś ca prakīryakaḥ // Rajni_9.61
GS40rajnighu:2723: karañjaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca cakṣuṣyo vātanāśanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2724: tasya sneho 'tisnigdhaś ca vātaghnaḥ sthiradīptidaḥ // Rajni_9.62
GS40rajnighu:2726: snigdhapatras tapasvī ca viṣāriś ca virocanaḥ // Rajni_9.63
GS40rajnighu:2733: sumanāḥ kākabhāṇḍī ca madamattaś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_9.66
GS40rajnighu:2737: pūtikarañjaḥ kaiḍaryaḥ kalimālaś ca saptadhā // Rajni_9.68
GS40rajnighu:2739: gucchī ca mātṛnandī sānando dantadhāvano vasavaḥ // Rajni_9.69
GS40rajnighu:2744: prakīryaḥ somavalkaś ca phenilo rudrasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_9.71
GS40rajnighu:2745: rīṭhākarañjas tiktoṣṇaḥ kaṭuḥ snigdhaś ca vātajit /
GS40rajnighu:2750: kolaḥ kolambakarṇaś ca gandhapuṣpaś ca rocanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2754: nīlas tu nīlavṛkṣo vātāriḥ śophanāśano nakhanāmā /
GS40rajnighu:2755: nakhavṛkṣaś ca nakhālur nakhapriyo diggajendramitasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_9.76
GS40rajnighu:2756: nīlavṛkṣas tu kaṭukaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo laghus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2766: dhanyaś ca dīrghaparṇaḥ kuśikataruḥ kauśikaś cāpi // Rajni_9.81
GS40rajnighu:2772: dīrghapatro gucchapatro 'py āsavadruś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_9.84
GS40rajnighu:2774: saraś ca kaphapittaghno madakṛd dāhaśoṣanut // Rajni_9.85
GS40rajnighu:2779: pittajit kaphakārī ca vātam īṣat prakopayet // Rajni_9.87
GS40rajnighu:2787: madyadrumo mohakārī madadrur ṛjur aṅkadhā // Rajni_9.91
GS40rajnighu:2788: māḍas tu śiśiro rucyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pittadāhakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:2790: tūlaṃ tūdaṃ brahmakāṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇeṣṭaṃ ca yūpakam /
GS40rajnighu:2792: kramukaṃ viprakāṣṭhaṃ ca mṛdusāraṃ dvibhūmitam // Rajni_9.93
GS40rajnighu:2793: tūlaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ syāt vātapittaharaṃ saram /
GS40rajnighu:2796: nīladhvajaś ca tāpiñchaḥ kālatālo mahābalaḥ // Rajni_9.95
GS40rajnighu:2797: tamālo madhuro balyo vṛṣyaś ca śiśiro guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2810: kaṣāyāḥ pittalās tiktā vīryavṛddhikarāḥ parāḥ // Rajni_9.102
GS40rajnighu:2816: kumbhī kaṭuḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo grāhī vātakaphāpahaḥ // Rajni_9.105
GS40rajnighu:2821: raktapittodbhavaṃ rogaṃ kuṣṭhadoṣaṃ ca nāśayet // Rajni_9.107
GS40rajnighu:2823: śuklavṛkṣaḥ pāṇḍutarur dhavalaḥ pāṇḍuro nava // Rajni_9.108
GS40rajnighu:2825: pittaprakopaṇo rucyo vijñeyo dīpanaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_9.109
GS40rajnighu:2827: rujāpahaḥ picchalako rūkṣaḥ svāduphalaś ca saḥ // Rajni_9.110
GS40rajnighu:2832: bhūtaghno mṛdupatraś ca śailendrastho dvibhūmitaḥ // Rajni_9.112
GS40rajnighu:2835: tiniśaḥ syandanaś cakrī śatāṅgaḥ śakaṭo rathaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2836: rathiko bhasmagarbhaś ca meṣī jaladharo daśa // Rajni_9.114
GS40rajnighu:2840: vairāntakaḥ kirīṭī ca gāṇḍīvī śivamallakaḥ // Rajni_9.116
GS40rajnighu:2843: pṛthājaḥ phālguno dhanvī kakubhaś caikaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_9.117
GS40rajnighu:2846: haridruḥ pītadāruḥ syāt pītakāṣṭhaś ca pītakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2847: kadambakaḥ supuṣpaś ca surāhvaḥ pītakadrumaḥ // Rajni_9.119
GS40rajnighu:2850: dagdhā dagdharuhā proktā dagdhikā ca sthaleruhā /
GS40rajnighu:2854: śākhoṭaḥ syād bhūtavṛkṣo gavākṣī yūkāvāso bhūrjapatraś ca pītaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2855: kauśikyo 'jakṣīranāśaś ca sūktas tiktoṣṇo 'yaṃ pittakṛd vātahārī //
GS40rajnighu:2859: kaphaghnaṃ madhuraṃ rucyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ śākavalkalam // Rajni_9.125
GS40rajnighu:2860: śiṃśapā tu mahāśyāmā kṛṣṇasārā ca dhūmrikā /
GS40rajnighu:2861: tīkṣṇasārā ca dhīrā ca kapilā kṛṣṇaśiṃśapā // Rajni_9.126
GS40rajnighu:2867: sāriṇī kapilākṣī ca bhasmagarbhā kuśiṃśapā // Rajni_9.129
GS40rajnighu:2873: priyako bījavṛkṣaś ca nīlakaḥ priyaśālakaḥ // Rajni_9.132
GS40rajnighu:2874: asanaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca tikto vātārtidoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:2879: sārakau kaṇḍudadrughnau śreṣṭhas tatrāsitas tayoḥ // Rajni_9.135
GS40rajnighu:2882: varuṇaḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca raktadoṣaharaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2889: karahāṭaḥ kṣuraś caiva śastrakośataruḥ saraḥ // Rajni_9.140
GS40rajnighu:2896: kaṭabhī nābhikā śauṇḍī pāṭalī kiṇihī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2897: madhureṇuḥ kṣudraśāmā kaiḍaryaḥ śyāmalā nava // Rajni_9.144
GS40rajnighu:2902: vātakaphājīrṇarujāśamanī śvetā ca tatra guṇayuktā // Rajni_9.146
GS40rajnighu:2903: kṣavakaḥ kṣurakas tīkṣṇaḥ krūro bhūtāṅkuśaḥ kṣavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2909: sarṣapo nirjarādiḥ syāt kurarāṅghrir navābhidhaḥ // Rajni_9.149
GS40rajnighu:2913: ḍahuḥ kārśyaś ca śūraś ca sthūlaskandho navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_9.151
GS40rajnighu:2914: lakucaḥ svarase tiktaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇo laghus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2919: piṇḍarohiṇakaḥ pūtaḥ kiṅkiṇī ca tripañcadhā // Rajni_9.154
GS40rajnighu:2923: vaidyo vai dyatu vargam enam akhilaṃ vijñāya vaijñānikaḥ prajñālokavijṛmbhaṇena sahasā svairaṃ gadānāṃ gaṇam // Rajni_9.156
GS40rajnighu:2924: ye vṛścanti nṛṇāṃ gadān gurutarān ākramya vīryāsinā ye sthitvāpi vane guṇena sarujāṃ svenāvanaṃ tanvate /
GS40rajnighu:2925: teṣām eṣa mahān asīmamahimā vanyātmanāṃ vāsabhūr vṛkṣāṇāṃ bhaṇito bhiṣagbhir asamo yo vṛkṣavargākhyayā yaḥ kāśmīrakulojjvalāmbujavanīhaṃso 'pi saṃsevyate nityollāsitanīlakaṇṭhamanasaḥ prītyādyabhagnaśriyā
GS40rajnighu:2926: tasyāyaṃ navamaḥ kṛtau naraharer vargaḥ prabhadrādiko bhadrātmany abhidhānaśekharaśikhācūḍāmaṇau saṃsthitaḥ // Rajni_9.158
GS40rajnighu:2927: Rājanighaṇṭu, Karavīrādivarga caturdhā karavīro 'tha dhattūratritayaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2928: kovidāro 'bdhir arkaḥ syān nameruḥ kiṃśukas tathā // Rajni_10.1
GS40rajnighu:2929: punnāgas tilako 'gastyaḥ pāṭalyau ca dvidhā smṛte /
GS40rajnighu:2930: aśokaś campako dhanvī ketakī dvividhā tathā // Rajni_10.2
GS40rajnighu:2931: sindūrī ca tathā jātī mudgaraḥ śatapatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:2932: mallikā ca caturdhā syād vāsantī navamallikā // Rajni_10.3
GS40rajnighu:2934: karuṇī mādhavī cātha gaṇikārī ca kundakaḥ // Rajni_10.4
GS40rajnighu:2936: proktā bhramaramārī ca taruṇy amlānakas tathā // Rajni_10.5
GS40rajnighu:2938: tagaraṃ damanadvandvaṃ tulasī maruvo dvidhā // Rajni_10.6
GS40rajnighu:2939: arjakaś ca caturgaṅgā patrī pācī ca bālakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2942: padmākṣaṃ ca mṛṇālaṃ tatkandaḥ kesaraś ca tathā // Rajni_10.8
GS40rajnighu:2954: caṇḍīkusumaḥ krūro bhūtadrāvī ravipriyo munibhiḥ // Rajni_10.14
GS40rajnighu:2955: raktas tu karavīraḥ syāt kaṭustīkṣṇo viśodhakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2958: kṛṣṇas tu kṛṣṇakusumaś caturvidho 'yaṃ guṇe tulyaḥ // Rajni_10.16
GS40rajnighu:2960: śaṭho mātulakaḥ śyāmo madanaḥ śivaśekharaḥ // Rajni_10.17
GS40rajnighu:2963: dhattūraḥ kaṭur uṣṇaś ca kāntikārī vraṇārtinut /
GS40rajnighu:2966: kṛṣṇapuṣpo viṣārātiḥ krūradhūrtaś ca kīrtitaḥ // Rajni_10.20
GS40rajnighu:2970: sāmānyaguṇopetās teṣu guṇāḍhyas tu kṛṣṇakusumaḥ syāt // Rajni_10.22
GS40rajnighu:2972: kāntapuṣpaś ca karakaḥ kāntāro yamalacchadaḥ // Rajni_10.23
GS40rajnighu:2978: vikṣīro bhāskaraḥ kṣīrī kharjūghnaḥ śivapuṣpakaḥ // Rajni_10.26
GS40rajnighu:2979: bhañjanaḥ kṣīraparṇī syāt savitā ca vikīraṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2980: sūryāhvaś ca sadāpuṣpo ravir āsphoṭakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:2981: tūlaphalaḥ śukaphalo viṃśatiś ca samāhvayaḥ // Rajni_10.27
GS40rajnighu:2982: arkas tu kaṭur uṣṇaś ca vātajid dīpanīyakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2984: śuklārkas tapanaḥ śvetaḥ pratāpaś ca sitārkakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:2985: supuṣpaḥ śaṅkarādiḥ syād atyarko vṛttamallikā // Rajni_10.29
GS40rajnighu:2989: kāṣṭhīlaś ca sadāpuṣpo jñeyo 'tra saptasaṃmitaḥ // Rajni_10.31
GS40rajnighu:2992: śvetamandārakas tv anyaḥ pṛthvī kuravakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3003: tasya puṣpaṃ ca soṣṇaṃ ca kaṇḍūkuṣṭhārttināśanam /
GS40rajnighu:3004: raktaḥ pītaḥ sito nīlaḥ kusumais tu vibhajyate // Rajni_10.38
GS40rajnighu:3005: kiṃśukair guṇasāmye 'pi sito vijñānadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_10.39
GS40rajnighu:3006: punnāgaḥ puruṣas tuṅgaḥ punnāmā pāṭalaḥ pumān /
GS40rajnighu:3010: tilako viśeṣakaḥ syān mukhamaṇḍanakaś ca puṇḍrakaḥ puṇḍraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3011: sthirapuṣpaḥ chinnaruho dagdharuho recakaś ca mṛtajīvī // Rajni_10.42
GS40rajnighu:3018: agastyaḥ śīghrapuṣpaḥ syāt agastis tu munidrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3027: pāṭalī tu rase tiktā kaṭūṣṇā kaphavātajit /
GS40rajnighu:3031: pāṭalī dhavalā proktā jñeyā vasumitāhvayā // Rajni_10.51
GS40rajnighu:3035: madhupuṣpo 'paśokaś ca kaṅkeliḥ kelikas tathā // Rajni_10.53
GS40rajnighu:3039: piṇḍīpuṣpo naṭaś caiva pallavadrur dviviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_10.55
GS40rajnighu:3043: subhago bhṛṅgamohī ca śītalo bhramarātithiḥ // Rajni_10.57
GS40rajnighu:3047: tatkalikā gandhaphalī bahugandhā gandhamodinī tredhā // Rajni_10.59
GS40rajnighu:3050: kṣudrādicampakas tv anyaḥ sa jñeyo nāgacampakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3053: cakṣuṣyo vraṇaropī vahnistambhaṃ karoti yogaguṇāt // Rajni_10.62
GS40rajnighu:3054: bakulas tu sīdhugandhaḥ strīmukhamadhudohalaś ca madhupuṣpaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3055: surabhir bhramarānandaḥ sthirakusumaḥ kesaraś ca śāradikaḥ // Rajni_10.63
GS40rajnighu:3056: karakaḥ sīdhusaṃjñas tu viśārado gūḍhapuṣpako dhanvī /
GS40rajnighu:3057: madano madyāmodaś cirapuṣpaś ceti saptadaśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_10.64
GS40rajnighu:3059: madhuraś ca kaṣāyaś ca madāḍhyo haryadāyakaḥ // Rajni_10.65
GS40rajnighu:3060: bakulakusumaṃ ca rucyaṃ kṣīrāḍhyaṃ surabhi śītalaṃ madhuram /
GS40rajnighu:3063: medhyā kaṇṭadalā caiva śivadviṣṭā nṛpapriyā // Rajni_10.67
GS40rajnighu:3064: krakacā dīrghapatrā ca sthiragandhā tu pāṃśulā /
GS40rajnighu:3066: svarṇādiketakī tv anyā jñeyā sā hemaketakī /
GS40rajnighu:3068: viṣṭaruhā svarṇapuṣpī kāmakhaḍgadalā ca sā // Rajni_10.69
GS40rajnighu:3077: jātī surabhigandhā syāt sumanā tu surapriyā /
GS40rajnighu:3078: cetakī sukumārā tu sandhyāpuṣpī manoharā // Rajni_10.74
GS40rajnighu:3080: janeṣṭā hṛdyagandhā ca nāmāny asyāś caturdaśa /
GS40rajnighu:3083: mudgaro gandhasāras tu saptapatraś ca kardamī /
GS40rajnighu:3085: geyapriyo janeṣṭaś ca mṛgeṣṭo rudrasammitaḥ // Rajni_10.76
GS40rajnighu:3092: mallikā bhadravallī tu gaurī ca vanacandrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3093: śītabhīruḥ priyā saumyā nārīṣṭā girijā sitā /
GS40rajnighu:3094: mallī ca damayantī ca candrikā modinī manuḥ // Rajni_10.80
GS40rajnighu:3100: vraṇaghnī gandhabahalā dārayaty āsyajān gadān // Rajni_10.83
GS40rajnighu:3101: vārṣikā tripuṭā tryasrā surūpā sulabhā priyā /
GS40rajnighu:3106: mṛgamadavāsā tv anyā kastūrīmallikā jñeyā // Rajni_10.86
GS40rajnighu:3108: vanamallikā nu sā syād āsphotā kintu samaguṇopetā // Rajni_10.87
GS40rajnighu:3110: śītasahā madhubahalā vasantadūtī ca vasunāmnī // Rajni_10.88
GS40rajnighu:3115: sugandhā śikhariṇī syān nevālī cendubhūhvayā // Rajni_10.90
GS40rajnighu:3118: madanī bhramarānandā kāmakāntā ca pañcākhyā // Rajni_10.92
GS40rajnighu:3122: modanī bahugandhā ca bhṛṅgānandā gajāhvayā // Rajni_10.94
GS40rajnighu:3126: manoharā ca gandhāḍhyā proktā trayodaśāhvayā // Rajni_10.96
GS40rajnighu:3132: surūpaṃ tu sugandhāḍhyaṃ svarṇayūthyā viśeṣataḥ // Rajni_10.99
GS40rajnighu:3136: puṣpaṃ tu śītalaṃ varṇyaṃ dāhaghnaṃ vātapittajit // Rajni_10.101
GS40rajnighu:3137: mucakundo bahupatraḥ sudalo harivallabhaḥ supuṣpaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:3138: arghyārho lakṣmaṇako raktaprasavaś ca vasunāmā // Rajni_10.102
GS40rajnighu:3141: karuṇī grīṣmapuṣpī syād raktapuṣpī ca vāruṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3142: rājapriyā rājapuṣpī sūkṣmā ca brahmacāriṇī // Rajni_10.104
GS40rajnighu:3153: kundas tu makarandaś ca mahāmodo manoharaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3155: damano vanahāsaś ca manojño rudrasammitaḥ // Rajni_10.111
GS40rajnighu:3158: bakaḥ pāśupataḥ śaivaḥ śivapiṇḍaś ca suvrataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3159: vasukaś ca śivāṅkaś ca śiveṣṭaḥ kramapūrakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3172: trisandhyakusumā kāntā sukumārā ca sandhijā // Rajni_10.119
GS40rajnighu:3173: trisandhis trividhā jñeyā raktā cānyā sitāsitā /
GS40rajnighu:3175: japākhyā oḍrakākhyā ca raktapuṣpī javā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3177: japā tu kaṭur uṣṇā syād indraluptakanāśakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:3180: kuṣṭhārir bhramarī caiva jñeyā yaṣṭilatā muniḥ // Rajni_10.123
GS40rajnighu:3183: taruṇī sahā kumārī gandhāḍhyā cārukesarā bhṛṅgeṣṭā /
GS40rajnighu:3184: rāmataruṇī tu sudalā bahupatrā bhṛṅgavallabhā ca daśāhvā // Rajni_10.125
GS40rajnighu:3188: amilātakaḥ supuṣpaḥ suvarṇapuṣpaś ca saptāhvaḥ // Rajni_10.127
GS40rajnighu:3190: cakṣuṣyā harṣadā hṛdyā surabhiḥ suravallabhā // Rajni_10.128
GS40rajnighu:3191: atha raktāmlānaḥ syād raktasahākhyaḥ sa cāparimlānaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3192: raktāmalāntako 'pi ca raktaprasavaś ca kuravakaś caiva // Rajni_10.129
GS40rajnighu:3194: subhago bhramarānandaḥ syād ity ayaṃ pakṣacandramitaḥ // Rajni_10.130
GS40rajnighu:3197: pītaḥ sa kiṅkirātaḥ pītāmlānaḥ kuraṇṭakaḥ kanakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3198: pītakuravaḥ supītaḥ sa pītakusumaś ca saptasaṃjñakaḥ syāt // Rajni_10.132
GS40rajnighu:3201: nīlapuṣpā tu sā dāsī nīlāmlānas tu chādanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3202: bālā cārttagalā caiva nīlapuṣpā ca ṣaḍvidhā // Rajni_10.134
GS40rajnighu:3205: kaṇṭakaraṇṭo jhiṇṭī sā vanyasahacarī tu sā pītā /
GS40rajnighu:3206: śoṇī kuravakanāmnī kaṇṭakinī śoṇajhiṇṭikā caiva // Rajni_10.136
GS40rajnighu:3207: sānyā tu nīlajhiṇṭī nīlakuraṇṭaś ca nīlakusumā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3208: bāṇo bāṇā dāsī kaṇṭārttagalā ca saptasaṃjñā syāt // Rajni_10.137
GS40rajnighu:3209: jhiṇṭikāḥ kaṭukās tiktā dantāmayaśāntidāś ca śūlaghnāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3212: raktā lohitapuṣpī ca varṇapuṣpī ṣaḍāhvayā // Rajni_10.139
GS40rajnighu:3214: tadbījaṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ vṛṣyaṃ santarpaṇaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_10.140
GS40rajnighu:3215: tagaraṃ kuṭilaṃ vakraṃ vinamraṃ kuñcitaṃ natam /
GS40rajnighu:3216: śaṭhaṃ ca nahuṣākhyaṃ ca dadruhastaṃ ca barhaṇam // Rajni_10.141
GS40rajnighu:3218: kālānusārakaṃ kṣatraṃ dīnaṃ jihmaṃ munīndudhā // Rajni_10.142
GS40rajnighu:3221: atha damanakas tu damano dānto gandhotkaṭo munir jaṭilaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3222: daṇḍī ca pāṇḍurāgo brahmajaṭā puṇḍarīkaś ca // Rajni_10.144
GS40rajnighu:3224: kulapatraś ca vinītastapasvipatraś ca saptadhātrīkaḥ // Rajni_10.145
GS40rajnighu:3227: anyaś ca vanyadamano vanādināmā ca damanaparyāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3230: surejyā surasā jñeyā kāyasthā suradundubhī // Rajni_10.148
GS40rajnighu:3231: surabhir bahupatrī ca mañjarī sā haripriyā /
GS40rajnighu:3233: bhūtaghnī pūtapatrī ca jñeyā caikonaviṃśatiḥ // Rajni_10.149
GS40rajnighu:3236: kṛṣṇā tu kṛṣṇatulasī śvetā lakṣmīḥ sitāhvayā /
GS40rajnighu:3239: bahuvīryaḥ śītalakaḥ surāhvaś ca samīraṇaḥ // Rajni_10.152
GS40rajnighu:3242: dvidhā maruvakaḥ proktaḥ śvetaś caiva sitetaraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3243: śveto bheṣajakārye syād aparaḥ śivapūjane // Rajni_10.154
GS40rajnighu:3247: ugragandhaś ca jambīraḥ kuṭheraś ca kaṭhiñjaraḥ // Rajni_10.156
GS40rajnighu:3251: syāt kṛṣṇamallikā proktā garaghno vanabarbaraḥ // Rajni_10.158
GS40rajnighu:3256: nidrāluḥ śophahārī ca suvaktraś ca daśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_10.160
GS40rajnighu:3257: vanabarbarikā coṣṇā sugandhā kaṭukā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3259: gaṅgāpatrī tu patrī syāt sugandhā gandhapatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3260: gaṅgāpatrī kaṭūṣṇā ca vātajid vraṇaropaṇī // Rajni_10.162
GS40rajnighu:3266: keśyaṃ vajram udīcyaṃ ca piṅgaṃ ca lalanāpriyam /
GS40rajnighu:3267: bālaṃ ca kuntalośīraṃ kacāmodaṃ śaśīndudhā // Rajni_10.165
GS40rajnighu:3277: dīpanaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ varṇyaṃ bālahitaṃ tathā // Rajni_10.170
GS40rajnighu:3282: pāthojaṃ kamalaṃ nabhaṃ ca nalināmbhojāmbujanmāmbujaṃ śrīpadmāmburuhābjapadmajalajāny ambhoruhaṃ sārasam /
GS40rajnighu:3283: paṅkejaṃ sarasīruhaṃ ca kuṭapaṃ pāthoruhaṃ puṣkaraṃ vārjaṃ tāmarasaṃ kuśeśayakaje kañjāravinde tathā // Rajni_10.173
GS40rajnighu:3292: kokanadam aruṇakamalaṃ raktāmbhojaṃ ca śoṇapadmaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3293: raktotpalam aravindaṃ ravipriyaṃ raktavārijaṃ vasavaḥ // Rajni_10.178
GS40rajnighu:3294: kokanadaṃ kaṭutiktaṃ madhuraṃ śiśiraṃ ca raktadoṣaharam /
GS40rajnighu:3299: rucyaṃ rasāyane śreṣṭhaṃ keśyaṃ ca dehadārḍhyadam // Rajni_10.181
GS40rajnighu:3300: īṣat śvetaṃ padmaṃ nalinaṃ ca tad uktam īṣad āraktam /
GS40rajnighu:3301: utpalam īṣan nīlaṃ trividham itīdaṃ bhavet kamalam // Rajni_10.182
GS40rajnighu:3304: padminī nalinī proktā kūṭapiny abjinī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3306: padminī madhurā tiktā kaṣāyā śiśirā parā /
GS40rajnighu:3308: padmabījaṃ tu padmākṣaṃ gāloḍyaṃ kandalī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3309: bheḍā krauñcādanī krauñcā śyāmā syāt padmakarkaṭī // Rajni_10.186
GS40rajnighu:3312: mṛṇālaṃ padmanālaṃ ca mṛṇālī ca mṛṇālinī /
GS40rajnighu:3313: bisaṃ ca padmatantuś ca bisinī nalinīruham // Rajni_10.188
GS40rajnighu:3317: śālīnaṃ ca jalālūkaṃ syād ity evaṃ ṣaḍāhvayam // Rajni_10.190
GS40rajnighu:3318: śālūkaṃ kaṭu viṣṭambhi rūkṣaṃ rucyaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3321: kiñjaṃ pītaṃ parāgaṃ ca tuṅgaṃ cāmpeyakaṃ nava // Rajni_10.192
GS40rajnighu:3325: himābjaṃ śītajalajaṃ niśāphullaṃ ca saptadhā // Rajni_10.194
GS40rajnighu:3328: dhavalotpalaṃ tu kumudaṃ kahlāraṃ kairavaṃ ca śītalakam /
GS40rajnighu:3329: śaśikāntam indukamalaṃ candrābjaṃ candrikāmbujaṃ ca nava // Rajni_10.196
GS40rajnighu:3330: kumudaṃ śītalaṃ svādu pāke tiktaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3332: nīlotpalam utpalakaṃ kuvalayam indīvaraṃ ca kandottham /
GS40rajnighu:3333: saugandhikaṃ sugandhaṃ kuḍmalakaṃ cāsitotpalaṃ navadhā // Rajni_10.198
GS40rajnighu:3335: pāke tu tiktam atyantaṃ raktapittāpahārakam // Rajni_10.199
GS40rajnighu:3336: utpalinī kairaviṇī kumudvatī kumudinī ca candreṣṭā /
GS40rajnighu:3343: tṛṣṇārtipittakaphadoṣaharaḥ saraś ca santarpaṇaś ciram arocakahārakaś ca
GS40rajnighu:3344: jātī bhāti mṛdur manojñamadhurāmodā muhūrtadvayaṃ dvaiguṇyena ca mallikā madakarī gandhādhikā yūthikā /
GS40rajnighu:3345: ekāhaṃ navamālikā madakaraṃ cāhnāṃ trayaṃ campakaṃ tīvrāmodam athāṣṭavāsaramitāmodānvitā ketakī itthaṃ nānāprathitasumanaḥpatrapadmābhidhānasaṃsthānoktipraguṇitatayā tadguṇākhyāpravīṇam
GS40rajnighu:3346: vācoyuktisthiraparimalaṃ vargam enaṃ paṭhitvā nityāmodair mukhasarasijaṃ vāsayatv āśu vaidyaḥ sthairye śailaśilopamāny api śanair āsādya tadbhāvanāṃ bhedyatvaṃ yamināṃ manāṃsy api yayuḥ puṣpāśugasyāśugaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3347: teṣāṃ bhūṣayatāṃ surādikaśiraḥ patraprasūnātmanāṃ vargo 'yaṃ vasatir matā sumanasām uttaṃsavargākhyayā lokān sparśanayogataḥ prasṛmarāṇy āmodayanty añjasā protphullāni ca yad yaśāṃsi viśadāny uttaṃsayante diśaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3348: tasyāyaṃ daśamaḥ kṛtau sthitim agād vargo nṛsiṃheśituḥ sūrīndoḥ karavīrakādir abhidhāsambhāracūḍāmaṇau Rājanighaṇṭu, Āmrādivarga āmrāḥ pañcavidhāḥ proktā jambūś caiva caturvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:3349: panasaḥ kadalī cābdhiḥ nārikeladvayaṃ tathā // Rajni_11.1
GS40rajnighu:3351: dāḍimaṃ tindukau cātho akṣoṭaḥ pīluko dvidhā // Rajni_11.2
GS40rajnighu:3352: pārevate madhūkaṃ tu dvidhā bhavyāruke kramāt /
GS40rajnighu:3353: drākṣā tridhātha karmāraḥ paruṣaḥ pippalo vaṭaḥ // Rajni_11.3
GS40rajnighu:3354: vaṭī cāśvatthikā plakṣas tathā codumbaras tridhā /
GS40rajnighu:3355: tattvacā badaraṃ cābdhi bījapūraṃ tridhā matam // Rajni_11.4
GS40rajnighu:3356: āmalakyau dvidhā caiva ciñcā ciñcārasas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3359: katakaḥ karkaṭaś caiva dvidhā śleṣmātakas tathā // Rajni_11.6
GS40rajnighu:3360: muṣkakaḥ karamardaś ca tathā tejaḥphalas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3361: vikaṇṭakaḥ śivā saptāpy akṣaḥ pūgo 'ṣṭadhā smṛtaḥ // Rajni_11.7
GS40rajnighu:3362: saptadhā nāgavallī syāc cūrṇaṃ caivāṣṭadhā smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:3365: kāmāṅgaḥ sahakāraś ca kīreṣṭo mādhavadrumaḥ // Rajni_11.9
GS40rajnighu:3369: priyāmbuḥ kokilāvāsaḥ sa proktas trikarāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.11
GS40rajnighu:3370: āmraḥ kaṣāyāmlarasaḥ sugandhiḥ kaṇṭhāmayaghno 'gnikaraś ca bālaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3372: bālaṃ pittānilakaphakaraṃ tac ca baddhāsthi tādṛk pakvaṃ doṣatritayaśamanaṃ svādu puṣṭiṃ guruṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3373: datte dhātupracayam adhikaṃ tarpaṇaṃ kāntikāri khyātaṃ tṛṣṇāśramaśamakṛtau cūtajātaṃ phalaṃ syāt // Rajni_11.13
GS40rajnighu:3375: kṣudrāmraś ceti raktāmro lākṣāvṛkṣaḥ suraktakaḥ // Rajni_11.14
GS40rajnighu:3376: kośāmram amlam anilāpaharaṃ kaphārttipittapradaṃ guru vidāhaviśophakāri /
GS40rajnighu:3377: pakvaṃ bhaven madhuram īṣad apāram amlaṃ paṭvādiyuktarucidīpanapuṣṭibalyam
GS40rajnighu:3389: rājāmreṣu triṣu proktaṃ sāmyam eva rasādhikam /
GS40rajnighu:3390: guṇādhikaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ paryāyād uttarottaram // Rajni_11.21
GS40rajnighu:3391: bālaṃ rājaphalaṃ kaphāsrapavanaśvāsārtipittapradaṃ madhyaṃ tādṛśam eva doṣabahulaṃ bhūyaḥ kaṣāyāmlakam /
GS40rajnighu:3392: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ tṛṣṇāvidāhaśramaśvāsārocakamocakaṃ guru himaṃ vṛṣyāticūtāhvayam āmratvacā kaṣāyā ca mūlaṃ saugandhi tādṛśam /
GS40rajnighu:3393: rucyaṃ saṃgrāhi śiśiraṃ puṣpaṃ tu rucidīpanam // Rajni_11.23
GS40rajnighu:3394: jambūs tu surabhipatrā nīlaphalā śyāmalā mahāskandhā /
GS40rajnighu:3395: rājārhā rājaphalā śukapriyā meghamodinī navāhvā // Rajni_11.24
GS40rajnighu:3397: śvāsātisārakaphakāsavināśanī ca viṣṭambhinī bhavati rocanapācanī ca //
GS40rajnighu:3400: mahājambūr uṣṇā samadhurakaṣāyā śramaharā nirasyaty āsyasthaṃ jhaṭiti jaḍimānaṃ svarakarī
GS40rajnighu:3401: vidhatte viṣṭambhaṃ śamayati ca śoṣaṃ vitanute śramātīsārārttiśvasitakaphakāsapraśamanam //
GS40rajnighu:3403: bhṛṅgeṣṭā kākanīlā ca dhvāṅkṣajambūr dhanapriyā // Rajni_11.28
GS40rajnighu:3404: kākajambūḥ kaṣāyāmlā pāke tu madhurā guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3406: anyā ca bhūmijambūr hrasvaphalā bhṛṅgavallabhā hrasvā /
GS40rajnighu:3407: bhūjambūr bhramareṣṭā pikabhakṣā kāṣṭhajambūś ca // Rajni_11.30
GS40rajnighu:3411: sthūlaḥ kaṇṭaphalaś caiva syān mūlaphaladaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3412: apuṣpaphaladaḥ pūtaphalo hy aṅkamitas tathā // Rajni_11.32
GS40rajnighu:3413: panasaṃ madhuraṃ supicchilaṃ guru hṛdyaṃ balavīryavṛddhidam /
GS40rajnighu:3414: śramadāhaviśoṣanāśanaṃ rucikṛd grāhi ca durjaraṃ param // Rajni_11.33
GS40rajnighu:3415: īṣat kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ tadbījaṃ vātalaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3417: bālaṃ tu nīrasaṃ hṛdyaṃ madhyapakvaṃ tu dīpanam /
GS40rajnighu:3418: rucidaṃ lavaṇādy uktaṃ panasasya phalaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_11.35
GS40rajnighu:3422: ūrustambhā bhānuphalā vanalakṣmīś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_11.37
GS40rajnighu:3423: bālaṃ phalaṃ madhuram alpatayā kaṣāyaṃ pittāpahaṃ śiśirarucyam athāpi nālam /
GS40rajnighu:3424: puṣpaṃ tad apy anuguṇaṃ krimihāri kandaṃ parṇaṃ ca śūlaśamakaṃ kadalībhavaṃ syāt // Rajni_11.38
GS40rajnighu:3425: rambhāpakvaphalaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ balyaṃ ca śītaṃ tathā pittaṃ cāsravimardanaṃ gurutaraṃ pathyaṃ na mandānale /
GS40rajnighu:3426: sadyaḥ śukravivṛddhidaṃ klamaharaṃ tṛṣṇāpahaṃ kāntidaṃ dīptāgnau sukhadaṃ kaphāmayakaraṃ santarpaṇaṃ durjaram // Rajni_11.39
GS40rajnighu:3428: dārukadalī phalāḍhyā vanamocā cāśmakadalī ca // Rajni_11.40
GS40rajnighu:3430: gurur mandāgnijananī durjarā madhurā parā // Rajni_11.41
GS40rajnighu:3434: tṛṭpittadāhaśoṣapraśamanakartrī ca durjarā ca guruḥ // Rajni_11.43
GS40rajnighu:3435: anyā suvarṇakadalī suvarṇarambhā ca kanakarambhā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3436: pītā suvarṇamocā campakarambhā surambhikā subhagā // Rajni_11.44
GS40rajnighu:3437: hemaphalā svarṇaphalā kanakastambhā ca pītarambhā ca /
GS40rajnighu:3438: gaurā ca gaurarambhā kāñcanakadalī surapriyā ṣaḍbhūḥ // Rajni_11.45
GS40rajnighu:3439: suvarṇamocā madhurā himā ca svalpāśane dīpanakāriṇī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3440: tṛṣṇāpahā dāhavimocanī ca kaphāvahā vṛṣyakarī guruś ca // Rajni_11.46
GS40rajnighu:3447: nārikelasalilaṃ laghu balyaṃ śītalaṃ ca madhuraṃ guru pāke pittapīnasatṛṣāśramadāhaśānti śoṣaśamanaṃ sukhadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:3448: pakvam etad api kiṃcid ihoktaṃ pittakāri rucidaṃ madhuraṃ ca dīpanaṃ balakaraṃ guru vṛṣyaṃ vīryavardhanam idaṃ tu vadanti // Rajni_11.50
GS40rajnighu:3449: khubaraṃ nārikelasya snigdhaṃ guru ca durjaram /
GS40rajnighu:3452: mākṣikaphalo mṛduphalo bahukūrco hrasvaphalaś ca vasugaṇitāhvaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:3454: balapuṣṭikaraṃ ca kāntim agryaṃ kurute vīryavivardhanaṃ ca rucyam //
GS40rajnighu:3455: mādhvīkaṃ nārikelaṃ phalam atimadhuraṃ durjaraṃ jantukāri snigdhaṃ vātātisāraśramaśamanam atha dhvaṃsanaṃ vahnidīpteḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3456: āmaśleṣmaprakopaṃ janayati kurute cārukāntiṃ balaṃ ca sthairyaṃ dehasya dhatte ghanamadanakalāvardhanaṃ pittanāśam // Rajni_11.54
GS40rajnighu:3458: niḥśreṇī ca kaṣāyā ca yavaneṣṭā haripriyā // Rajni_11.55
GS40rajnighu:3459: kharjūrī tu kaṣāyā ca pakvā gaulyakaṣāyakā /
GS40rajnighu:3460: pittaghnī kaphadā caiva krimikṛd vṛṣyabṛṃhaṇī // Rajni_11.56
GS40rajnighu:3461: madhukharjūrī tv anyā madhukarkaṭikā ca kolakarkaṭikā /
GS40rajnighu:3462: kaṇṭakinī madhuphalikā mādhvī madhurā ca madhurakharjūrī // Rajni_11.57
GS40rajnighu:3464: śiśirā ca jantukarī bahuvīryavivardhanaṃ tanute // Rajni_11.58
GS40rajnighu:3466: bhūkharjūrī madhurā śiśirā ca vidāhapittaharā // Rajni_11.59
GS40rajnighu:3473: dāhaghnī madhurāsrapittaśamanī tṛṣṇārtidoṣāpahā śītā śvāsakaphaśramodayaharā santarpaṇī puṣṭidā
GS40rajnighu:3474: vahner māndyakarī gurur viṣaharā hṛdyā ca datte balaṃ snigdhā vīryavivardhanī ca kathitā piṇḍākhyakharjūrikā cāraḥ khadruḥ kharaskandho lalanaś cārakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3477: cārasya ca phalaṃ pakvaṃ vṛṣyaṃ gaulyāmlakaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3480: krimighnas tailabījaś ca vātāriḥ sphoṭabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.66
GS40rajnighu:3482: vahnir varataruś ceti vijñeyaḥ ṣoḍaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.67
GS40rajnighu:3483: bhallātakaḥ kaṭus tiktaḥ kaṣāyoṣṇaḥ krimīñ jayet /
GS40rajnighu:3486: tanmajjā ca viśoṣadāhaśamanī pittāpahā tarpaṇī vātārocakahāridīptijananī pittāpahā tv añjasā rājādano rājaphalaḥ kṣīravṛkṣo nṛpadrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3491: vṛṣyā sthaulyakarī hṛdyā susnigdhā mehanāśakṛt // Rajni_11.72
GS40rajnighu:3493: karako raktabījaś ca suphalo dantabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.73
GS40rajnighu:3495: maṇibījas tathā valkaphalo vṛttaphalaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3496: sunīlo nīlapatraś ca jñeyaḥ saptadaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.74
GS40rajnighu:3498: grāhi dīpanakaraṃ ca laghūṣṇaṃ śītalaṃ śramaharaṃ rucidāyi // Rajni_11.75
GS40rajnighu:3499: dāḍimaṃ dvividham īritam āryair amlam ekam aparaṃ madhuraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3500: tatra vātakaphahāri kilāmlaṃ tāpahāri madhuraṃ laghu pathyam //
GS40rajnighu:3502: sphūrjako rāmaṇaś caiva sphūrjanaḥ syandanāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.77
GS40rajnighu:3503: tindukas tu kaṣāyaḥ syāt saṃgrāhī vātakṛt paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3504: pakvas tu madhuraḥ snigdho durjaraḥ śleṣmalo guruḥ // Rajni_11.78
GS40rajnighu:3506: kākasphūrjaś ca kākenduḥ kākāhvaḥ kākabījakaḥ // Rajni_11.79
GS40rajnighu:3508: pakvas tu madhuraḥ kiṃcit kaphakṛt pittavāntihṛt // Rajni_11.80
GS40rajnighu:3510: kīreṣṭaḥ kandarālaś ca madhumajjā bṛhacchadaḥ // Rajni_11.81
GS40rajnighu:3513: pītuḥ śītaḥ sahasrāṃśī dhānī guḍaphalas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3516: saraḥ svāduś ca gulmārśaḥśamano dīpanaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_11.84
GS40rajnighu:3521: pārevataṃ tu raivatam ārevatakaṃ ca kiṃca raivatakam /
GS40rajnighu:3522: madhuphalam amṛtaphalākhyaṃ pārevatakaṃ ca saptāhvam // Rajni_11.87
GS40rajnighu:3523: pārevataṃ tu madhuraṃ krimivātahāri vṛṣyaṃ tṛṣājvaravidāhaharaṃ ca hṛdyam /
GS40rajnighu:3524: mūrchābhramaśramaviśoṣavināśakāri snigdhaṃ ca rucyam uditaṃ bahuvīryadāyi
GS40rajnighu:3526: sāmrāṇijaṃ khārikaṃ ca raktaraivatakaṃ ca tat /
GS40rajnighu:3529: vṛṣyaṃ mūrchājvaraghnaṃ ca pūrvoktād adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.90
GS40rajnighu:3531: guḍapuṣpo lodhrapuṣpo vānaprasthaś ca mādhavaḥ // Rajni_11.91
GS40rajnighu:3535: kṣaudrapriyaḥ pataṅgaḥ kīreṣṭo gairikākṣaś ca // Rajni_11.93
GS40rajnighu:3537: vṛṣyo vāntiharaḥ śīto balakārī rasāyanaḥ // Rajni_11.94
GS40rajnighu:3538: madhūkapuṣpaṃ madhuraṃ ca vṛṣyaṃ hṛdyaṃ himaṃ pittavidāhahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3539: phalaṃ ca vātāmayapittanāśi jñeyaṃ madhūkadvayam evam etat // Rajni_11.95
GS40rajnighu:3540: bhavyaṃ bhavaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhāvanaṃ vaktraśodhanam /
GS40rajnighu:3541: tathā picchalabījaṃ ca tac ca lomaphalaṃ matam // Rajni_11.96
GS40rajnighu:3542: bhavyam amlaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca bālaṃ vātakaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:3543: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ ca rucikṛt sāmaśūlahṛt // Rajni_11.97
GS40rajnighu:3544: ārukaṃ vīrasenaṃ ca vīraṃ vīrārukaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3546: ārukāṇi ca sarvāṇi madhurāṇi himāni ca /
GS40rajnighu:3549: gucchaphalā rasālā ca jñeyāmṛtaphalā ca sā // Rajni_11.100
GS40rajnighu:3551: mūtradoṣaharā rucyā vṛṣyā saṃtarpaṇī parā // Rajni_11.101
GS40rajnighu:3552: anyā kapiladrākṣā mṛdvīkā gostanī ca kapilaphalā /
GS40rajnighu:3553: amṛtarasā dīrghaphalā madhuvallī madhuphalā madhūlī ca // Rajni_11.102
GS40rajnighu:3554: haritā ca hārahūrā suphalā mṛdvī himottarāpathikā /
GS40rajnighu:3556: gostanī madhurā śītā hṛdyā ca madaharṣaṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3558: anyā sā kākalīdrākṣā jambukā ca phalottamā /
GS40rajnighu:3561: drākṣābālaphalaṃ kaṭūṣṇaviśadaṃ pittāsradoṣapradaṃ madhyaṃ cāmlarasaṃ rasāntaragate rucyātivahnipradam
GS40rajnighu:3562: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ tathāmlasahitaṃ tṛṣṇāsrapittāpahaṃ pakvaṃ śuṣkatamaṃ śramārtiśamanaṃ santarpaṇaṃ puṣṭidam // Rajni_11.106
GS40rajnighu:3563: śītā pittāsradoṣaṃ damayati madhurā snigdhapākātirucyā cakṣuṣyā śvāsakāsaśramavamiśamanī śophatṛṣṇājvaraghnī
GS40rajnighu:3564: dāhādhmānabhramādīn apanayati parā tarpaṇī pakvaśuṣkā drākṣā sukṣīṇavīryān api madanakalākelidakṣān vidhatte // Rajni_11.107
GS40rajnighu:3565: karmāraḥ karmarakaḥ pītaphalaḥ karmaraś ca mudgarakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3566: mudgaraphalaś ca dhārāphalakas tu karmārakaś caiva // Rajni_11.108
GS40rajnighu:3568: pakvas tu madhurāmlaḥ syād balapuṣṭirucipradaḥ // Rajni_11.109
GS40rajnighu:3570: nīlamaṇḍalam alpāsthi paruṣaṃ ca parus tathā // Rajni_11.110
GS40rajnighu:3571: parūṣam amlaṃ kaṭukaṃ kaphārtijid vātāpahaṃ tatphalam eva pittadam /
GS40rajnighu:3572: soṣṇaṃ ca pakvaṃ madhuraṃ rucipradaṃ pittāpahaṃ śophaharaṃ ca pītam //
GS40rajnighu:3574: śubhado bodhivṛkṣaś ca yājñiko gajabhakṣakaḥ // Rajni_11.112
GS40rajnighu:3575: śrīmān kṣīradrumo vipro maṅgalyaḥ śyāmalaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3576: pippalo guhyapuṣpaś ca sevyaḥ satyaḥ śucidrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3578: pippalaḥ sumadhuras tu kaṣāyaḥ śītalaś ca kaphapittavināśī /
GS40rajnighu:3579: raktadāhaśamanaḥ sa hi sadyo yonidoṣaharaṇaḥ kila pakvaḥ // Rajni_11.114
GS40rajnighu:3580: aśvatthavṛkṣasya phalāni pakvāny atīvahṛdyāni ca śītalāni /
GS40rajnighu:3582: syād atha vaṭo jaṭālo nyagrodho rohiṇo 'varohī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3583: viṭapī raktaphalaś ca skandharuho maṇḍalī mahācchāyaḥ // Rajni_11.116
GS40rajnighu:3585: kṣīrī śiphāruhaḥ syād bahupādaḥ sa tu vanaspatir navabhūḥ // Rajni_11.117
GS40rajnighu:3589: amarā saṅginī caiva kṣīrakāṣṭhā ca kīrtitā // Rajni_11.119
GS40rajnighu:3593: pippalikā vanasthā ca kṣudrā cāśvatthasaṃnibhā // Rajni_11.121
GS40rajnighu:3598: dṛḍhaprarohaḥ plavakaḥ plavaṅgaś ca mahābalaḥ // Rajni_11.123
GS40rajnighu:3600: puṇḍro mahāvarohaś ca hrasvaparṇas tu pimpariḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3607: saumyaḥ śītaphalaś ceti manusaṃjñaḥ samīritaḥ // Rajni_11.127
GS40rajnighu:3608: udumbaraṃ kaṣāyaṃ syāt pakvaṃ tu madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:3610: audumbaraṃ phalam atīva himaṃ supakvaṃ pittāpahaṃ ca madhuraṃ śramaśophahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3611: āmaṃ kaṣāyam atidīpanarocanaṃ ca māṃsasya vṛddhikaram asravikārakāri //
GS40rajnighu:3615: rasavīryavipākeṣu kiṃcin nyūnā ca pūrvataḥ // Rajni_11.131
GS40rajnighu:3617: udumbarī ca kaṭhinā kuṣṭhaghnī phalguvāṭikā // Rajni_11.132
GS40rajnighu:3627: subījaḥ suphalaḥ svacchaḥ surasaḥ smṛtisammitaḥ // Rajni_11.137
GS40rajnighu:3628: badaraṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyam amlaṃ paripakvaṃ madhurāmlam uṣṇam etat /
GS40rajnighu:3633: pṛthukolas tanubījo madhuraphalo rājakolaś ca // Rajni_11.140
GS40rajnighu:3635: vṛṣyaś ca vīryavṛddhiṃ kurute śoṣaśramaṃ harati // Rajni_11.141
GS40rajnighu:3636: bhūbadarī kṣitibadarī vallībadarī ca badarivallī ca /
GS40rajnighu:3637: bahuphalikā laghubadarī badaraphalī sūkṣmabadarī ca // Rajni_11.142
GS40rajnighu:3641: madhuraḥ śambarāhāraḥ śikhipriyaś caiva nirdiṣṭaḥ // Rajni_11.144
GS40rajnighu:3643: snigdhaṃ tu jantukārakam īṣat pittārtidāhaśoṣaghnam // Rajni_11.145
GS40rajnighu:3645: bījakaḥ keśarāmlaś ca mātuluṅgaḥ supūrakaḥ // Rajni_11.146
GS40rajnighu:3649: kaṇṭhaśodhanaparaṃ laghu hṛdyaṃ dīpanaṃ ca rucikṛj jaraṇaṃ ca //
GS40rajnighu:3650: bālaṃ pittamarutkaphāsrakaraṇaṃ madhyaṃ ca tādṛgvidhaṃ pakvaṃ varṇakaraṃ ca hṛdyam atha tat puṣṇāti puṣṭiṃ balam /
GS40rajnighu:3651: śūlājīrṇavibandhamārutakaphaśvāsārtimandāgnijit kāsārocakaśophaśāntidam idaṃ syān mātuluṅgaṃ sadā // Rajni_11.149
GS40rajnighu:3652: tvak tiktā durjarā syāt kṛmikaphapavanadhvaṃsinī snigdham uṣṇaṃ madhyaṃ śūlārtipittapraśamanam akhilārocakaghnaṃ ca gaulyam /
GS40rajnighu:3653: vātārtighnaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ jaṭharagadaharaṃ kesaraṃ dīpyam amlaṃ bījaṃ tiktaṃ kaphārśaḥśvayathuśamakaraṃ bījapūrasya pathyam // Rajni_11.150
GS40rajnighu:3655: atyamlā gandhāḍhyā vanodbhavā devadūtī ca // Rajni_11.151
GS40rajnighu:3656: pītā ca devadāsī deveṣṭā mātuluṅgikā caiva /
GS40rajnighu:3657: pavanī mahāphalā ca syād iyam iti vedabhūmimitā // Rajni_11.152
GS40rajnighu:3658: amlaḥ kaṭūṣṇo vanabījapūro ruciprado vātavināśanaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:3659: syād amladoṣakṛmināśakārī kaphāpahaḥ śvāsaniṣūdanaś ca // Rajni_11.153
GS40rajnighu:3661: madhukarkaṭī madhuraphalā mahāphalā vardhamānā ca // Rajni_11.154
GS40rajnighu:3663: tridoṣaśamanī rucyā vṛṣyā ca gurudurjarā // Rajni_11.155
GS40rajnighu:3664: āmalakī vayaḥsthā ca śrīphalā dhātrikā tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3665: amṛtā ca śivā śāntā śītāmṛtaphalā tathā // Rajni_11.156
GS40rajnighu:3666: jātīphalā ca dhātreyī jñeyā dhātrīphalā tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3667: vṛṣyā vṛttaphalā caiva rocanī śarabhūhvayā // Rajni_11.157
GS40rajnighu:3670: kaṭu madhurakaṣāyaṃ kiṃcid amlaṃ kaphaghnaṃ rucikaram atiśītaṃ hanti pittāsratāpam /
GS40rajnighu:3675: śītaṃ pittāsradoṣaghnaṃ pūrvoktam adhikaṃ guṇaiḥ // Rajni_11.161
GS40rajnighu:3676: ciñcā tu cukrikā cukrā sāmlikā śākacukrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3677: amlī sutintiḍī cāmlā cukrikā ca navābhidhā // Rajni_11.162
GS40rajnighu:3678: ciñcātyamlā bhaved āmā pakvā tu madhurāmlikā /
GS40rajnighu:3680: amlikāyāḥ phalaṃ tv āmam atyamlaṃ laghu pittakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:3681: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlaṃ syād bhedi viṣṭambhavātajit // Rajni_11.164
GS40rajnighu:3687: ciñcāmlam amlacūḍaś ca ciñcāraso 'pi saptadhā // Rajni_11.167
GS40rajnighu:3691: śṛṅgī kapirasāḍhyaś ca tanukṣīraḥ kapipriyaḥ // Rajni_11.169
GS40rajnighu:3693: pakvaṃ tu madhurāmlāḍhyaṃ snigdhaṃ pittakaphāpaham // Rajni_11.170
GS40rajnighu:3694: nāraṅgaḥ syān nāgaraṅgaḥ suraṅgas tvaggandhaś cairāvato vaktravāsaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3695: yogīraṅgo nāgaro yogaraṅgaḥ gandhāḍhyo 'yaṃ gandhapatro ravīṣṭaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:3696: nāraṅgaṃ madhuraṃ cāmlaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ caiva rocanam /
GS40rajnighu:3698: nimbūkaḥ syād amlajambīrakākhyo vahnir dīpyo vahnibījo 'mlasāraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3699: dantāghātaḥ śodhano jantumārī nimbūś ca syād rocano rudrasaṃjñaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:3700: nimbūphalaṃ prathitam amlarasaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ gulmāmavātaharam agnivivṛddhikāri
GS40rajnighu:3701: cakṣuṣyam etad atha kāsakaphārttikaṇṭhavicchardihāri paripakvam atīva rucyam // Rajni_11.174
GS40rajnighu:3703: rocanako mukhaśodhī jāḍyārir jantujin navadhā // Rajni_11.175
GS40rajnighu:3704: jambīrasya phalaṃ rase 'mlamadhuraṃ vātāpahaṃ pittakṛt pathyaṃ
GS40rajnighu:3706: pakvaṃ cen madhuraṃ kaphārttiśamanaṃ pittāsradoṣāpanut varṇyaṃ vīryavivarddhanaṃ ca rucikṛt puṣṭipradaṃ tarpaṇam // Rajni_11.176
GS40rajnighu:3708: śaṅkhadrāvī śarkarakaḥ pittadrāvī ca ṣaṭsaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_11.177
GS40rajnighu:3710: śoṣaghnas tarpaṇo vṛṣyaḥ śramaghnaḥ puṣṭikārakaḥ // Rajni_11.178
GS40rajnighu:3711: mālūras tu kapittho maṅgalyo nīlamallikā ca dadhi /
GS40rajnighu:3712: grāhiphalaś cirapākī granthiphalaḥ kucaphalo dadhiphalaś ca //
GS40rajnighu:3713: gandhaphalaś ca kapīṣṭo vṛttaphalaḥ karabhavallabhaś caiva /
GS40rajnighu:3716: vṛṣyaḥ pittānilaṃ hanti saṃgrāhī vraṇanāśanaḥ // Rajni_11.181
GS40rajnighu:3717: āmaṃ kapittham amloṣṇāṃ kaphaghnaṃ grāhi vātalam /
GS40rajnighu:3719: āmaṃ kaṇṭharujaṃ kapittham adhikaṃ jihvājaḍatvāvahaṃ tad doṣatrayavardhanaṃ viṣaharaṃ saṃgrāhakaṃ rocakam /
GS40rajnighu:3720: pakvaṃ śvāsavamiśramaklamaharaṃ hikkāpanodakṣamaṃ sarvaṃ grāhi rucipradaṃ ca kathitaṃ sevyaṃ tataḥ sarvadā // Rajni_11.183
GS40rajnighu:3721: tumbaruḥ saurabhaḥ sauro vanajaḥ sānujo dvijaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3723: sphuṭaphalaḥ sugandhiś ca sa prokto dvādaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.184
GS40rajnighu:3726: rudrākṣaś ca śivākṣaś ca śarvākṣo bhūtanāśanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3727: pāvano nīlakaṇṭhākṣo harākṣaś ca śivapriyaḥ // Rajni_11.186
GS40rajnighu:3728: rudrākṣam amlam uṣṇaṃ ca vātaghnaṃ kaphanāśanam /
GS40rajnighu:3730: bilvaḥ śalyo hṛdyagandhaḥ śalāṭuḥ śāṇḍilyaḥ syāc chrīphalaḥ karkaṭāhvaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3731: śailūṣaḥ syāc chaivapatraḥ śiveṣṭaḥ patraśreṣṭho gandhapatras tripattraḥ
GS40rajnighu:3732: lakṣmīphalo gandhaphalo durāruhas triśākapattras triśikhaḥ śivadrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3734: bilvas tu madhuro hṛdyaḥ kaṣāyaḥ pittajit guruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3737: phalaṃ tu komalaṃ snigdhaṃ guru saṃgrāhi dīpanam // Rajni_11.191
GS40rajnighu:3738: tad eva pakvaṃ vijñeyaṃ madhuraṃ sarasaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:3741: surabhir gajabhakṣyā ca suvahā gajavallabhā // Rajni_11.193
GS40rajnighu:3743: hṛdyā kuṇṭarikā caiva proktā tryasraphalā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3748: rucyas tu chedanīyaś ca jñeyo guḍaphalaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3749: proktaḥ kataphalas tiktamarīcaś ca navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.196
GS40rajnighu:3752: karkaṭaḥ kārkaṭaḥ karkaḥ kṣudradhātrī ca sa smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3753: kṣudrāmalakasaṃjñaś ca proktaḥ karkaphalaś ca ṣaṭ // Rajni_11.198
GS40rajnighu:3754: kārkaṭaṃ tu phalaṃ rucyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ dīpanaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:3755: kaphapittaharaṃ grāhi cakṣuṣyaṃ laghu śītalam // Rajni_11.199
GS40rajnighu:3759: śleṣmātakaḥ kaṭuhimo madhuraḥ kaṣāyaḥ svāduś ca pācanakaraḥ krimiśūlahārī /
GS40rajnighu:3763: laghuśītaḥ sūkṣmaphalo laghubhūtadrumaś ca saḥ // Rajni_11.202
GS40rajnighu:3766: muṣkako mocako muṣko mokṣako muñcakas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3767: gauliko mehanaś caiva kṣāravṛkṣaś ca pāṭaliḥ // Rajni_11.204
GS40rajnighu:3769: śvetaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca sa dvedhā syāt trayodaśasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_11.205
GS40rajnighu:3770: muṣkakaḥ kaṭuko 'mlaś ca rocanaḥ pācanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3773: avignaḥ pāṇimardaś ca kṛṣṇapākaphalo muniḥ // Rajni_11.207
GS40rajnighu:3779: tejaḥphalaḥ kaṭus tīkṣṇaḥ sugandhir dīpanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3785: vikaṇṭakaḥ kaṣāyaḥ syāt kaṭū rūkṣo rucipradaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3787: harītakī hemavatī jayābhayā śivāvyathā cetanikā ca rohiṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3788: pathyā prapathyāpi pūtanāmṛtā jīvapriyā jīvanikā bhiṣagvarā //
GS40rajnighu:3789: jīvantī prāṇadā jīvyā kāyasthā śreyasī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3790: devī divyā ca vijayā vahninetramitābhidhā // Rajni_11.215
GS40rajnighu:3791: harītakī pañcarasā ca recanī koṣṭhāmayaghnī lavaṇena varjitā /
GS40rajnighu:3792: rasāyanī netrarujāpahāriṇī tvagāmayaghnī kila yogavāhinī // Rajni_11.216
GS40rajnighu:3793: bījāsthitiktā madhurā tadantastvagbhāgataḥ sā kaṭur uṣṇavīryā /
GS40rajnighu:3794: māṃsāṃśataś cāmlakaṣāyayuktā harītakī pañcarasā smṛteyam // Rajni_11.217
GS40rajnighu:3796: tasyā nāmāni varṇāṃś ca vakṣyāmy atha yathākramam // Rajni_11.218
GS40rajnighu:3798: jīvantī cetakī ceti nāmnā saptavidhā matā // Rajni_11.219
GS40rajnighu:3800: svalpatvak pūtanā jñeyā sthūlamāṃsāmṛtā smṛtā // Rajni_11.220
GS40rajnighu:3802: tryasrāṃ tu cetakīṃ vidyād ity āsāṃ rūpalakṣaṇam // Rajni_11.221
GS40rajnighu:3803: vindhyādrau vijayā himācalabhavā syāc cetakī pūtanā sindhau syād atha rohiṇī tu vijayā jātā pratiṣṭhānake /
GS40rajnighu:3804: campāyām amṛtābhayā ca janitā deśe surāṣṭrāhvaye jīvantīti harītakī nigaditā saptaprabhedā budhaiḥ // Rajni_11.222
GS40rajnighu:3805: sarvaprayoge vijayā ca rohiṇī kṣateṣu lepeṣu tu pūtanoditā /
GS40rajnighu:3806: virecane syād amṛtā guṇādhikā jīvantikā syād iha jīrṇarogajit //
GS40rajnighu:3807: syāc cetakī sarvarujāpahārikā netrāmayaghnīm abhayāṃ vadanti /
GS40rajnighu:3808: itthaṃ yathāyogam iyaṃ prayojitā jñeyā guṇāḍhyā na kadācid anyathā //
GS40rajnighu:3809: cetakī ca dhṛtā haste yāvat tiṣṭhati dehinaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3810: tāvad viricyate vegāt tatprabhāvān na saṃśayaḥ // Rajni_11.225
GS40rajnighu:3811: saptānām api jātīnāṃ pradhānaṃ vijayā smṛtā /
GS40rajnighu:3813: kṣiptāpsu nimajjati yā sā jñeyā guṇavatī bhiṣagvaryaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3814: yasyā yasyā bhūyo nimajjanaṃ sā guṇāḍhyā syāt // Rajni_11.227
GS40rajnighu:3815: harate prasabhaṃ vyādhīn bhūyas tarati yad vapuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3816: harītakī tu sā proktā tatra kīrdīptivācakaḥ // Rajni_11.228
GS40rajnighu:3818: śoṣe navajvare jīrṇe gurviṇyāṃ naiva śasyate // Rajni_11.229
GS40rajnighu:3820: saṃvartakas tu vāsantaḥ kalkivṛkṣo vaheḍakaḥ // Rajni_11.230
GS40rajnighu:3822: bahuvīryaś ca kāsaghnaḥ sa proktaḥ ṣoḍaśāhvayaḥ // Rajni_11.231
GS40rajnighu:3824: cakṣuṣyaḥ palitaghnaś ca vipāke madhuro laghuḥ // Rajni_11.232
GS40rajnighu:3825: pūgas tu pūgavṛkṣaś ca kramuko dīrghapādapaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3826: valkatarur dṛḍhavalkaś cikkaṇaś ca munir mataḥ // Rajni_11.233
GS40rajnighu:3829: pūgaṃ tu cikkaṇī cikkā cikkaṇaṃ ślakṣṇakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3830: udvegaṃ kramukaphalaṃ jñeyaṃ pūgaphalaṃ vasu // Rajni_11.235
GS40rajnighu:3831: serī ca madhurā rucyā kaṣāyāmlā kaṭus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3832: pathyā ca kaphavātaghnī sārikā mukhadoṣanut // Rajni_11.236
GS40rajnighu:3834: tridoṣaśamanaṃ dīpyaṃ rasālaṃ pācanaṃ samam // Rajni_11.237
GS40rajnighu:3835: gaulyaṃ guhāgaraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ kaṣāyaṃ kaṭu pācanam /
GS40rajnighu:3838: malaviṣṭambhaśamanī pittahṛd dīpanī ca sā // Rajni_11.239
GS40rajnighu:3839: pūgīphalaṃ ceulasaṃjñakaṃ yat tat koṅkaṇeṣu prathitaṃ sugandhi /
GS40rajnighu:3840: śleṣmāpahaṃ dīpanapācanaṃ ca balapradaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ rasāḍhyam //
GS40rajnighu:3841: yat koṅkaṇe valligulābhidhānakaṃ grāmodbhavaṃ pūgaphalaṃ tridoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:3844: kaṭu svādu kaṣāyaṃ ca rucyaṃ dīpanapācanam /
GS40rajnighu:3846: vātajid vaktrajāḍyaghnam īṣad amlaṃ kaphāpaham // Rajni_11.242
GS40rajnighu:3847: pūgaṃ sammohakṛt sarvaṃ kaṣāyaṃ svādu recanam /
GS40rajnighu:3849: āmaṃ pūgaṃ kaṣāyaṃ mukhamalaśamanaṃ kaṇṭhaśuddhiṃ vidhatte raktāmaśleṣmapittapraśamanam udarādhmānahāraṃ saraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3850: śuṣkaṃ kaṇṭhāmayaghnaṃ rucikaram uditaṃ pācanaṃ recanaṃ syāt tat parṇenāyutaṃ cet jhaṭiti vitanute pāṇḍuvātaṃ ca śoṣam // Rajni_11.244
GS40rajnighu:3851: atha bhavati nāgavallī tāmbūlī phaṇilatā ca saptaśirā /
GS40rajnighu:3852: parṇalatā phaṇivallī bhujagalatā bhakṣyapatrī ca // Rajni_11.245
GS40rajnighu:3854: kaphakāsaharā rucyā dāhakṛd dīpanī parā // Rajni_11.246
GS40rajnighu:3856: ekāpy eṣā deśamṛtsnāviśeṣān nānākāraṃ yāti kāye guṇe ca // Rajni_11.247
GS40rajnighu:3858: rasāḍhyā surasā rucyā vipāke śiśirā smṛtā // Rajni_11.248
GS40rajnighu:3859: syād amlavāṭī kaṭukāmlatiktā tīkṣṇā tathoṣṇā mukhapākakartrī /
GS40rajnighu:3860: vidāhapittāsravikopanī ca viṣṭambhadā vātanibarhaṇī ca // Rajni_11.249
GS40rajnighu:3861: satasā madhurā tīkṣṇā kaṭur uṣṇā ca pācanī /
GS40rajnighu:3865: nāmnānyāmlasarā sutīkṣṇamadhurā rucyā himā dāhanut pittodrekaharā sudīpanakarī balyā mukhāmodinī
GS40rajnighu:3866: strīsaubhāgyavivardhanī madakarī rājñāṃ sadā vallabhā gulmādhmānavibandhajic ca kathitā sā mālave tu sthitā // Rajni_11.252
GS40rajnighu:3867: andhre paṭulikā nāma kaṣāyoṣṇā kaṭus tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3869: hvesaṇīyā kaṭus tīkṣṇā hṛdyā dīrghadalā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:3871: sadyas troṭitabhakṣitaṃ mukharujājāḍyāvahaṃ doṣakṛt dāhārocakaraktadāyi malakṛd viṣṭambhi vāntipradam /
GS40rajnighu:3872: yad bhūyo jalapānapoṣitarasaṃ tac cec cirāt troṭitaṃ tāmbūlīdalam uttamaṃ ca rucikṛd varṇyaṃ tridoṣārtinut // Rajni_11.255
GS40rajnighu:3873: kṛṣṇaṃ parṇaṃ tiktam uṣṇaṃ kaṣāyaṃ dhatte dāhaṃ vaktrajādyaṃ malaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:3874: śubhraṃ parṇaṃ śleṣmavātāmayaghnaṃ pathyaṃ rucyaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca //
GS40rajnighu:3875: śirā parṇasya śaithilyaṃ kuryāt tasyāsrahṛd rasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3876: śīrṇaṃ tvagdoṣadaṃ tasya bhakṣite ca śitaṃ sadā // Rajni_11.257
GS40rajnighu:3877: anidhāya mukhe parṇaṃ pūgaṃ khādāta yo naraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3878: matibhraṃśo daridraḥ syād ante smarati no harim // Rajni_11.258
GS40rajnighu:3879: parṇādhikye dīpanī raṅgadātrī pūgādhikye rūkṣadā kṛcchradātrī /
GS40rajnighu:3880: sārādhikye khādire śoṣadātrī cūrṇādhikye pittakṛt pūtigandhā //
GS40rajnighu:3881: cūrṇaṃ cārjunavṛkṣajaṃ kaphaharaṃ gulmaghnam arkāhvayaṃ śophaghnaṃ kuṭajaṃ karañjajanitaṃ vātāpahaṃ rucyadam /
GS40rajnighu:3882: pittaghnaṃ jalajaṃ balāgnirucidaṃ śailāhvayaṃ pittadaṃ sphāṭikyaṃ dṛḍhadantapaṅktijananaṃ śuktyādijaṃ rūkṣadam // Rajni_11.260
GS40rajnighu:3884: vargaṃ vaktrāmburuhavalabhīlāsyalīlārasālaṃ vidyāvaidyaḥ khalu saphalayed etam āmnāyabhūmnā yāny upabhuñjānānāṃ sa bhavati saṃsārapādapaḥ saphalaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3885: teṣām eṣa phalānāṃ vargaḥ phalavarga iti kathitaḥ // Rajni_11.262
GS40rajnighu:3886: yasyājasravikasvarāmalayaśaḥprāgbhārapuṣpodgamaḥ sāścaryaṃ vibudhepsitāni phalati śrīmān karaḥ svardrumaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3887: Rājanighaṇṭu, Candanādivarga śrīkhaṇḍaṃ śabaraṃ pītaṃ patrāṅgaṃ raktacandanam /
GS40rajnighu:3888: barbaraṃ harigandhaṃ ca candanaṃ saptadhā smṛtam // Rajni_12.1
GS40rajnighu:3889: devadāru dvidhā proktaṃ cīḍā saptacchadas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:3890: saralaḥ kuṅkume kaṅguḥ kastūrī rocanā tathā // Rajni_12.2
GS40rajnighu:3891: karpūrau syāj javādis tu nandī ca jātipatrikā /
GS40rajnighu:3892: jātīphalaṃ ca kakkolaṃ lavaṅgaṃ svādur ucyate // Rajni_12.3
GS40rajnighu:3893: agarvyaś ca tridhā māṃsī turuṣko guggulus tridhā /
GS40rajnighu:3894: rālaḥ kundurukaḥ kuṣṭhaṃ sārivā tu dvidhā nakhau // Rajni_12.4
GS40rajnighu:3899: gośīrṣaṃ tilaparṇaṃ ca maṅgalyaṃ malayodbhavam // Rajni_12.6
GS40rajnighu:3900: gandharājaṃ sugandhaṃ ca sarpāvāsaṃ ca śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:3904: vṛṣyaṃ vaktrarujāpahaṃ pratanute kāntiṃ tanor dehināṃ liptaṃ suptamanojasindhuramadārambhādisaṃrambhadam śreṣṭhaṃ koṭarakarparopakalitaṃ sugranthi sadgauravaṃ chede raktamayaṃ tathā ca vimalaṃ pītaṃ ca yad dharṣaṇe /
GS40rajnighu:3905: svāde tiktakaṭuḥ sugandhabahulaṃ śītaṃ yad alpaṃ guṇe kṣīṇaṃ cārdhaguṇānvitaṃ tu kathitaṃ tac candanaṃ madhyamam // Rajni_12.9
GS40rajnighu:3907: beṭṭaṃ tu sārdravicchedaṃ svayaṃ śuṣkaṃ tu sukvaḍi // Rajni_12.10
GS40rajnighu:3909: tajjātaṃ candanaṃ yat tu beṭṭavācyaṃ kvacin mate // Rajni_12.11
GS40rajnighu:3913: śaityasugandhadaṃ cārdraṃ śuṣkaṃ lepe tadanyathā // Rajni_12.13
GS40rajnighu:3915: vanyaṃ ca gandhakāṣṭhaṃ kirātakāntaṃ ca śailagandhaṃ ca // Rajni_12.14
GS40rajnighu:3916: kairātam uṣṇaṃ kaṭuśītalaṃ ca śleṣmānilaghnaṃ śramapittahāri /
GS40rajnighu:3923: patrāḍhyaṃ paṭṭarāgaṃ ca bhāryāvṛkṣaś ca raktakaḥ // Rajni_12.18
GS40rajnighu:3925: paṭṭarañjanakaṃ caiva suraṅgaṃ ca caturdaśa // Rajni_12.19
GS40rajnighu:3926: patrāṅgaṃ kaṭukaṃ rūkṣam amlaṃ śītaṃ tu gaulyakam /
GS40rajnighu:3928: raktacandanam idaṃ ca lohitaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca haricandanaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:3929: raktasāram atha tāmrasārakaṃ kṣudracandanam athārkacandanam // Rajni_12.21
GS40rajnighu:3933: śītaṃ sugandhi pittāri surabhi ceti saptadhā // Rajni_12.23
GS40rajnighu:3937: divijaṃ ca mahāgandhaṃ nandanajaṃ lohitaṃ ca navasaṃjñam // Rajni_12.25
GS40rajnighu:3938: haricandanaṃ tu divyaṃ tiktahimaṃ tad iha durlabhaṃ manujaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3941: bhidyante kiṃtu gandhena tatrādyaṃ guṇavattaram // Rajni_12.27
GS40rajnighu:3942: devadāru suradāru dārukaṃ snigdhadārur amarādidāru ca /
GS40rajnighu:3943: bhadradāru śivadāru śāmbhavaṃ bhūtahāri bhavadāru rudravat // Rajni_12.28
GS40rajnighu:3949: bhūtadoṣāpahaṃ dhatte liptam aṅgeṣu kālikam // Rajni_12.31
GS40rajnighu:3951: dvitīyaṃ kāṣṭhadāru syād dvayor nāmāny abhedataḥ // Rajni_12.32
GS40rajnighu:3952: cīḍā ca dārugandhā gandhavadhūr gandhamādanī taruṇī /
GS40rajnighu:3953: tārā ca bhūtamārī maṅgalyā tu kapāṭinī grahabhītijit /
GS40rajnighu:3954: cīḍā kaṭūṣṇā kāsaghnī kaphajid dīpanī parā /
GS40rajnighu:3962: saralas tu pūtikāṣṭhaṃ tumbī pītadrur utthito dīpataruḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3963: sa snigdhadārusaṃjñaḥ snigdho mārīcapatrako navadhā // Rajni_12.37
GS40rajnighu:3966: jñeyaṃ kuṅkumam agnisekharam asṛk kāśmīrajaṃ pītakaṃ kāśmīraṃ rudhiraṃ varaṃ ca piśunaṃ raktaṃ śaṭhaṃ śoṇitam /
GS40rajnighu:3967: vāhlīkaṃ ghusṛṇaṃ vareṇyam aruṇaṃ kāleyakaṃ jāguḍaṃ kāntaṃ vahniśikhaṃ ca kesaravaraṃ gauraṃ karākṣīritam // Rajni_12.39
GS40rajnighu:3970: tṛṇakuṅkumaṃ tṛṇāsraṃ gandhitṛṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ ca tṛṇapuṣpam /
GS40rajnighu:3971: gandhādhikaṃ tṛṇotthaṃ tṛṇagauraṃ lohitaṃ ca navasaṃjñam // Rajni_12.41
GS40rajnighu:3975: gaurī govandanī vṛttā kārambhā kaṅgu kaṅgunī // Rajni_12.43
GS40rajnighu:3977: śubhā pītā ca maṅgalyā śreyasī cāṅkabhūmitā // Rajni_12.44
GS40rajnighu:3981: vedhamukhyā ca mārjārī subhagā bahugandhadā // Rajni_12.46
GS40rajnighu:3987: kapilā piṅgalā kṛṣṇā kastūrī trividhā kramāt /
GS40rajnighu:3988: nepāle 'pi ca kāśmīre kāmarūpe ca jāyate // Rajni_12.49
GS40rajnighu:3989: sāpy ekā kharikā tataś ca tilakā jñeyā kulitthāparā piṇḍānyāpi ca nāyiketi ca parā yā pañcabhedābhidhā
GS40rajnighu:3990: sā śuddhā mṛganābhitaḥ kramavaśād eṣā kṣitīśocitā pakṣatyādidinatrayeṣu janitā kastūrikā stūyate cūrṇākṛtis tu kharikā tilakā tilābhā kaulatthabījasadṛśī ca kulitthakā ca
GS40rajnighu:3991: sthūlā tataḥ kiyad iyaṃ kila piṇḍikākhyā tasyāś ca kiṃcid adhikā yadi nāyikā sā // Rajni_12.51
GS40rajnighu:3992: svāde tiktā piñjarā ketakīnāṃ gandhaṃ dhatte lāghavaṃ tolane ca /
GS40rajnighu:3993: yāpsu nyastā naiva vaivarṇyam īyāt kastūrī sā rājabhogyāpraśastā //
GS40rajnighu:3994: yā gandhaṃ ketakīnām apaharati madaṃ sindhurāṇāṃ ca varṇe svāde tiktā kaṭur vā laghur atha tulitā marditā cikkaṇā syāt /
GS40rajnighu:3995: dāhaṃ yā naiti vahnau śimiśimiti ciraṃ carmagandhā hutāśe sā kastūrī praśastā varamṛgatanujā rājate rājabhogyā // Rajni_12.53
GS40rajnighu:3996: bāle jarati ca hariṇe kṣīṇe rogiṇi ca mandagandhayutā /
GS40rajnighu:3997: kāmāture ca taruṇe kastūrī bahulaparimalā bhavati // Rajni_12.54
GS40rajnighu:3998: yā snigdhā dhūmagandhā vahati vinihitā pītatāṃ pāthaso 'ntar niḥśeṣaṃ yā niviṣṭā bhavati hutavahe bhasmasād eva sadyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:3999: yā ca nyastā tulāyāṃ kalayati gurutāṃ marditā rūkṣatāṃ ca jñeyā kastūrikeyaṃ khalu kṛtamatibhiḥ kṛtrimā naiva sevyā // Rajni_12.55
GS40rajnighu:4000: śuddho vā malino 'stu vā mṛgamadaḥ kiṃ jātam etāvatā ko 'py asyānavadhiś camatkṛtinidhiḥ saurabhyam eko guṇaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4001: yenāsau smaramaṇḍanaikavasatir bhāle kapole gale dormūle kucamaṇḍale ca kurute saṅgaṃ kuraṅgīdṛśām gorocanā ruciḥ śobhā rucirā śobhanā śubhā /
GS40rajnighu:4002: gaurī ca rocanā piṅgā maṅgalyā piṅgalā śivā // Rajni_12.57
GS40rajnighu:4003: pītā ca gautamī gavyā vandanīyā ca kāñcanī /
GS40rajnighu:4004: medhyā manoramā śyāmā rāmā bhūmikarāhvayā // Rajni_12.58
GS40rajnighu:4005: gorocanā ca śiśirā viṣadoṣahantrī rucyā ca pācanakarī krimikuṣṭhahantrī /
GS40rajnighu:4006: bhūtagrahopaśamanaṃ kurute ca pathyā śṛṅgāramaṅgalakarī janamohinī ca //
GS40rajnighu:4007: karpūro ghanasārakaḥ sitakaraḥ śītaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ śilā śītāṃśur himavālukā himakaraḥ śītaprabhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4009: potāso bhīmasenas tadanu sitakaraḥ śaṃkarāvāsasaṃjñaḥ prāṃśuḥ piñjo
GS40rajnighu:4011: paścād asyās tuṣāras tadupari sahimaḥ śītalaḥ pakvikānyā karpūrasyeti bhedā guṇarasamahasāṃ vaidyadṛśyena dṛśyāḥ // Rajni_12.61
GS40rajnighu:4013: cirastho dāhadoṣaghnaḥ sa dhautaḥ śubhakṛt paraḥ // Rajni_12.62
GS40rajnighu:4014: śiro madhyaṃ talaṃ ceti karpūras trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4015: śiraḥ stambhāgrasaṃjātaṃ madhyaṃ parṇatale talam // Rajni_12.63
GS40rajnighu:4017: sāmānyapulakaṃ svacchaṃ tale cūrṇaṃ tu gaurakam // Rajni_12.64
GS40rajnighu:4019: svaccham īṣat haridrābhaṃ śubhraṃ tan madhyamaṃ smṛtam sudṛḍhaṃ śubhrarūkṣaṃ ca pulakaṃ bāhyajaṃ vadet // Rajni_12.65
GS40rajnighu:4020: svacchaṃ bhṛṅgārapattraṃ laghutaraviśadaṃ tolane tiktakaṃ cet svāde śaityaṃ suhṛdyaṃ bahalaparimalāmodasaurabhyadāyi
GS40rajnighu:4021: niḥsnehaṃ dārḍhyapattraṃ śubhataram iti cet rājayogyaṃ praśastaṃ karpūraṃ cānyathā ced bahutaram aśane sphoṭadāyi vraṇāya // Rajni_12.66
GS40rajnighu:4023: meghasāras tuṣāraś ca dvīpakarpūrajaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_12.67
GS40rajnighu:4029: saugandhikaṃ javādi syāt snigdhaṃ coṣṇaṃ sukhāvaham /
GS40rajnighu:4030: vāte hitaṃ ca rājñāṃ ca mohanāhlādakāraṇam // Rajni_12.70
GS40rajnighu:4031: javādi nīlaṃ sasnigdham īṣat pītaṃ sugandhadam /
GS40rajnighu:4032: ātape bahulāmodaṃ rājñāṃ yogyaṃ na cānyathā // Rajni_12.71
GS40rajnighu:4033: tūṇīkas tūṇikas tūṇī pītakaḥ kacchapas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4034: nandī kurakaḥ kānto nandīvṛkṣo navāhvayaḥ // Rajni_12.72
GS40rajnighu:4042: majjāsāraṃ jātisāraṃ puṭaṃ ca sumanaḥphalam // Rajni_12.76
GS40rajnighu:4044: vātātisāramehaghnaṃ laghu vṛṣyaṃ ca dīpanam // Rajni_12.77
GS40rajnighu:4047: kaṅkolaṃ kaṭphalaṃ proktaṃ mārīcaṃ rudrasaṃmitam // Rajni_12.78
GS40rajnighu:4053: puṣpakaṃ candanādi syāt jñeyaṃ trayodaśāhvayam // Rajni_12.81
GS40rajnighu:4056: lavaṃgaṃ soṣṇakaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vipāke madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4058: svādus tv agarusāraḥ syāt sudhūmyo gandhadhūmajaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4063: kṛṣṇāgaru kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca tiktaṃ lepe ca śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:4064: pāne pittaharaṃ kiṃcit tridoṣaghnam udāhṛtam // Rajni_12.86
GS40rajnighu:4066: anāryakam asāraṃ ca kṛmijagdhaṃ ca kāṣṭhakam // Rajni_12.87
GS40rajnighu:4067: kāṣṭhāgaru kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca lepe rūkṣaṃ kaphāpaham // Rajni_12.88
GS40rajnighu:4068: dāhāgaru dahanāgaru dāhakakāṣṭhaṃ ca vahnikāṣṭhaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4069: dhūpāgaru tailāgaru puraṃ ca puramathanavallabhaṃ caiva // Rajni_12.89
GS40rajnighu:4070: dāhāgaru kaṭukoṣṇaṃ keśānāṃ vardhanaṃ ca varṇyaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4071: apanayati keśadoṣān ātanute saṃtataṃ ca saugandhyam // Rajni_12.90
GS40rajnighu:4074: māṃsī tu jaṭilā peśī kravyādī piśitā miśī /
GS40rajnighu:4075: keśinī ca jaṭā hiṃsrā jaṭāmāṃsī ca māṃsinī // Rajni_12.92
GS40rajnighu:4077: mātā bhūtajaṭā caiva jananī ca jaṭāvatī /
GS40rajnighu:4081: dvitīyā gandhamāṃsī ca keśī bhūtajaṭā smṛtā /
GS40rajnighu:4082: piśācī pūtanā caiva bhūtakeśī ca lomaśā /
GS40rajnighu:4083: jaṭālā laghumāṃsī ca khyātā cāṅkamitāhvayā // Rajni_12.95
GS40rajnighu:4087: sevālī sūkṣmapattrī ca gaurī parvatavāsinī // Rajni_12.97
GS40rajnighu:4091: sihlakaḥ sihlasāraś ca pītasāraḥ kapis tathā // Rajni_12.99
GS40rajnighu:4094: turuṣkaḥ surabhis tiktaḥ kaṭusnigdhaś ca kuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:4097: jaṭālaḥ kālaniryāsaḥ pūro bhūtaharaḥ śivaḥ // Rajni_12.102
GS40rajnighu:4100: divyas tu mahiṣākṣaś ca nāmāny etāni viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_12.103
GS40rajnighu:4104: kanako vaṃśapotaś ca surasaś ca palaṃkaṣaḥ // Rajni_12.105
GS40rajnighu:4111: umāpriyaś ca bhūtaghno medhyaḥ saurabhyadaḥ sadā // Rajni_12.108
GS40rajnighu:4113: lalanaḥ śālaniryāso deveṣṭaḥ śītalas tathā // Rajni_12.109
GS40rajnighu:4116: kālaḥ kalalajaḥ prokto nāmnā saptadaśāṅkitaḥ // Rajni_12.110
GS40rajnighu:4117: rālas tu śiśiraḥ snigdhaḥ kaṣāyas tiktasaṃgrahaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4120: gopurako bahugandhaḥ pālindo bhīṣaṇaś ca daśasaṃjñaḥ // Rajni_12.111
GS40rajnighu:4122: pāne lepe ca śiśiraḥ pradarāmayaśāntikṛt // Rajni_12.112
GS40rajnighu:4124: rāmaṃ vānīrajaṃ vāpyaṃ jñeyaṃ tvagdoṣam utpalam /
GS40rajnighu:4125: kutsaṃ ca pāṭavaṃ caiva padmakaṃ manusaṃjñakam // Rajni_12.113
GS40rajnighu:4131: bhadrā candanagopā tu candanā kṛṣṇavally api // Rajni_12.116
GS40rajnighu:4134: nakhaḥ kararuhaḥ śilpī śuktiḥ śaṅkhaḥ khuraḥ śaphaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4135: valaḥ kośī ca karajo hanur nāgahanus tathā // Rajni_12.118
GS40rajnighu:4138: nakhaḥ syād uṣṇakaṭuko viṣaṃ hanti prayojitaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4141: cakrī cakranakhas tryasraḥ kālo vyāghranakhaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_12.121
GS40rajnighu:4143: vyālāyudho vyālabalo vyālakhaḍgaś ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_12.122
GS40rajnighu:4145: kuṣṭhakaṇḍūvraṇaghnaś ca varṇyaḥ saugandhyadaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_12.123
GS40rajnighu:4146: spṛkkā ca devī piśunā vadhūś ca koṭir manur brāhmaṇikā sugandhā /
GS40rajnighu:4147: samudrakāntā kuṭilā tathā ca mālālikā bhūtalikā ca laghvī // Rajni_12.124
GS40rajnighu:4149: pañcaguptir asṛk proktā nakhapuṣpī ca viṃśatiḥ // Rajni_12.125
GS40rajnighu:4152: sthauṇeyakaṃ barhiśikhaṃ śukacchadaṃ mayūracūḍaṃ śukapucchakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4153: vikīrṇaromāpi ca kīravarṇakaṃ vikarṇasaṃjñaṃ haritaṃ navāhvayam //
GS40rajnighu:4157: surabhir bhūrigandhā ca kuṭī gandhakuṭī tathā // Rajni_12.129
GS40rajnighu:4158: murā tiktā kaṭuḥ śītā kaṣāyā kaphapittahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4161: sthaviraṃ palitaṃ jīrṇaṃ tathā kālānusāryakam // Rajni_12.131
GS40rajnighu:4166: corakaḥ śaṅkitaś caṇḍā duṣpattraḥ kṣemako ripuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4167: capalaḥ kitavo dhūrtaḥ paṭur nīco niśācaraḥ // Rajni_12.134
GS40rajnighu:4173: padmakaṃ pītakaṃ pītaṃ mālayaṃ śītalaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4175: padmakāṣṭhaṃ padmavṛkṣaṃ proktaṃ syād dvādaśāhvayam // Rajni_12.137
GS40rajnighu:4179: pauṇḍaryaṃ ca supuṣpaṃ ca sānujaṃ cānujaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_12.139
GS40rajnighu:4182: lāmajjakaṃ sunālaṃ syād amṛṇālaṃ lavaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:4186: māṃsarohiṇy atiruhā vṛttā carmakaṣā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4187: vikasā māṃsarohī ca jñeyā māṃsaruhā muniḥ // Rajni_12.143
GS40rajnighu:4196: śrīvāsaḥ śrīraso veṣṭo lakṣmīveṣṭas tu veṣṭakaḥ // Rajni_12.147
GS40rajnighu:4198: dhūpāṅgas tilaparṇaś ca saralāṅgo 'pi ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_12.148
GS40rajnighu:4202: mṛṇālam abhayaṃ vīraṃ vīraṇaṃ samagandhikam // Rajni_12.150
GS40rajnighu:4208: nalikā vidrumalatikā kapotabāṇā nalī ca nirmathyā /
GS40rajnighu:4209: suṣirā dhamanī stutyā raktadalā nartakī naṭī rudrāḥ // Rajni_12.153
GS40rajnighu:4210: nalikā tiktakaṭukā tīkṣṇā ca madhurā himā /
GS40rajnighu:4213: vargaṃ vaktrāmbhoruhamodārham adhīyāthainaṃ madhye saṃsad asau dīvyatu vaidyaḥ // Rajni_12.155
GS40rajnighu:4214: ye gandhayanti sakalāni ca bhūtalāni lokāṃś ca ye 'pi sukhayanti ca gandhalubdhān /
GS40rajnighu:4215: teṣām ayaṃ malayajādisugandhināmnāṃ bhūr gandhavarga iti viśrutim eti vargaḥ // Rajni_12.156
GS40rajnighu:4216: yasyoccaiś caritāni śītasurabhīṇy abhyasya satyātmano duścāritrajanā niṣaṅgajanitaṃ drāg dauḥstham āsthan svakam tasyāyaṃ kṛtinaḥ kṛtau narahareḥ śrīcandanādiḥ sthitiṃ vargo vāñchati nāmanaigamaśikhābhūṣāmaṇau dvādaśaḥ // Rajni_12.157
GS40rajnighu:4217: Rājanighaṇṭu, Suvarṇādivarga trisvarṇaraupyatāmrāṇi trapu sīsaṃ dvirītikā /
GS40rajnighu:4218: kāṃsyāyo vartakaṃ kāntaṃ kiṭṭaṃ muṇḍaṃ ca tīkṣṇakam // Rajni_13.1
GS40rajnighu:4220: tuvarī haritālaṃ ca gandhakaṃ ca śilājatu // Rajni_13.2
GS40rajnighu:4223: sphaṭī ca kṣullakaḥ śaṅkhau kapardaḥ śuktikā dvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:4224: khaṭinī dugdhapāṣāṇo maṇiś ca karpūrādyakaḥ // Rajni_13.4
GS40rajnighu:4225: sikatā ca dvikaṅguṣṭhaṃ vimalā ca dvidhā matā /
GS40rajnighu:4227: atha ratnaṃ navaṃ vakṣye padmarāgādikaṃ kramāt // Rajni_13.5
GS40rajnighu:4229: vajraṃ ca nīlaṃ ca nava krameṇa gomedavaiḍūryayutāni tāni // Rajni_13.6
GS40rajnighu:4231: rājāvartaḥ perojaṃ syād ubhau bāṇāś ca saṃkhyayā // Rajni_13.7
GS40rajnighu:4238: svarṇaṃ snigdhakaṣāyatiktamadhuraṃ doṣatrayadhvaṃsanaṃ śītaṃ svādu rasāyanaṃ ca rucikṛc cakṣuṣyam āyuṣpradam /
GS40rajnighu:4239: prajñāvīryabalasmṛtisvarakaraṃ kāntiṃ vidhatte tanoḥ saṃdhatte duritakṣayaṃ śriyam idaṃ dhatte nṝṇāṃ dhāraṇāt // Rajni_13.11
GS40rajnighu:4240: dāhe ca raktam atha yac ca sitaṃ chidāyāṃ kāśmīrakānti ca vibhāti nikāṣapaṭṭe /
GS40rajnighu:4241: snigdhaṃ ca gauravam upaiti ca yat tulāyāṃ jātyā tad eva kanakaṃ mṛdu raktapītam // Rajni_13.12
GS40rajnighu:4242: tac caikaṃ rasavedhajaṃ tad aparaṃ jātaṃ svayaṃ bhūmijaṃ kiṃcānyad bahulohasaṃkarabhavaṃ ceti tridhā kāñcanam /
GS40rajnighu:4243: tatrādyaṃ kila pītaraktam aparaṃ raktaṃ tato 'nyat tathā mairālaṃ tad
GS40rajnighu:4244: atikrameṇa tad idaṃ syāt pūrvapūrvottamam // Rajni_13.13
GS40rajnighu:4246: śvetakaṃ tu mahāśubhraṃ rajataṃ taptarūpakam // Rajni_13.14
GS40rajnighu:4248: kupyaṃ dhautaṃ tathā saudhaṃ candrahāsaṃ munīndukam // Rajni_13.15
GS40rajnighu:4249: raupyaṃ snigdhaṃ kaṣāyāmlaṃ vipāke madhuraṃ saram /
GS40rajnighu:4251: dāhacchedanikāṣeṣu sitaṃ snigdhaṃ ca yad guru /
GS40rajnighu:4252: sugharṣe 'pi ca varṇāḍhyam uttamaṃ tad udīritam // Rajni_13.17
GS40rajnighu:4255: raktaṃ nepālakaṃ caiva raktadhātuḥ karendudhā // Rajni_13.18
GS40rajnighu:4256: tāmraṃ supakvaṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ tiktaṃ vipāke kaṭu śītalaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4260: trapu trapusamāṇḍūkaṃ vaṅgaṃ ca madhuraṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4261: kurūpyaṃ piccaṭaṃ raṅgaṃ pūtigandhaṃ daśāhvayam // Rajni_13.21
GS40rajnighu:4262: trapusaṃ kaṭutiktahimaṃ kaṣāyalavaṇaṃ saraṃ ca mehaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4263: krimidāhapāṇḍuśamanaṃ kāntikaraṃ tad rasāyanaṃ caiva // Rajni_13.22
GS40rajnighu:4264: śvetaṃ laghu mṛdu svacchaṃ snigdham uṣṇāpahaṃ himam /
GS40rajnighu:4265: sūtapattrakaraṃ kāntaṃ trapu śreṣṭham udāhṛtam // Rajni_13.23
GS40rajnighu:4266: sīsakaṃ tu jaḍaṃ sīsaṃ yavaneṣṭaṃ bhujaṃgamam /
GS40rajnighu:4269: sirāvṛttaṃ ca vaṅgaṃ syāc cīnapiṣṭaṃ ca ṣoḍaśa // Rajni_13.25
GS40rajnighu:4271: uṣṇaṃ ca kaphavātaghnam arśoghnaṃ guru lekhanam // Rajni_13.26
GS40rajnighu:4272: svarṇe nīlaṃ mṛdu snigdhaṃ nirmalaṃ ca sugauratvam /
GS40rajnighu:4273: raupyasaṃśodhanaṃ kṣipraṃ sīsakaṃ ca tad uttamam // Rajni_13.27
GS40rajnighu:4274: rītiḥ kṣudrasuvarṇaṃ siṃhalakaṃ piṅgalaṃ ca pittalakam /
GS40rajnighu:4275: lauhitakam ārakuṭṭaṃ piṅgalalohaṃ ca pītakaṃ navadhā // Rajni_13.28
GS40rajnighu:4277: brāhmaṇī brahmarītiś ca kapilā piṅgalāpi ca // Rajni_13.29
GS40rajnighu:4280: śuddhā snigdhā mṛduḥ śītā suraṅgā sūtrapattriṇī /
GS40rajnighu:4281: hemopamā śubhā svacchā janyā rītiḥ prakīrtitā // Rajni_13.31
GS40rajnighu:4283: dīptaṃ lohaṃ ghorapuṣpaṃ dīptakaṃ sumanāhvayam // Rajni_13.32
GS40rajnighu:4284: kāṃsyaṃ tu tiktam uṣṇaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ vātakaphavikāraghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4285: rūkṣaṃ kaṣāyarucyaṃ laghu dīpanapācanaṃ pathyam // Rajni_13.33
GS40rajnighu:4286: śvetaṃ dīptaṃ mṛdu jyotiḥ śabdāḍhyaṃ snigdhanirmalam /
GS40rajnighu:4289: nīlikā nīlalohaṃ ca lohajaṃ vaṭṭalohakam // Rajni_13.35
GS40rajnighu:4290: idaṃ lohaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca tiktaṃ ca śiśiraṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4293: kāntāyasaṃ kṛṣṇalohaṃ mahālohaṃ ca saptadhā // Rajni_13.37
GS40rajnighu:4294: syād bhrāmakaṃ tadanu cumbakaromakākhyaṃ syāc chedakākhyam iti tac ca caturvidhaṃ syāt /
GS40rajnighu:4298: na sūtena vinā kāntaṃ na kāntena vinā rasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4300: lohakiṭṭaṃ tu kiṭṭaṃ syāl lohacūrṇam ayomalam /
GS40rajnighu:4301: lohajaṃ kṛṣṇacūrṇaṃ ca kārṣṇyaṃ lohamalaṃ tathā // Rajni_13.41
GS40rajnighu:4305: aśmajaṃ kṛṣilohaṃ ca āraṃ kṛṣṇāyasaṃ nava // Rajni_13.43
GS40rajnighu:4306: tīkṣṇaṃ śastrāyasaṃ śastraṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍāyasaṃ śaṭham /
GS40rajnighu:4307: āyasaṃ niśitaṃ tīvraṃ lohakhaḍgaṃ ca muṇḍajam /
GS40rajnighu:4311: svarṇaṃ samyagaśodhitaṃ śramakaraṃ svedāvahaṃ duḥsahaṃ raupyaṃ jāṭharajāḍyamāndyajananaṃ tāmraṃ vamibhrāntidam /
GS40rajnighu:4312: nāgaṃ ca trapu cāṅgadoṣadam ayo gulmādidoṣapradaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ śūlakaraṃ ca kāntam uditaṃ kārṣṇyāmayasphoṭadam viśuddhihīnau yadi muṇḍatīkṣṇau kṣudhāpahau gauravagulmadāyakau /
GS40rajnighu:4314: manaḥśilā syāt kunaṭī manojñā śilā manohvāpi ca nāgajihvā /
GS40rajnighu:4315: nepālikā syān manasaś ca guptā kalyāṇikā rogaśilā daśāhvā // Rajni_13.48
GS40rajnighu:4318: sindūraṃ nāgareṇuḥ syād raktaṃ sīmantakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4319: nāgajaṃ nāgagarbhaṃ ca śoṇaṃ vīrarajaḥ smṛtam // Rajni_13.50
GS40rajnighu:4321: saubhāgyam aruṇaṃ caiva maṅgalyaṃ manusaṃmitam // Rajni_13.51
GS40rajnighu:4324: suraṅgo 'gnisahaḥ sūkṣmaḥ snigdhaḥ svaccho gurur mṛduḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4327: kṣitijaḥ kṣitijantuś ca bhūmijo raktatuṇḍakaḥ // Rajni_13.54
GS40rajnighu:4329: rasasya jāraṇe tūktaṃ tat sattvaṃ tu rasāyanam // Rajni_13.55
GS40rajnighu:4330: hiṅgulaṃ barbaraṃ raktaṃ suraṅgaṃ sugaraṃ smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:4331: rañjanaṃ daradaṃ mlecchaṃ citrāṅgaṃ cūrṇapāradam // Rajni_13.56
GS40rajnighu:4332: anyac ca mārakaṃ caiva maṇirāgaṃ rasodbhavam /
GS40rajnighu:4337: dhātuḥ suraṅgadhātuś ca girijaṃ girimṛdbhavam // Rajni_13.59
GS40rajnighu:4339: saṃdhyābhraṃ babhrudhātuś ca śilādhātuḥ ṣaḍāhvayam // Rajni_13.60
GS40rajnighu:4342: tuvarī mṛc ca saurāṣṭrī mṛtsnā saṅgā surāṣṭrajā /
GS40rajnighu:4344: stutyā kāṅkṣī sujātā ca jñeyā caiva caturdaśa // Rajni_13.62
GS40rajnighu:4347: haritālaṃ godantaṃ pītaṃ naṭamaṇḍanaṃ ca gauraṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4348: citrāṅgaṃ piñjarakaṃ bhaved ālaṃ tālakaṃ ca tālaṃ ca // Rajni_13.64
GS40rajnighu:4349: kanakarasaṃ kāñcanakaṃ biḍālakaṃ caiva citragandhaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4350: piṅgaṃ ca piṅgasāraṃ gaurīlalitaṃ ca saptadaśasaṃjñam // Rajni_13.65
GS40rajnighu:4354: pūtigandho 'tigandhaś ca vaṭaḥ saugandhikas tathā // Rajni_13.67
GS40rajnighu:4355: sugandho divyagandhaś ca gandhaś ca rasagandhakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4356: kuṣṭhāriḥ krūragandhaś ca kīṭaghnaḥ śarabhūmitaḥ // Rajni_13.68
GS40rajnighu:4359: śveto raktaś ca pītaś ca nīlaś ceti caturvidhaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4360: gandhako varṇato jñeyo bhinno bhinnaguṇāśrayaḥ // Rajni_13.70
GS40rajnighu:4363: śilājatu syād aśmotthaṃ śailaṃ girijam aśmajam /
GS40rajnighu:4365: śilājatu bhavet tiktaṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca rasāyanam /
GS40rajnighu:4369: kṣaudreyaṃ pītarāgaṃ ca snigdhaṃ mākṣikajaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4371: madhūṣitaṃ ca samproktaṃ madhūtthaṃ conaviṃśati // Rajni_13.75
GS40rajnighu:4373: kaṭu snigdhaṃ ca lepena sphuṭitāṅgaviropaṇam // Rajni_13.76
GS40rajnighu:4375: śodhanaṃ pāṃśukāsīsaṃ śubhraṃ saptāhvayaṃ matam // Rajni_13.77
GS40rajnighu:4376: kāsīsaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ syāt śiśiraṃ viṣakuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:4379: hrasvaṃ netrauṣadhaṃ yojyaṃ viśadaṃ nīlamṛttikā // Rajni_13.79
GS40rajnighu:4391: dehe hemādikaṃ śastaṃ rogahṛd balapuṣṭidam // Rajni_13.85
GS40rajnighu:4392: añjanaṃ yāmunaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nādeyaṃ mecakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4393: srotojaṃ dṛkpradaṃ nīlaṃ sauvīraṃ ca suvīrajam // Rajni_13.86
GS40rajnighu:4395: kapotakaṃ ca kāpotaṃ samproktaṃ śarabhūmitam // Rajni_13.87
GS40rajnighu:4396: śītaṃ nīlāñjanaṃ proktaṃ kaṭu tiktaṃ kaṣāyakam /
GS40rajnighu:4397: cakṣuṣyaṃ kaphavātaghnaṃ viṣaghnaṃ ca rasāyanam // Rajni_13.88
GS40rajnighu:4400: kulatthikā tu cakṣuṣyā kaṣāyā kaṭukā himā /
GS40rajnighu:4403: rītikaṃ rītikusumaṃ rītipuṣpaṃ ca pauṣpakam // Rajni_13.91
GS40rajnighu:4409: rasanābhaṃ cāgnisāraṃ dvādaśāhvaṃ ca kīrtitam // Rajni_13.94
GS40rajnighu:4410: rītyāṃ tu dhmāyamānāyāṃ tatkiṭṭaṃ tu rasāñjanam /
GS40rajnighu:4412: srotoñjanaṃ vāribhavaṃ tathānyaṃ srotodbhavaṃ srotanadībhavaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4413: sauvīrasāraṃ ca kapotasāraṃ valmīkaśīrṣaṃ munisaṃmitāhvam // Rajni_13.96
GS40rajnighu:4415: rasāñjanaṃ rase yogyaṃ stanyavṛddhikaraṃ param // Rajni_13.97
GS40rajnighu:4417: ghṛṣṭe ca gairikāvarṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ srotoñjanaṃ ca tat // Rajni_13.98
GS40rajnighu:4422: tutthaṃ nīlāśmajaṃ nīlaṃ haritāśmaṃ ca tutthakam /
GS40rajnighu:4429: kharparī kaṭukā tiktā cakṣuṣyā ca rasāyanī /
GS40rajnighu:4433: sūtarāṭ capalo jaitraḥ śivabījaṃ śivas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4434: amṛtaṃ ca rasendraḥ syāllokeśo dhūrtaraḥ prabhuḥ // Rajni_13.106
GS40rajnighu:4444: pāraṃ dadāti yasmāttasmādayameva pāradaḥ kathitaḥ // Rajni_13.111
GS40rajnighu:4446: bahupattraṃ khamanantaṃ gaurījaṃ gaurijeyamiti ravayaḥ // Rajni_13.112
GS40rajnighu:4447: śvetaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ nīlamabhraṃ cāturvidhyaṃ yāti bhinnakriyārham /
GS40rajnighu:4448: śvetaṃ tāre kāñcane pītarakte nīlaṃ vyādhāv agryam agryaṃ guṇāḍhyam //
GS40rajnighu:4449: nīlābhraṃ darduro nāgaḥ pināko vajra ityapi /
GS40rajnighu:4450: caturvidhaṃ bhavettasya parīkṣā kathyate kramāt // Rajni_13.114
GS40rajnighu:4451: yadvahnau nihitaṃ tanoti nitarāṃ bhekāravaṃ darduro nāgaḥ phūtkurute dhanuḥsvanamupādatte pinākaḥ kila /
GS40rajnighu:4452: vajraṃ naiva vikārameti tadimānyāsevamānaḥ kramāt gulmī ca vraṇavāṃś ca kutsitagadī nīruk ca saṃjāyate // Rajni_13.115
GS40rajnighu:4455: sphaṭī ca sphaṭikī proktā śvetā śubhrā ca raṅgadā /
GS40rajnighu:4457: sphaṭī ca kaṭukā snigdhā kaṣāyā pradarāpahā /
GS40rajnighu:4460: kṣullakaḥ kaṭukas tiktaḥ śūlahārī ca dīpanaḥ // Rajni_13.119
GS40rajnighu:4461: śaṅkho hy arṇobhavaḥ kambur jalajaḥ pāvanadhvaniḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4464: evaṃ ṣoḍaśadhā jñeyo dhavalo maṅgalapradaḥ // Rajni_13.121
GS40rajnighu:4470: carācaraś caro varyo bālakrīḍaranakaśca saḥ // Rajni_13.124
GS40rajnighu:4474: muktāsphoṭas tautikaṃ tu mauktikaprasavā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4477: śūlapraśamanī rucyā madhurā dīpanī parā // Rajni_13.127
GS40rajnighu:4487: vajrābho dīptikaḥ saudho dugdhī kṣīrayavo'pi ca // Rajni_13.132
GS40rajnighu:4497: recakaṃ pulakaṃ caiva śodhakaṃ kālapālakam // Rajni_13.137
GS40rajnighu:4498: kaṅkuṣṭhaṃ ca dvidhā proktaṃ tārahemābhrakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4501: bāṇasaṃkhyābhidhaṃ proktaṃ tārahema dvidhā matam // Rajni_13.139
GS40rajnighu:4503: rasavīryādike tulyaṃ vedhe syād bhinnavīryakam // Rajni_13.140
GS40rajnighu:4509: śrīr vyavahāryaṃ draviṇaṃ dhanamartho rāḥ svāpateyaṃ ca // Rajni_13.143
GS40rajnighu:4518: snigdhaṃ gurugātrayutaṃ dīptaṃ svacchaṃ suraṅgaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4521: rāgavikalaṃ virūpaṃ laghu māṇikyaṃ na dhārayeddhīmān // Rajni_13.149
GS40rajnighu:4522: tadraktaṃ yadi padmarāgamatha tatpītātiraktaṃ dvidhā jānīyāt kuruvindakaṃ yadaruṇaṃ syādeṣu saugandhikam /
GS40rajnighu:4523: tannīlaṃ yadi nīlagandhikamiti jñeyaṃ caturdhā budhair māṇikyaṃ kaṣagharṣaṇe 'pyavikalaṃ rāgeṇa jātyaṃ jaguḥ // Rajni_13.150
GS40rajnighu:4524: muktā saumyā mauktikaṃ mauktikeyaṃ tāraṃ tārā bhautikaṃ tārakā ca /
GS40rajnighu:4525: ambhaḥsāraṃ śītalaṃ nīrajaṃ ca nakṣatraṃ syād indraratnaṃ valakṣam //
GS40rajnighu:4526: muktāphalaṃ binduphalaṃ ca muktikā śaukteyakaṃ śuklamaṇiḥ śaśipriyam /
GS40rajnighu:4527: svacchaṃ himaṃ haimavataṃ sudhāṃśubhaṃ sudhāṃśuratnaṃ śaranetrasaṃmitam //
GS40rajnighu:4528: mauktikaṃ ca madhuraṃ suśītalaṃ dṛṣṭirogaśamanaṃ viṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:4530: nakṣatrābhaṃ vṛttamatyantamuktaṃ snigdhaṃ sthūlaṃ nirmalaṃ nirvraṇaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4531: nyastaṃ dhatte gauravaṃ yattulāyāṃ tan nirmūlyaṃ mauktikaṃ saukhyadāyi //
GS40rajnighu:4532: yadvicchāyaṃ mauktikaṃ vyaṅgakāyaṃ śuktisparśaṃ raktatāṃ cāpi dhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4534: mātaṃgoragamīnapotriśirasas tvaksāraśaṅkhāmbubhṛt śuktīnāmudarācca mauktikamaṇiḥ spaṣṭaṃ bhavatyaṣṭadhā
GS40rajnighu:4535: chāyāḥ pāṭalanīlapītadhavalās tatrāpi sāmānyataḥ saptānāṃ bahuśo na labdhir itaracchaukteyakaṃ tūlvaṇam // Rajni_13.156
GS40rajnighu:4537: marditamapi śālituṣairyadavikṛtaṃ tattu mauktikaṃ jātyam // Rajni_13.157
GS40rajnighu:4539: bhaumaratnaṃ ca raktāṅgo raktāṅkuro latāmaṇiḥ // Rajni_13.158
GS40rajnighu:4543: samaṃ guru sirāhīnaṃ pravālaṃ dhārayet śubham // Rajni_13.160
GS40rajnighu:4545: rūkṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ laghu śvetaṃ pravālam aśubhaṃ tyajet // Rajni_13.161
GS40rajnighu:4547: yā na tyajati nijaruciṃ nikaṣe ghṛṣṭāpi sā smṛtā jātyā // Rajni_13.162
GS40rajnighu:4551: marakataṃ viṣaghnaṃ ca śītalaṃ madhuraṃ rase /
GS40rajnighu:4553: svacchaṃ guru succhāyaṃ snigdhaṃ gātre ca mārdavasametam /
GS40rajnighu:4554: avyaṅgaṃ bahuraṅgaṃ śṛṅgāri marakataṃ śubhaṃ bibhṛyāt // Rajni_13.165
GS40rajnighu:4557: yat śaivālaśikhaṇḍiśādvalaharitkācaiśca cāṣacchadaiḥ khadyotena ca bālakīravapuṣā śairīṣapuṣpeṇa ca /
GS40rajnighu:4558: chāyābhiḥ samatāṃ dadhāti tadidaṃ nirdiṣṭamaṣṭātmakaṃ jātyaṃ yattapanātapaiśca parito gārutmataṃ rañjayet // Rajni_13.167
GS40rajnighu:4562: āyuḥ śriyaṃ ca prajñāṃ ca dhāraṇāt kurute nṛṇām // Rajni_13.169
GS40rajnighu:4564: yaḥ puṣparāgam amalaṃ kalayedamuṣya puṣṇāti kīrtim atiśauryasukhāyur arthān // Rajni_13.170
GS40rajnighu:4568: tena khalu puṣparāgo jātyatayāyaṃ parīkṣakair uktaḥ // Rajni_13.172
GS40rajnighu:4574: bhasmāṅgaṃ kākapādaṃ ca rekhākrāntaṃ tu vartulam /
GS40rajnighu:4576: nīlābhaṃ cipiṭaṃ rūkṣaṃ tadvajraṃ doṣadaṃ tyajet // Rajni_13.175
GS40rajnighu:4577: śvetālohitapītakamecakatayā chāyāś catasraḥ kramāt viprāditvam ihāsya yat sumanasaḥ śaṃsanti satyaṃ tataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4578: sphītāṃ kīrtim anuttamāṃ śriyamidaṃ dhatte yathāsvaṃ dhṛtaṃ martyānām ayathāyathaṃ tu kuliśaṃ pathyaṃ hi nānyattataḥ // Rajni_13.176
GS40rajnighu:4579: yatpāṣāṇatale nikāṣanikare nodghṛṣyate niṣṭhurair yaccolūkhalalohamudgaraghanair lekhāṃ na yātyāhatam /
GS40rajnighu:4580: yaccānyannijalīlayaiva dalayedvajreṇa vā bhidyate tajjātyaṃ kuliśaṃ vadanti kuśalāḥ ślāghyaṃ mahārghyaṃ ca tat // Rajni_13.177
GS40rajnighu:4581: vipraḥ so 'pi rasāyaneṣu balavānaṣṭāṅgasiddhiprado rājanyastu nṛṇāṃ valīpalitajit mṛtyuṃ jayed añjasā /
GS40rajnighu:4582: dravyākarṣaṇasiddhidastu sutarāṃ vaiśvo'tha śūdro bhavet sarvavyādhiharastadeṣa kathito vajrasya varṇyo guṇaḥ // Rajni_13.178
GS40rajnighu:4585: masāram indranīlaṃ syād gallarkaḥ padmarāgajaḥ // Rajni_13.179
GS40rajnighu:4587: yo dadhāti śarīre syāt saurirmaṅgalado bhavet // Rajni_13.180
GS40rajnighu:4591: rūkṣaḥ sphuṭitagartaś ca varjyo nīlaḥ sadoṣakaḥ // Rajni_13.182
GS40rajnighu:4595: yaḥ pātraṃ rañjayatyāśu sa jātyo nīla ucyate // Rajni_13.184
GS40rajnighu:4600: gomūtrābhaṃ yanmṛdu snigdhamugdhaṃ śuddhacchāyaṃ gauravaṃ yacca dhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4601: hemāraktaṃ śrīmatāṃ yogyametat gomedākhyaṃ ratnam ākhyānti santaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:4602: pātre yatra nyaste payaḥ prayātyeva gojalojjvalatām /
GS40rajnighu:4603: gharṣe'pyahīnakāntiṃ gomedaṃ taṃ budhā vidur jātyam // Rajni_13.188
GS40rajnighu:4605: vicchāyaṃ śarkarāgāraṃ gomedaṃ vibudhas tyajet // Rajni_13.189
GS40rajnighu:4608: vaiḍūryaratnaṃ samproktaṃ jñeyaṃ vidūrajaṃ tathā // Rajni_13.190
GS40rajnighu:4611: ekaṃ veṇupalāśapeśalarucā māyūrakaṇṭhatviṣā mārjārekṣaṇapiṅgalacchavijuṣā jñeyaṃ tridhā chāyayā
GS40rajnighu:4612: yadgātre gurutāṃ dadhāti nitarāṃ snigdhaṃ tu doṣojjhitaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ vimalaṃ vadanti sudhiyaḥ svacchaṃ ca tacchobhanam // Rajni_13.192
GS40rajnighu:4613: vicchāyaṃ mṛcchilāgarbhe laghu rūkṣaṃ ca sakṣatam /
GS40rajnighu:4614: satrāsaṃ paruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vaiḍūryaṃ dūratas tyajet // Rajni_13.193
GS40rajnighu:4616: sphuṭaṃ pradarśayed etad vaiḍūryaṃ jātyamucyate // Rajni_13.194
GS40rajnighu:4617: māṇikyaṃ padmabandhor ativimalatamaṃ mauktikaṃ śītabhānor māheyasya pravālaṃ marakatamatulaṃ kalpayedindusūnoḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4618: devejye puṣparāgaṃ kuliśamapi kaver nīlam arkātmajasya svarbhānoścāpi gomedakam atha vidurodbhāvitaṃ kiṃtu ketoḥ // Rajni_13.195
GS40rajnighu:4620: yo dadyādbibhṛyād vāpi tasmin sānugrahā grahāḥ // Rajni_13.196
GS40rajnighu:4622: lāghavamatha komalatā sādhāraṇadoṣa eva vijñeyaḥ // Rajni_13.197
GS40rajnighu:4627: sphaṭikaḥ sitopalaḥ syād amalamaṇir nirmalopalaḥ svacchaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4630: tasyākṣamālā japatāṃ datte koṭiguṇaṃ phalam // Rajni_13.201
GS40rajnighu:4631: yad gaṅgātoyabinduchavivimalatamaṃ nistuṣaṃ netrahṛdyaṃ snigdhaṃ śuddhāntarālaṃ madhuram atihimaṃ pittadāhāsrahāri /
GS40rajnighu:4632: pāṣāṇair yan nighṛṣṭaṃ sphuṭitam api nijāṃ svacchatāṃ naiva jahyāt tajjātyaṃ jātvalabhyaṃ śubham upacinute śaivaratnaṃ vicitram //
GS40rajnighu:4633: atha bhavati sūryakāntas tapanamaṇis tapanaśca ravikāntaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4637: śuddhaḥ snigdho nirvraṇo nistuṣo'ntaryo nirmṛṣṭo vyomni nairmalyam eti /
GS40rajnighu:4638: yaḥ sūryāṃśusparśaniṣṭhyūtavahnir jātyaḥ so 'yaṃ jāyate sūryakāntaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:4640: gonāsaḥ kṣudrakuliśaṃ cūrṇavajraṃ ca gonasaḥ // Rajni_13.206
GS40rajnighu:4644: yadvikrāntiṃ dhatte tadvaikrāntaṃ budhairidaṃ kathitam // Rajni_13.208
GS40rajnighu:4649: snigdhaṃ śvetaṃ pītamātrāsametaṃ dhatte citte svacchatāṃ yan munīnām /
GS40rajnighu:4650: yacca srāvaṃ yāti candrāṃśusaṅgāj jātyaṃ ratnaṃ candrakāntākhyametat //
GS40rajnighu:4654: saubhāgyaṃ kurute nṝṇāṃ bhūṣaṇeṣu prayojitaḥ // Rajni_13.213
GS40rajnighu:4655: nirgāram asitamasṛṇaṃ nīlaṃ guru nirmalaṃ bahuchāyam /
GS40rajnighu:4656: śikhikaṇṭhasamaṃ saumyaṃ rājāvartaṃ vadanti jātyamaṇim // Rajni_13.214
GS40rajnighu:4657: perojaṃ haritāśmaṃ ca bhasmāṅgaṃ haritaṃ dvidhā /
GS40rajnighu:4658: perojaṃ sukaṣāyaṃ syānmadhuraṃ dīpanaṃ param // Rajni_13.215
GS40rajnighu:4659: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva saṃyogāc ca yathā viṣam /
GS40rajnighu:4660: tatsarvaṃ nāśayet śīghraṃ śūlaṃ bhūtādidoṣajam // Rajni_13.216
GS40rajnighu:4661: siddhāḥ pāradam abhrakaṃ ca vividhān dhātūṃś ca lohāni ca prāhuḥ kiṃca maṇīnapīha sakalān saṃskārataḥ siddhidān /
GS40rajnighu:4662: yat saṃskāravihīnam eṣu hi bhaved yaccānyathā saṃskṛtaṃ tanmartyaṃ viṣavan nihanti tadiha jñeyā budhaiḥ saṃskriyāḥ // Rajni_13.217
GS40rajnighu:4663: yān saṃskṛtān śubhaguṇān atha cānyathā ced doṣāṃś ca yān api diśanti rasādayo 'mī /
GS40rajnighu:4664: yāś ceha santi khalu saṃskṛtayas tadetan nātrābhyadhāyi bahuvistarabhītibhāgbhiḥ // Rajni_13.218
GS40rajnighu:4666: avadhārya vargam imam ādyavaidyakapraguṇaprayogakuśalo bhaved budhaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:4667: kurvanti ye nijaguṇena rasādhvagena nṝṇāṃ jarantyapi vapūṃṣi punarnavāni /
GS40rajnighu:4668: teṣāmayaṃ nivasatiḥ kanakādikānāṃ vargaḥ prasidhyati rasāyanavarganāmnā //
GS40rajnighu:4669: nityaṃ yasya guṇāḥ kilāntaralasatkalyāṇabhūyas tathā cittākarṣaṇacañcavas tribhuvanaṃ bhūmnā parikurvate /
GS40rajnighu:4670: tenātraiṣa kṛte nṛsiṃhakṛtinā nāmādicūḍāmaṇau saṃsthāmeti mitas trayodaśatayā vargaḥ suvarṇādikaḥ Rājanighaṇṭu, Pānīyādivarga
GS40rajnighu:4675: pānīyaṃ madhuraṃ himaṃ ca rucidaṃ tṛṣṇāviśoṣāpahaṃ mohabhrāntimapākaroti kurute bhuktānnapaktiṃ parām /
GS40rajnighu:4676: nidrālasyanirāsanaṃ viṣaharaṃ śrāntātisaṃtarpaṇaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhībalavīryatuṣṭijananaṃ naṣṭāṅgapuṣṭipradam divyodakaṃ kharāri syādākāśasalilaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4681: cirasthitaṃ laghu svacchaṃ pathyaṃ svādu sukhāvaham // Rajni_14.6
GS40rajnighu:4687: nadī dhunī nirjhariṇī taraṃgiṇī sarasvatī śaivalinī samudragā /
GS40rajnighu:4688: kūlaṃkaṣā kūlavatī ca nimnagā śaivālinī sindhur athāpagāpi ca //
GS40rajnighu:4690: srotasvinī sunīrā rodhovakrā ca vāhinī taṭinī // Rajni_14.10
GS40rajnighu:4692: rucyaṃ tṛṣṇāpahaṃ pathyaṃ madhuraṃ ceṣaduṣṇakam // Rajni_14.11
GS40rajnighu:4695: vetrāvatī kṣaudravatī payoṣṇī tāpī vitastā sarayūśca sindhuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4696: mahāśatadrur hy atha gautamī syāt kṛṣṇā ca tuṅgā ca kaverikanyā //
GS40rajnighu:4700: parīkṣyeta yathā coktaṃ jñātavyaṃ jalavedibhiḥ // Rajni_14.15
GS40rajnighu:4701: gaṅgā svargasarid varā tripathagā mandākinī jāhnavī puṇyā viṣṇupadī samudrasubhagā bhāgīrathī svarṇadī /
GS40rajnighu:4702: triḥsrotā suradīrghikā suranadī siddhāpagā svardhunī jyeṣṭhā jahnusutā ca bhīṣmajananī śubhrā ca śailendrajā // Rajni_14.16
GS40rajnighu:4703: śītaṃ svādu svaccham atyantarucyaṃ pathyaṃ pākyaṃ pāvanaṃ pāpahāri /
GS40rajnighu:4704: tṛṣṇāmohadhvaṃsanaṃ dīpanaṃ ca prajñāṃ datte vāri bhāgīrathīyam //
GS40rajnighu:4705: yamunā tapanatanujā kalindakanyā yamasvasā ca kālindī // Rajni_14.18
GS40rajnighu:4707: vahnidīpanakaraṃ virocanaṃ yāmunaṃ jalam idaṃ balapradam // Rajni_14.19
GS40rajnighu:4708: revā mekalakanyā somasutā narmadā ca vijñeyā // Rajni_14.20
GS40rajnighu:4711: cāndrabhāgasalilaṃ suśītalaṃ dāhapittaśamanaṃ ca vātadam // Rajni_14.22
GS40rajnighu:4712: sarasvatī plakṣasamudbhavā ca sā vākpradā brahmasatī ca bhāratī /
GS40rajnighu:4713: vedāgraṇīś caiva payoṣṇijātā vāṇī viśālā kuṭilā daśāhvā // Rajni_14.23
GS40rajnighu:4715: rucyaṃ dīpanadaṃ pathyaṃ dehakāntikaraṃ laghu // Rajni_14.24
GS40rajnighu:4717: śatadror vipāśāyujaḥ sindhunadyāḥ suśītaṃ laghu svādu sarvāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4718: jalaṃ nirmalaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca pradatte balaṃ buddhimedhāyuṣaṃ ca //
GS40rajnighu:4719: śoṇe ghargharake jalaṃ tu rucidaṃ saṃtāpaśoṣāpahaṃ pathyaṃ vahnikaraṃ tathā ca baladaṃ kṣīṇāṅgapuṣṭipradam
GS40rajnighu:4720: tatrānyā dadhate jalaṃ sumadhuraṃ kāntipradaṃ puṣṭidaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanapācanaṃ balakaraṃ vetrāvatī tāpinī // Rajni_14.27
GS40rajnighu:4726: godāvarī gautamasambhavā sā brahmādrijātāpyatha gautamī ca // Rajni_14.31
GS40rajnighu:4729: kṛṣṇānadī kṛṣṇasamudbhavā syātsā kṛṣṇaveṇāpi ca kṛṣṇagaṅgā // Rajni_14.33
GS40rajnighu:4732: malāpahā bhīmarathī ca ghaṭṭagā yathā ca kṛṣṇājalasāmyadā guṇaiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4733: malāpahāghaṭṭagayos tathāpi pathyaṃ laghu svādutaraṃ sukāntidam //
GS40rajnighu:4735: kaṇḍūpittāsradaṃ prāyaḥ sātmye pathyakaraṃ param // Rajni_14.36
GS40rajnighu:4740: sarvā gurvī prāṅmukhī vāhinī yā laghvī paścādvāhinī niścayena /
GS40rajnighu:4741: deśe deśe tadguṇānāṃ viśeṣādeṣā dhatte gauravaṃ lāghavaṃ ca // Rajni_14.39
GS40rajnighu:4742: vindhyāt prācī yāpy avācī pratīcī yā codīcī syānnadī sā krameṇa /
GS40rajnighu:4743: vātāṭopaṃ śleṣmapittārtilopaṃ pittodrekaṃ pathyapākaṃ ca dhatte //
GS40rajnighu:4744: himavati malayācale ca vindhye prabhavati sahyagirau ca yā sravantī /
GS40rajnighu:4745: sṛjati kila śirorujādidoṣān apanudate 'pi ca pāriyātrajātā // Rajni_14.41
GS40rajnighu:4746: nadyaḥ prāvṛṣijās tu pīnasakaphaśvāsārtikāsapradāḥ pathyā vātakaphāpahāḥ śaradijā hemantajā buddhidāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4747: saṃtāpaṃ śamayanti śaṃ vidadhate śaiśiryavāsantajās tṛṣṇādāhavamiśramārtiśamadā grīṣme yathā sadguṇāḥ // Rajni_14.42
GS40rajnighu:4752: sādhāraṇaṃ jalaṃ rucyaṃ dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:4754: jātaṃ tāmramṛdas tadeva salilaṃ vātādidoṣapradaṃ deśāj jāḍyakaraṃ ca durjarataraṃ doṣāvahaṃ dhūsaram /
GS40rajnighu:4755: vātaghnaṃ tu śilāśirottham amalaṃ pathyaṃ laghu svādu ca śreṣṭhaṃ śyāmamṛdas tridoṣaśamanaṃ sarvāmayaghnaṃ payaḥ // Rajni_14.46
GS40rajnighu:4756: hradavāri vahnijananaṃ madhuraṃ kaphavātahāri pathyaṃ ca // Rajni_14.47
GS40rajnighu:4757: prasravaṇajalaṃ svacchaṃ laghu madhuraṃ rocanaṃ ca dīpanakṛt //
GS40rajnighu:4758: taḍāgasalilaṃ svādu kaṣāyaṃ vātadaṃ kiyat // Rajni_14.49
GS40rajnighu:4759: vāpījalaṃ tu saṃtāpi vātaśleṣmakaraṃ guru // Rajni_14.50
GS40rajnighu:4760: kaphaghnaṃ kūpapānīyaṃ kṣāraṃ pittakaraṃ laghu // Rajni_14.51
GS40rajnighu:4761: audbhidaṃ pittaśamanaṃ salilaṃ laghu ca smṛtam // Rajni_14.52
GS40rajnighu:4763: tadeva baddhamuktaṃ tu viśeṣād doṣadaṃ bhavet // Rajni_14.53
