GS40rajnighu:4764: nādeyaṃ navamṛdghaṭeṣu nihitaṃ saṃtaptam arkāṃśubhir yāminyāṃ ca niviṣṭam indrakiraṇair mandānilāndolitam
GS40rajnighu:4765: elādyaiḥ parivāsitaṃ śramaharaṃ pittoṣṇadāhe viṣe mūrchāraktamadātyayeṣu ca hitaṃ śaṃsanti haṃsodakam // Rajni_14.54
GS40rajnighu:4766: yaḥ pānīyaṃ pibati śiśiraṃ svādu nityaṃ niśīthe pratyūṣe vā pibati yadi vā ghrāṇarandhreṇa dhīraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4767: so 'yaṃ sadyaḥ patagapatinā spardhate netraśaktyā svargācāryaṃ prahasati
GS40rajnighu:4768: dhiyā dveṣṭi dasrau ca tanvā // Rajni_14.55
GS40rajnighu:4769: viṇmūtrāruṇanīlikāviṣahataṃ taptaṃ ghanaṃ phenilaṃ dantagrāhyam anārtavaṃ salavaṇaṃ śaivālakaiḥ saṃvṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:4770: jantuvrātavimiśritaṃ gurutaraṃ parṇaughapaṅkāvilaṃ candrārkāṃśutirohitaṃ ca na pibennīraṃ jaḍaṃ doṣalam // Rajni_14.56
GS40rajnighu:4774: jīrṇajvare śaithilyasaṃnipāte jalaṃ praśastaṃ śṛtaśītalaṃ tu //
GS40rajnighu:4775: taptaṃ pāthaḥ pādabhāgena hīnaṃ proktaṃ pathyaṃ vātajātāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4776: ardhāṃśonaṃ nāśayed vātapittaṃ pādaprāyaṃ tattu doṣatrayaghnam //
GS40rajnighu:4777: hemante pādahīnaṃ tu pādārdhonaṃ tu śārade /
GS40rajnighu:4780: grīṣme cauḍaṃ tu seveta doṣadaṃ syādato 'nyathā // Rajni_14.61
GS40rajnighu:4781: taptaṃ divā jāḍyam upaiti naktaṃ naktaṃ ca taptaṃ tu divā guru syāt /
GS40rajnighu:4782: divā ca naktaṃ ca nṛbhis tadātvataptaṃ jalaṃ yuktamato grahītum //
GS40rajnighu:4783: uṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi śītaṃ kavoṣṇaṃ kvāpi kvāpi kvāthaśītaṃ ca pāthaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4786: pācayati cānnamanalaṃ puṣṇāti niśīthapītam uṣṇāmbhaḥ // Rajni_14.64
GS40rajnighu:4787: rātrau pītamajīrṇadoṣaśamanaṃ śaṃsanti sāmānyataḥ pītaṃ vāri niśāvasānasamaye sarvāmayadhvaṃsanam
GS40rajnighu:4788: bhuktvā tūrdhvamidaṃ ca puṣṭijananaṃ prāk ced apuṣṭipradaṃ rucyaṃ jāṭharavahnipāṭavakaraṃ pathyaṃ ca bhuktyantare // Rajni_14.65
GS40rajnighu:4789: atyambupānānna vipacyate 'nnam anambupānācca sa eva doṣaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4790: tasmānnaro vahnivivardhanārthaṃ muhur muhur vāri pibed abhūri //
GS40rajnighu:4792: dhāraṃ ca kārakaṃ caiva tauṣāraṃ haimamityapi // Rajni_14.67
GS40rajnighu:4796: tatra gāṅgaṃ guṇāḍhyaṃ syāt adoṣaṃ pācanaṃ param // Rajni_14.69
GS40rajnighu:4802: dadhnopadigdhe nihitaṃ muhūrtād avikriyaṃ gāṅgam athānyathā syāt //
GS40rajnighu:4803: gāṅgaṃ jalaṃ svādu suśītalaṃ ca rucipradaṃ pittakaphāpahaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:4804: nirdoṣam acchaṃ laghu tacca nityaṃ guṇādhikaṃ vyomni gṛhītam āhuḥ //
GS40rajnighu:4809: patitaṃ bhuvi yattoyaṃ gāṅgaṃ sāmudrameva vā /
GS40rajnighu:4810: svasvāśrayavaśād gacched anyad anyad rasādikam // Rajni_14.76
GS40rajnighu:4811: asraṃ ca lavaṇaṃ ca syātpatitaṃ pārthivasthale /
GS40rajnighu:4812: āpye tu madhuraṃ proktaṃ kaṭu tiktaṃ ca taijase // Rajni_14.77
GS40rajnighu:4815: yatra cedāśvine māsi naiva varṣati vāridaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4816: gāṅgatoyavihīne syuḥ kāle tatrādhikā rujaḥ // Rajni_14.79
GS40rajnighu:4820: sitaḥ puṇḍraḥ karaṅkekṣuḥ kṛṣṇo raktaśca te kramāt // Rajni_14.81
GS40rajnighu:4822: asipattro madhutṛṇo vṛṣyo guḍatṛṇo nava // Rajni_14.82
GS40rajnighu:4823: śvetekṣus tu sitekṣuḥ syāt kāṣṭhekṣur vaṃśapattrakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4826: dīpanaḥ pittadāhaghno vipāke koṣṇadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.84
GS40rajnighu:4828: karburo miśravarṇaś ca nepālekṣuś ca saptadhā // Rajni_14.85
GS40rajnighu:4830: dāhaśramaharo rucyo rase saṃtarpaṇaḥ paraḥ // Rajni_14.86
GS40rajnighu:4837: kṛṣṇekṣur ukto madhuraś ca pāke svāduḥ suhṛdyaḥ kaṭuko rasāḍhyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4848: bhuktamadhye gurutarā itīkṣūṇāṃ guṇās trayaḥ // Rajni_14.95
GS40rajnighu:4849: vṛṣyo raktāsrapittaśramaśamanapaṭuḥ śītalaḥ ślesmado 'lpaḥ snigdho hṛdyaś ca rucyo racayati ca mudaṃ sūtraśuddhiṃ vidhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4850: kāntiṃ dehasya datte balamati kurute bṛṃhaṇaṃ tṛptidāyī dantair niṣpīdya kāṇḍaṃ mṛduyatirasito mohanaś cekṣudaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.96
GS40rajnighu:4851: pīyūṣopamitaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ syād dantaniṣpīḍitaṃ tadvacced gṛhayantrajaṃ tadaparaṃ ślesmānilaghnaṃ kiyat /
GS40rajnighu:4852: etad vātaharaṃ tu vātajananaṃ jāḍyapratiśvāyadaṃ proktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ kaphānilakaraṃ pānīyam ikṣadbhavam // Rajni_14.97
GS40rajnighu:4854: vṛṣyaṃ vātakaphaghnaṃ ca yāvanālaśarāt rasam // Rajni_14.98
GS40rajnighu:4858: śiśupriyaḥ sitādiḥ syādaruṇo rasajaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_14.100
GS40rajnighu:4859: pittaghnaḥ pavanārtijid rucikaro hṛdyastridoṣāpahaḥ saṃyogena viśeṣato jvaraharaḥ saṃtāpaśāntipradaḥ
GS40rajnighu:4861: laghuḥ śramaharaḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo guḍaḥ // Rajni_14.101
GS40rajnighu:4862: syādyāvanālarasapākabhavo guḍo'yaṃ kṣāraḥ kaṭuḥ sumadhuraḥ kaphavātahārī /
GS40rajnighu:4864: śarkaroktā tu mīnāṇḍī śvetā matsyaṇḍikā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:4865: ahicchatrā tu sikatā sitā caiva guḍodbhavā // Rajni_14.103
GS40rajnighu:4868: snigdhā puṇḍrakaśarkarā hitakarī kṣīṇe kṣaye'rocake cakṣuṣyā balavardhinī sumadhurā rūkṣā ca vaṃśekṣujā /
GS40rajnighu:4869: vṛṣyā tṛptibalapradā śramaharā śyāmekṣujā śītalā snigdhā kāntikarī rasālajanitā raktekṣujā pittajit // Rajni_14.105
GS40rajnighu:4884: dāhaṃ nivārayati tāpamapākaroti tṛptiṃ niyacchati nihanti ca mohamūrchām /
GS40rajnighu:4885: śvāsaṃ nivārayati tarpayatīndriyāṇi śītaḥ sadā sumadhuraḥ khalu siddhikhaṇḍaḥ // Rajni_14.113
GS40rajnighu:4886: madhu kṣaudraṃ ca mākṣīkaṃ mākṣikaṃ kusumāsavam /
GS40rajnighu:4887: puṣpāsavaṃ pavitraṃ ca pitryaṃ puṣparasāhvayam // Rajni_14.114
GS40rajnighu:4888: mākṣikaṃ bhrāmaraṃ kṣaudraṃ pauttikaṃ chāttrakaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4893: bhramarairjanitaṃ taistu bhrāmaraṃ madhu bhaṇyate // Rajni_14.117
GS40rajnighu:4894: piṅgalā makṣikāḥ sūkṣmāḥ kṣudrā iti hi viśrutāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4895: tābhirutpāditaṃ yattu tat kṣaudraṃ madhu kathyate // Rajni_14.118
GS40rajnighu:4896: annajā makṣikāḥ piṅgāḥ puttikā iti kīrtitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4897: tajjātaṃ madhu dhīmadbhiḥ pauttikaṃ samudāhṛtam // Rajni_14.119
GS40rajnighu:4899: yatkurvanti tadutpannaṃ madhu chāttrakam īritam // Rajni_14.120
GS40rajnighu:4901: tadudbhūtaṃ yadarghārhaṃ tadārghyaṃ madhu varṇyate // Rajni_14.121
GS40rajnighu:4902: auddālāḥ kapilāḥ kīṭā bhūmer uddalanāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4907: atha vakṣyāmyahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇavīryādikaṃ kramāt // Rajni_14.124
GS40rajnighu:4909: kṣaudraṃ tu kapilābhāsaṃ pauttikaṃ ghṛtasaṃnibham // Rajni_14.125
GS40rajnighu:4913: bhrāmaraṃ picchilaṃ rūkṣaṃ madhuraṃ mukhajāḍyajit // Rajni_14.127
GS40rajnighu:4914: kṣaudraṃ tu śītaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ picchilaṃ pittavātahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4919: dālaṃ kaṭu kaṣāyāmlaṃ madhuraṃ pittadāyi ca // Rajni_14.130
GS40rajnighu:4920: navaṃ madhu bhavet sthaulyaṃ nātiśleṣmakaraṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:4921: dehasthaulyāpahaṃ grāhi purāṇaṃ madhu lekhanam // Rajni_14.131
GS40rajnighu:4922: pakvaṃ doṣatrayaghnaṃ madhu vividharujājāḍyajihvāmayādidhvaṃsaṃ dhatte ca rucyaṃ balamatidhṛtidaṃ vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte /
GS40rajnighu:4923: āmaṃ ced āmagulmāmayapavanarujāpittadāhāsradoṣaṃ hanyād vātaṃ ca śoṣaṃ janayati niyataṃ dhvaṃsayaty antavṛddhim // Rajni_14.132
GS40rajnighu:4925: sādhāraṇyā madhu hitaṃ tattulyā madhuśarkarā // Rajni_14.133
GS40rajnighu:4927: āmaṃ madhu manuṣyāṇāṃ viṣavat tāpadāyakam // Rajni_14.134
GS40rajnighu:4929: kaṇṭakoṭaragataṃ ca mecakaṃ tacca gehajanitaṃ ca doṣakṛt // Rajni_14.135
GS40rajnighu:4930: daṇḍair nihatya yadupāttamapāstadaṃśaṃ tādṛgvidhaṃ madhu rasāyanayogayogyam /
GS40rajnighu:4934: yadguṇaṃ yanmadhu proktaṃ tadguṇā tasya śarkarā /
GS40rajnighu:4935: viśeṣād balavṛṣyaṃ ca tarpaṇaṃ kṣīṇadehinām // Rajni_14.138
GS40rajnighu:4936: madyaṃ surā prasannā syānmadirā vāruṇī varā /
GS40rajnighu:4937: mattā kādambarī śītā capalā kāminī priyā // Rajni_14.139
GS40rajnighu:4938: madagandhā ca mādhvīkaṃ madhu saṃdhānam āsavaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4939: parisṛtāmṛtā vīrā medhāvī madanī ca sā // Rajni_14.140
GS40rajnighu:4940: supratibhā manojñā ca vipānā modinī tathā /
GS40rajnighu:4945: syāddhātakīrasaguḍādikṛtā tu gauḍī puṣpadravādimadhusāramayī tu mādhvī /
GS40rajnighu:4946: paiṣṭī punarvividhadhānyavikārajātā khyātā madādhikatayātra ca pūrvapūrvā
GS40rajnighu:4949: saindhī kādambarī caiva dvividhaṃ madyalakṣaṇam // Rajni_14.144
GS40rajnighu:4951: balakṛddīpanī pathyā kāntikṛt tarpaṇī parā // Rajni_14.145
GS40rajnighu:4952: mādhvī tu madhurā hṛdyā nātyuṣṇā pittavātahṛt /
GS40rajnighu:4954: paiṣṭī kaṭūṣṇā tīkṣṇā syānmadhurā dīpanī parā // Rajni_14.147
GS40rajnighu:4955: saindhī śītā kaṣāyāmlā pittahṛdvātadā ca sā // Rajni_14.148
GS40rajnighu:4956: gauḍī tu śiśire peyā paiṣṭī hemantavarṣayoḥ /
GS40rajnighu:4957: śaradgrīṣmavasanteṣu mādhvī grāhyā na cānyathā // Rajni_14.149
GS40rajnighu:4959: mādhvīsamaṃ syāttṛṇavṛkṣajātaṃ madyaṃ suśītaṃ guru tarpaṇaṃ ca //
GS40rajnighu:4962: aikṣavaṃ tu bhavenmadyaṃ śiśiraṃ ca madotkaṭam /
GS40rajnighu:4965: śārkaraṃ kathyate madyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ dīpanamohanam // Rajni_14.153
GS40rajnighu:4968: madyaṃ navaṃ sarvavikārahetuḥ sarvaṃ tu vātādikadoṣadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:4969: jīrṇaṃ tu sarvaṃ sakalāmayaghnaṃ balapradaṃ vṛṣyakaraṃ ca dīpanam //
GS40rajnighu:4971: dvijais tribhis tu na grāhyaṃ yadyapy ujjīvayenmṛtam // Rajni_14.156
GS40rajnighu:4973: prāgasmātpratibudhya nāmaguṇato nirṇītayogaucitī yāthātathyavaśād viniścitamanāḥ kurvīta vaidyaḥ kriyām // Rajni_14.157
GS40rajnighu:4974: yai rasyamānā hi nṛṇāṃ yathāsvaṃ doṣānnirasyantyapi durnirāsān /
GS40rajnighu:4975: teṣāṃ rasānāṃ vasatiḥ kilāyaṃ vargaḥ prasiddho rasavarganāmnā //
GS40rajnighu:4976: nisyandaṃ dugdhasindhāv amṛtamatha samastauṣadhīnāṃ na dohaṃ tāpāhaṃ no cikitsāmabhilaṣati rasaṃ nāpi doṣākarasya /
GS40rajnighu:4977: labdhvā yat sauhṛdayyaṃ jagati budhajanastena vargaḥ kṛto'smin pānīyādiḥ prasiddhiṃ vrajati manumito nāmagīrmauliratne // Rajni_14.159
GS40rajnighu:4978: Rājanighaṇṭu, Kṣīrādivarga kṣīraṃ pīyūṣam ūdhasyaṃ dugdhaṃ stanyaṃ payo'mṛtam // Rajni_15.1
GS40rajnighu:4979: kṣīrajaṃ dadhi tadrūpyaṃ viralaṃ mastu tajjalam // Rajni_15.2
GS40rajnighu:4982: amṛtaṃ cābhighāraśca homyam āyuśca taijasam // Rajni_15.4
GS40rajnighu:4983: mrakṣaṇaṃ snehanaṃ snehaḥ snigdhatā mrakṣa eva ca /
GS40rajnighu:4987: takraṃ tribhāgadadhisaṃyutamambu dhīrairuktaṃ dadhidviguṇavāriyutaṃ tu mastu /
GS40rajnighu:4988: dadhyambhasī yadi same tadudaśvidāhus tat kevalaṃ tu mathitaṃ munayo vadanti // Rajni_15.7
GS40rajnighu:4990: gomayaṃ gopurīṣaṃ syād goviṣṭhā gomalaṃ ca tat // Rajni_15.8
GS40rajnighu:4993: gavyaṃ kṣīraṃ pathyam atyantarucyaṃ svādu snigdhaṃ pittavātāmayaghnam /
GS40rajnighu:4995: gaulyaṃ tu mahiṣīkṣīraṃ vipāke śītalaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:4999: sūkṣmājadugdheti ca saṃvadārhaṃ godugdhavīryāt tv adhikaṃ guṇe ca /
GS40rajnighu:5000: sukṣīṇadeheṣu ca pathyam uktaṃ sthūlājadugdhaṃ kila kiṃcidūnam //
GS40rajnighu:5001: āvikaṃ tu payaḥ snigdhaṃ kaphapittaharaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:5002: sthaulyamehaharaṃ pathyaṃ lomaśaṃ guru vṛddhidam // Rajni_15.14
GS40rajnighu:5004: snigdhaṃ sthairyakaraṃ śītaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ balavardhanam // Rajni_15.15
GS40rajnighu:5005: aśvīkṣīraṃ tu rūkṣāmlaṃ lavaṇaṃ dīpanaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5008: madhurāmlarasaṃ rūkṣaṃ dīpanaṃ pathyadaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_15.17
GS40rajnighu:5011: madhuraṃ mānuṣīkṣīraṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca himaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5012: cakṣuṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ pathyaṃ pācanaṃ rocanaṃ ca tat // Rajni_15.19
GS40rajnighu:5013: kṣīraṃ kāsaśvāsakopāya sarvaṃ gurvāmaṃ syāt prāyaśo doṣadāyi /
GS40rajnighu:5014: taccettaptaṃ vartitaṃ pathyamuktaṃ nārīkṣīraṃ tv āmam evāmayaghnam //
GS40rajnighu:5016: sarvāmayaharaṃ pathyaṃ cirasaṃsthaṃ tu doṣadam // Rajni_15.21
GS40rajnighu:5017: ke 'py āvikaṃ pathyatamaṃ śṛtoṣṇaṃ kṣīraṃ tv ajānāṃ śṛtaśītamāhuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5018: dohāntaśītaṃ mahiṣīpayaśca gavyaṃ tu dhāroṣṇamidaṃ praśastam //
GS40rajnighu:5019: vṛṣyaṃ bṛṃhaṇam agnivardhanakaraṃ pūrvāhṇapītaṃ payo madhyāhne baladāyakaṃ kaphaharaṃ kṛcchrasya vicchedakam /
GS40rajnighu:5020: bālye vahnikaraṃ tato balakaraṃ vīryapradaṃ vārddhake rātrau kṣīramanekadoṣaśamanaṃ sevyaṃ tataḥ sarvadā // Rajni_15.23
GS40rajnighu:5021: kṣīraṃ muhūrtatritayoṣitaṃ yad ataptam etad vikṛtiṃ prayāti /
GS40rajnighu:5022: uṣṇaṃ tu doṣaṃ kurute tadūrdhvaṃ viṣopamaṃ syād uṣitaṃ daśānām //
GS40rajnighu:5023: jīrṇajvare kaphe kṣīṇe kṣīraṃ syād amṛtopamam /
GS40rajnighu:5024: tadeva taruṇe pītaṃ viṣavaddhanti mānuṣam // Rajni_15.25
GS40rajnighu:5025: caturthabhāgaṃ salilaṃ nidhāya yatnād yad āvartitam uttamaṃ tat /
GS40rajnighu:5028: kṣīraṃ saśarkaraṃ pathyaṃ yad vā sātmye ca sarvadā // Rajni_15.27
GS40rajnighu:5029: pittaghnaṃ śṛtaśītalaṃ kaphaharaṃ pakvaṃ taduṣṇaṃ bhavecchītaṃ yattu na pācitaṃ tadakhilaṃ viṣṭambhadoṣapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5030: dhāroṣṇaṃ tv amṛtaṃ payaḥ śramaharaṃ nidrākaraṃ kāntidaṃ vṛṣyaṃ bṛṃhaṇam agnivardhanam atisvādu tridoṣāpaham // Rajni_15.28
GS40rajnighu:5031: kṣīraṃ na yuñjīta kadāpyataptaṃ taptaṃ na caitallavaṇena sārdham /
GS40rajnighu:5034: śākajāmbavarasaistu sevitaṃ mārayatyabudham āśu sarpavat // Rajni_15.30
GS40rajnighu:5035: snigdhaṃ śītaṃ guru kṣīraṃ sarvakālaṃ na sevayet /
GS40rajnighu:5036: dīptāgniṃ kurute mandaṃ mandāgniṃ naṣṭameva ca // Rajni_15.31
GS40rajnighu:5037: nityaṃ tīvrāgninā sevyaṃ supakvaṃ māhiṣaṃ payaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5040: rūkṣañca pittadāhaṃ karoti raktāmayaṃ kurute // Rajni_15.33
GS40rajnighu:5042: lavaṇaṃ madhuraṃ kṣīraṃ vidāhajananaṃ ciraprasūtānām // Rajni_15.34
GS40rajnighu:5044: madhyavayasāṃ rasāyanamuktamidaṃ durbalaṃ tu vṛddhānām // Rajni_15.35
GS40rajnighu:5046: taddāhi lavaṇaṃ kṣīraṃ madhuraṃ pittadoṣakṛt // Rajni_15.36
GS40rajnighu:5049: deśeṣu deśeṣu ca teṣu teṣu tṛṇāmbunī yādṛśadoṣayukte /
GS40rajnighu:5050: tatsevanādeva gavādikānāṃ guṇādi dugdhādiṣu tādṛśaṃ matam // Rajni_15.38
GS40rajnighu:5051: śītaṃ snigdhaṃ gurur gaulyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ pittāpahaṃ param /
GS40rajnighu:5052: jñeyā caivābhidhā tasya kīlāṭaṃ tu payaḥcchadaḥ // Rajni_15.39
GS40rajnighu:5053: dadhi gavyam atipavitraṃ śītaṃ snigdhaṃ ca dīpanaṃ balakṛt /
GS40rajnighu:5054: madhuramarocakahāri grāhi ca vātāmayaghnaṃ ca // Rajni_15.40
GS40rajnighu:5056: balāsravardhanaṃ vṛṣyaṃ śramaghnaṃ śodhanaṃ dadhi // Rajni_15.41
GS40rajnighu:5060: vāte ca raktavāte ca pathyaṃ śophavraṇāpaham // Rajni_15.43
GS40rajnighu:5064: vātālpadaṃ dīpanakāri netradoṣāpahaṃ tat kathitaṃ pṛthivyām // Rajni_15.45
GS40rajnighu:5068: nihanti kaṭukaṃ svādu kiṃcid amlarasaṃ dadhi // Rajni_15.47
GS40rajnighu:5069: vipāke madhuraṃ balyam amlaṃ saṃtarpaṇaṃ guru /
GS40rajnighu:5071: dadhyamlaṃ guru vātadoṣaśamanaṃ saṃgrāhi mūtrāvahaṃ balyaṃ śophakaraṃ ca rucyaśamanaṃ vahneśca śāntipradam /
GS40rajnighu:5072: kāsaśvāsasupīnaseṣu viṣame śītajvare syāddhitaṃ raktodrekakaraṃ karoti satataṃ śukrasya vṛddhiṃ parām // Rajni_15.49
GS40rajnighu:5073: dadhi madhuramīṣadamlaṃ madhurāmlaṃ vā hitaṃ na cātyuṣṇam /
GS40rajnighu:5074: yāvadyāvanmadhuraṃ doṣaharaṃ tāvad uktam idam // Rajni_15.50
GS40rajnighu:5076: na ca śaradi vasante noṣṇakāle na rātrau na dadhi kaphavikāre pittadoṣe 'pi nādyāt // Rajni_15.51
GS40rajnighu:5078: tuhinaśiśirakāle sevitaṃ cātipathyaṃ racayati tanudārḍhyaṃ kāntimattvaṃ ca nṝṇām // Rajni_15.52
GS40rajnighu:5079: uṣṇāmlaṃ rucipaktidaṃ klamaharaṃ balyaṃ kaṣāyaṃ saraṃ bhukticchedakaraṃ tṛṣodaragadaplīhārśasāṃ nāśanam /
GS40rajnighu:5080: srotaḥśuddhikaraṃ kaphānilaharaṃ viṣṭambhaśūlāpahaṃ pāṇḍuśvāsavikāragulmaśamanaṃ mastu praśastaṃ laghu // Rajni_15.53
GS40rajnighu:5081: uktaṃ śleṣmasamīrahāri mathitaṃ tat śleṣmapittāpahaṃ rucyaṃ prāhur udaśvidākhyam adhikaṃ takraṃ tridoṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5082: mandāgnāv arucau vidāhaviṣamaśvāsārtikāsādiṣu śreṣṭhaṃ pathyatamaṃ vadanti sudhiyas takratrayaṃ hy uttamam // Rajni_15.54
GS40rajnighu:5083: takraṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ rucidīpanīyaṃ rucyaṃ vamiśramaharaṃ klamahāri mastu
GS40rajnighu:5084: balyapradaṃ pavananāśam udaśvidākhyaṃ śastaṃ kaphaśramamarudvamaneṣu gholam // Rajni_15.55
GS40rajnighu:5085: amlena vātaṃ madhureṇa pittaṃ kaphaṃ kaṣāyeṇa nihanti sadyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5086: yathā surāṇām amṛtaṃ hitāya tathā narāṇām iha takramāhuḥ // Rajni_15.56
GS40rajnighu:5087: āmātisāre ca viṣūcikāyāṃ vātajvare pāṇḍuṣu kāmaleṣu /
GS40rajnighu:5088: pramehagulmodaravātaśūle nityaṃ pibet takram arocake ca // Rajni_15.57
GS40rajnighu:5095: takraṃ dadyānno kṣate noṣṇakāle no daurbalye no tṛṣāmūrchite ca /
GS40rajnighu:5096: naiva bhrāntau naiva pittāsradoṣe naitaddadyāt sūtikāyāṃ viśeṣāt //
GS40rajnighu:5098: ardhāvaśiṣṭaṃ sāmānyaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ laghu pathyadam // Rajni_15.62
GS40rajnighu:5099: śītaṃ varṇabalāvahaṃ sumadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca saṃgrāhakaṃ vātaghnaṃ kaphahārakaṃ rucikaraṃ sarvāṅgaśūlāpaham
GS40rajnighu:5100: kāsaghnaṃ śramanāśanaṃ sukhakaraṃ kāntipradaṃ puṣṭidaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ navanītam uddhṛtanavaṃ goḥ sarvadoṣāpaham // Rajni_15.63
GS40rajnighu:5101: gavyaṃ ca māhiṣaṃ cāpi navanītaṃ navodbhavam /
GS40rajnighu:5103: māhiṣaṃ navanītaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ rase /
GS40rajnighu:5104: śītaṃ vṛṣyapradaṃ grāhi pittaghnaṃ tu balapradam // Rajni_15.65
GS40rajnighu:5105: laghv ājaṃ tu madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ ca tridoṣanut /
GS40rajnighu:5106: cakṣuṣyaṃ dīpanaṃ balyaṃ navanītaṃ hitaṃ sadā // Rajni_15.66
GS40rajnighu:5108: balyaṃ netrāmayaghnaṃ ca kaphaghnaṃ dīpanaṃ param // Rajni_15.67
GS40rajnighu:5109: āvikaṃ navanītaṃ tu vipāke tu himaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5110: yoniśūle kaphe vāte durnāmni ca hitaṃ sadā // Rajni_15.68
GS40rajnighu:5111: aiḍakaṃ navanītaṃ tu kaṣāyaṃ śītalaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5112: medhāhṛdguru puṣṭyaṃ ca sthaulyaṃ mandāgnidīpanam // Rajni_15.69
GS40rajnighu:5114: tiktaṃ viṣṭambhi jantughnaṃ hanti pittakaphakrimīn // Rajni_15.70
GS40rajnighu:5116: cakṣuṣyaṃ kaṭukaṃ coṣṇam īṣad vātāpahārakam // Rajni_15.71
GS40rajnighu:5118: balyaṃ dīpanadaṃ pāke laghūṣṇaṃ mūtradoṣanut // Rajni_15.72
GS40rajnighu:5119: auṣṭraṃ tu navanītaṃ syādvipāke laghu śītalam /
GS40rajnighu:5121: navanītaṃ tu nārīṇāṃ rucyaṃ pāke laghu smṛtam /
GS40rajnighu:5123: śītaṃ rucyanavoddhṛtaṃ sumadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca vātāpahaṃ kāsaghnaṃ krimināśanaṃ kaphakaraṃ saṃgrāhi śūlāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5124: balyaṃ puṣṭikaraṃ tṛṣārtiśamanaṃ saṃtāpavicchedanaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ śramahāri tarpaṇakaraṃ dadhyudbhavaṃ pittajit // Rajni_15.75
GS40rajnighu:5126: ahṛdyaṃ sarvarogāḍhyaṃ dadhijaṃ tadghṛtaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_15.76
GS40rajnighu:5127: dhīkāntismṛtidāyakaṃ balakaraṃ medhāpradaṃ puṣṭikṛt vātaśleṣmaharaṃ śramopaśamanaṃ pittāpahaṃ hṛdyadam /
GS40rajnighu:5128: vahnervṛddhikaraṃ vipākamadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ vapuḥsthairyadaṃ gavyaṃ havyatamaṃ ghṛtaṃ bahuguṇaṃ bhogyaṃ bhavedbhāgyataḥ // Rajni_15.77
GS40rajnighu:5129: sarpirmāhiṣamuttamaṃ dhṛtikaraṃ saukhyapradaṃ kāntikṛt vātaśleṣmanibarhaṇaṃ balakaraṃ varṇapradāne kṣamam /
GS40rajnighu:5130: durnāmagrahaṇīvikāraśamanaṃ mandānaloddīpanaṃ cakṣuṣyaṃ navagavyataḥ paramidaṃ hṛdyaṃ manohāri ca // Rajni_15.78
GS40rajnighu:5134: yonidoṣe kaphe vāte śophe kampe ca taddhitam // Rajni_15.80
GS40rajnighu:5135: aiḍakaṃ ghṛtam atīva gauravād varjyamiva sukumāradehinām /
GS40rajnighu:5136: buddhipāṭavakaraṃ balāvahaṃ sevitaṃ ca kurute nṛṇāṃ vapuḥ // Rajni_15.81
GS40rajnighu:5138: kaṣāyaṃ laghu viṣṭambhi tiktaṃ cāgnikaraṃ param // Rajni_15.82
GS40rajnighu:5140: īṣad dīpanadaṃ mūrchāhāri vātālpadaṃ guru // Rajni_15.83
GS40rajnighu:5142: pāke laghūṣṇavīryaṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ kaphanāśanam // Rajni_15.84
GS40rajnighu:5143: ghṛtam auṣṭraṃ tu madhuraṃ vipāke kaṭuśītalam /
GS40rajnighu:5146: mandāgnidīpanaṃ rucyaṃ pāke laghu viṣāpaham // Rajni_15.86
GS40rajnighu:5149: āyurvṛddhiṃ vapuṣi dṛḍhatāṃ saukumāryaṃ ca kāntiṃ buddhiṃ dhatte smṛtibalakaraṃ śītavidhvaṃsanaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:5150: pathyaṃ bālye vayasi taruṇe vārddhake cātibalyaṃ nānyat kiṃcij jagati guṇadaṃ sarpiṣaḥ pathyamasti kāñjikaṃ kāñjikā vīraṃ kulmāṣābhibhavaṃ tathā /
GS40rajnighu:5155: dāhakaṃ gātraśaithilyaṃ mardanānna ca bhakṣaṇāt // Rajni_15.91
GS40rajnighu:5157: śākhāmlabhedanaṃ caivam amlasāraṃ ca cukrikā // Rajni_15.92
GS40rajnighu:5161: yavāmlajaṃ yavotthaṃ ca tuṣotthaṃ ca tuṣodakam // Rajni_15.94
GS40rajnighu:5175: āvikaṃ tiktakaṭukaṃ mūtram uṣṇaṃ ca kuṣṭhajit /
GS40rajnighu:5178: tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ śūlaghnaṃ hikkāśvāsaharaṃ param // Rajni_15.102
GS40rajnighu:5179: aśvamūtraṃ tu tiktoṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca viṣadoṣajit /
GS40rajnighu:5181: kharamūtraṃ kaṭūṣṇaṃ ca kṣāraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kaphāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5190: jyotiṣmatyabhayodbhavaṃ madhurikākośāmraciñcābhavaṃ karpūratrapusādijaṃ ca sakalaṃ siddhyai kramāt kathyate // Rajni_15.108
GS40rajnighu:5191: tilatailam alaṃkaroti keśaṃ madhuraṃ tiktakaṣāyam uṣṇatīkṣṇam /
GS40rajnighu:5196: tridoṣakṛtpuṣṭibalakṣayaṃ ca karoti kaṇḍūṃ ca karoti dṛṣṭeḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5206: śītalaṃ kāntidaṃ balyaṃ śleṣmalaṃ keśavardhanam // Rajni_15.116
GS40rajnighu:5208: ākṣaṃ svādu himaṃ keśyaṃ guru pittānilāpaham // Rajni_15.118
GS40rajnighu:5216: śiśiraṃ kaṭu puṃstvaghnaṃ keśyaṃ tvagdoṣanāśanam // Rajni_15.122
GS40rajnighu:5219: yacca ciñcībhavaṃ tailaṃ kaṭu pāke vilekhanam /
GS40rajnighu:5224: tanmadhuraṃ guru śiśiraṃ keśyaṃ kaphapittanāśi kāntikaram // Rajni_15.126
GS40rajnighu:5225: tailaṃ na sevayeddhīmān yasya kasya ca yadbhavet /
GS40rajnighu:5227: viṣasya tailasya na kiṃcid antaraṃ mṛtasya suptasya na kiṃcid antaram /
GS40rajnighu:5228: tṛṇasya dāsasya na kiṃcid antaraṃ mūrkhasya kāṣṭhasya na kiṃcid antaram //
GS40rajnighu:5230: vargaṃ nisargalalitojjvalaśabdasargaṃ buddhvā bhiṣakpatir aśaṅkatayā bhiṣajyet // Rajni_15.129
GS40rajnighu:5231: pātāram ātmanaḥ kila yānti pratyupacikīrṣayā yāni /
GS40rajnighu:5232: teṣām eva nivāsaḥ parikathitaḥ peyavarga iti kṛtibhiḥ // Rajni_15.130
GS40rajnighu:5233: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ madhuravimalāṃ śītalāṃ yasya kīrtisrotodhārāṃ jahati sujanā durjanāsaṃgadausthyam
GS40rajnighu:5234: vargastasya vrajati nṛharer nāmanirmāṇanāmnaś cūḍāratne khalu tithimitaḥ kṣīrakādiḥ samāptim Rājanighaṇṭu, Śālyādivarga dhānyaṃ bhogyaṃ ca bhogārhamannādyaṃ jīvasādhanam /
GS40rajnighu:5235: tacca tāvat tridhā jñeyaṃ śūkaśimbītṛṇāhvayam // Rajni_16.1
GS40rajnighu:5236: vrīhyādikaṃ yadiha śūkasamanvitaṃ syāt tacchūkadhānyam atha mudgamakuṣṭakādi /
GS40rajnighu:5237: śimbīnigūḍham iti tat pravadanti śimbīdhānyaṃ tṛṇodbhavatayā tṛṇadhānyam anyat // Rajni_16.2
GS40rajnighu:5239: śimbībhavaṃ guru himaṃ ca vibandhadāyi vātūlakaṃ tu śiśiraṃ tṛṇadhānyam āhuḥ // Rajni_16.3
GS40rajnighu:5240: deśe deśe śūkadhānyeṣu saṃkhyā jñātuṃ śakyā naiva taddaivatairvā /
GS40rajnighu:5241: tasmād eṣāṃ yeṣu bhogopayogās tānyasmābhir vyākriyante kiyanti //
GS40rajnighu:5243: dhānyottamāś ca vijñeyāḥ kaidārāḥ sukumārakāḥ // Rajni_16.5
GS40rajnighu:5245: vrīhis tatheti daśadhā bhuvi śālayastu teṣāṃ krameṇa guṇanāmagaṇaṃ bravīmi
GS40rajnighu:5246: rājānnaṃ dīrghaśūkaḥ kharipudivasajaṃ ṣaṣṭiko varṇato dvau niḥśūko muṇḍaśāliḥ svaguṇaviśaditaḥ svābhidhānāstrayo'nye /
GS40rajnighu:5247: māsair yo 'nyas tribhiḥ syāt sa bhavati nirapo yo 'pi vṛṣṭyambusambhūr eṣa syādvrīhisaṃjñastaditi daśavidhāḥ śālayastu prasiddhāḥ // Rajni_16.7
GS40rajnighu:5250: rājānnaṃ tu tridoṣaghnaṃ susnigdhaṃ madhuraṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5252: rājānnaṃ trividhaṃ svaśūkabhidayā jñeyaṃ sitaṃ lohitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ceti rasādhikaṃ ca tadidaṃ syād auttarottaryataḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5253: traividhyādiha taṇḍulāś ca haritāḥ śvetāstathā lohitāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti te 'pyatha guṇaiḥ syuḥ pūrvapūrvottarāḥ // Rajni_16.10
GS40rajnighu:5256: gauro nīlaḥ ṣaṣṭiko'yaṃ dvidhā syād ādyo rucyaḥ śītalo doṣahārī /
GS40rajnighu:5257: balyaḥ pathyo dīpano vīryavṛddhiṃ datte cāsmāt kiṃcid ūno dvitīyaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5262: raktaśāliḥ sumadhuro laghuḥ snigdho balāvahaḥ // Rajni_16.15
GS40rajnighu:5269: mahāśāliḥ svādurmadhuraśiśiraḥ pittaśamano jvaraṃ jīrṇaṃ dāhaṃ jaṭhararujam ahnāya śamayet
GS40rajnighu:5270: śiśūnāṃ yūnāṃ vā yadapi jaratāṃ vā hitakaraḥ sadā sevyaḥ sarvair analabalavīryāṇi kurute //
GS40rajnighu:5280: vrīhir gauro madhuraśiśiraḥ pittahārī kaṣāyaḥ snigdho vṛṣyaḥ kṛmikaphaharas tāparaktāpahaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:5281: puṣṭiṃ datte śramaśamanakṛd vīryavṛddhiṃ vidhatte rucyo 'tyantaṃ janayati mudaṃ vātakṛnmecako 'nyaḥ // Rajni_16.26
GS40rajnighu:5282: maṇḍakaḥ sthūlaśāliś ca syād bimbaśālikas tathā /
GS40rajnighu:5283: nijātiśāṇahulyāś ca bimbī kausendukas tathā // Rajni_16.27
GS40rajnighu:5285: rājānāṃ maulikasyāpi śāliḥ syād urvarī tathā // Rajni_16.28
GS40rajnighu:5290: vrīhisaṃdhānyam uddiṣṭaḥ ardhadhānyas tu vrīhikaḥ // Rajni_16.30
GS40rajnighu:5292: sudhānyaṃ pathyakārī ca mupaviḥ prajñavipriyaḥ // Rajni_16.31
GS40rajnighu:5298: tṛṣṇāghno malakṛcchraghno hṛdyastu matidāḥ pare // Rajni_16.35
GS40rajnighu:5300: gandhāḍhyā gandhamālyā ca gandhānī gandhamālinī // Rajni_16.36
GS40rajnighu:5303: raktāṅgulaṃ sukāraṃ ca kuṅkumaṃ samavarṇajā // Rajni_16.38
GS40rajnighu:5306: madhurā ca sugandhā ca tilavāsī nigadyate // Rajni_16.40
GS40rajnighu:5308: tilanī tilaparṇī ca āmagandhā pravāsinī // Rajni_16.41
GS40rajnighu:5316: kalāṭakaḥ kavilaḥ syād guruso garuḍaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5324: saurabhaṃ śuṇḍikaḥ śuṇḍī kausumbhī kaṭhino 'phalaḥ // Rajni_16.50
GS40rajnighu:5328: umpikā madhurā snigdhā sugandhā ca kaṣāyakā /
GS40rajnighu:5333: kiṃcit satiktā madhurāḥ pācanā balavardhanāḥ // Rajni_16.55
GS40rajnighu:5336: śālayo ye chinnaruhā rūkṣās te baddhavarcasaḥ // Rajni_16.57
GS40rajnighu:5348: sa raktayāvanālo hitalohitas tuvaradhānyaś ca // Rajni_16.63
GS40rajnighu:5352: śiśiro madhuro vṛṣyo doṣaghno balapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.65
GS40rajnighu:5354: yavano nistuṣaḥ kṣīrī rasālaḥ sumanaśca saḥ // Rajni_16.66
GS40rajnighu:5356: guruḥ śleṣmāmado balyo ruciro vīryavardhanaḥ // Rajni_16.67
GS40rajnighu:5360: syāt tīkṣṇaśūkas turagapriyaś ca saktur hayeṣṭaś ca pavitradhānyam //
GS40rajnighu:5361: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuraḥ suśītalaḥ pramehajit tiktakaphāpahārakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5362: aśūkamuṇḍas tu yavo balaprado vṛṣyaśca nṝṇāṃ bahuvīryapuṣṭidaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5365: śītaḥ kaṣāyo madhuras tu rūkṣo mehakrimiśleṣmaviṣāpahaś ca /
GS40rajnighu:5366: puṣṭiṃ ca vīryaṃ ca balaṃ ca datte pittāpaho veṇuyavaḥ praśastaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5369: kṛṣṇamudgas tu vāsanto mādhavaś ca surāṣṭrajaḥ // Rajni_16.74
GS40rajnighu:5371: laghuś ca dīpanaḥ pathyo balavīryāṅgapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_16.75
GS40rajnighu:5372: śāradas tu harinmudgo dhūsaro 'nyaśca śāradaḥ // Rajni_16.76
GS40rajnighu:5377: pittajvarārtiśamanaṃ laghu mudgayūṣaṃ saṃtāpahāri tad arocakanāśanaṃ ca /
GS40rajnighu:5378: raktaprasādanam idaṃ yadi saindhavena yuktaṃ tadā bhavati sarvarujāpahāri // Rajni_16.79
GS40rajnighu:5380: māṃsalaś ca balāḍhyaś ca pitryaś ca pitṛjottamaḥ // Rajni_16.80
GS40rajnighu:5381: māṣaḥ snigdho bahumalakaraḥ śoṣaṇaḥ śleṣmakārī vīryeṇoṣṇo jhaṭiti kurute raktapittaprakopam
GS40rajnighu:5382: hanyādvātaṃ gurubalakaro rocano bhakṣyamāṇaḥ svādur nityaṃ śramasukhavatāṃ sevanīyo narāṇām rājamāṣo nīlamāṣo nṛpamāṣo nṛpocitaḥ // Rajni_16.82
GS40rajnighu:5385: bālabhojyo vājibhakṣaś caṇakaḥ kañcukī ca saḥ // Rajni_16.84
GS40rajnighu:5389: gaulyo 'śmarīśoṣavināśakārī kaṣāya īṣat kaṭur vīryakārī // Rajni_16.86
GS40rajnighu:5392: caṇo gaurastu madhuro balakṛd rocanaḥ paraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5393: śveto vātakaro rucyaḥ pittaghnaḥ śiśiro guruḥ // Rajni_16.88
GS40rajnighu:5396: caṇasya yūṣaṃ madhuraṃ kaṣāyaṃ kaphāpahaṃ vātavikārahetuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5399: puṣṭipradaṃ naijaguṇaṃ ca pāke saṃtarpaṇaṃ mañjulamādhurīkam //
GS40rajnighu:5401: amṛto 'raṇyamudgaś ca vallīmudgaś ca kīrtitaḥ // Rajni_16.92
GS40rajnighu:5405: śūraḥ kalyāṇabījaś ca gurubījo masūrakaḥ // Rajni_16.94
GS40rajnighu:5409: trāsano nālakaḥ kaṇṭhī satīnaś ca hareṇukaḥ // Rajni_16.96
GS40rajnighu:5412: laṅkā karālā tripuṭā kāṇḍikā rūkṣaṇātmikā // Rajni_16.98
GS40rajnighu:5413: laṅkā rucyā himā gaulyā pittajid vātakṛdguruḥ // Rajni_16.99
GS40rajnighu:5415: vṛttabījā pītapuṣpā śvetā raktāsitā tridhā // Rajni_16.100
GS40rajnighu:5416: āḍhakī tu kaṣāyā ca madhurā kaphapittajit /
GS40rajnighu:5417: īṣad vātakarā rucyā vidalā gurugrāhikā // Rajni_16.101
GS40rajnighu:5418: sā ca śvetā doṣadātrī tu raktā rucyā balyā pittatāpādihantrī /
GS40rajnighu:5419: sā śyāmā ced dīpanī pittadāhadhvaṃsā balyaṃ cāḍhakīyūṣam uktam //
GS40rajnighu:5420: kulitthas tāmrabījaś ca śvetabījaḥ sitetaraḥ // Rajni_16.103
GS40rajnighu:5423: sukumāro vṛttabījo madhuraḥ kṣavakaśca saḥ // Rajni_16.105
GS40rajnighu:5427: palaṃkaṣā sthūlaśimbī vṛttā madhusitā sitā // Rajni_16.107
GS40rajnighu:5432: vātalaḥ kaphado rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo viṣadoṣanut // Rajni_16.110
GS40rajnighu:5434: pāpaghnaḥ pūtadhānyaṃ ca jaṭilastu vanodbhavaḥ // Rajni_16.111
GS40rajnighu:5437: saṃgrāhī madhuraḥ kaṣāyasahitastikto vipāke kaṭuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pathyatamaḥ
GS40rajnighu:5439: palalaṃ tilakalkaṃ syāttilacūrṇaṃ ca piṣṭakam // Rajni_16.113
GS40rajnighu:5441: tilakiṭṭaṃ tu piṇyākaḥ khalaḥ syāt tilakalkajaḥ // Rajni_16.115
GS40rajnighu:5444: umā kṣumā haimavatī sunīlā nīlapuṣpikā // Rajni_16.117
GS40rajnighu:5448: tīkṣṇagandhā madhurikā kṣavakaḥ kṣuvakaḥ kṣavaḥ // Rajni_16.119
GS40rajnighu:5452: sā kṛṣṇasarṣapākhyā vijñeyā rājasarṣapākhyā ca // Rajni_16.121
GS40rajnighu:5459: dhānyānāṃ kañcuke śimbī bījaguptiś ca śāmbhavī /
GS40rajnighu:5460: tadguptāni ca dhānyāni śimbīdhānyāni cakṣate // Rajni_16.125
GS40rajnighu:5462: sukumārī rājadhānyaṃ tṛṇabījottamaś ca saḥ // Rajni_16.126
GS40rajnighu:5466: sa ca deśaviśeṣeṇa nānābhedaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_16.128
GS40rajnighu:5469: varakaḥ sthūlakaṅguś ca rūkṣaḥ sthūlapriyaṅgukaḥ // Rajni_16.130
GS40rajnighu:5470: varako madhuro rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyo vātapittakṛt // Rajni_16.131
GS40rajnighu:5472: vātalaḥ sukumāraśca sa ca nānāvidhābhidhaḥ // Rajni_16.132
GS40rajnighu:5476: nīvāro madhuraḥ snigdhaḥ pavitraḥ pathyado laghuḥ // Rajni_16.135
GS40rajnighu:5477: rāgī tu lāñchanaḥ syād bahudalakaṇiśaś ca gucchakaṇiśaś ca // Rajni_16.136
GS40rajnighu:5478: tikto madhurakaṣāyaḥ śītaḥ pittāsranāśano baladaḥ // Rajni_16.137
GS40rajnighu:5480: haritaṃ vārddhakaṃ pakvaṃ vājināṃ puṣṭidāyakam // Rajni_16.138
GS40rajnighu:5481: ye ke ca vrīhayo bhṛṣṭāste lājā iti kīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.139
GS40rajnighu:5482: yavādayaśca ye bhṛṣṭā dhānāste parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.140
GS40rajnighu:5483: lājā ca yavadhānā ca tarpaṇī pittanāśinī /
GS40rajnighu:5486: ākulā guravo vṛṣyā madhurāḥ balakāriṇaḥ // Rajni_16.142
GS40rajnighu:5487: vrīhayo 'pyardhapakvāś ca taptās te pṛthukāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5488: pṛthukāḥ svādavaḥ snigdhā hṛdyā madanavardhanāḥ // Rajni_16.143
GS40rajnighu:5489: pūpalā madhurāḥ proktā vṛṣyāste baladāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5491: ye cānye yāvanālādyāś cipiṭās taptataṇḍulāḥ // Rajni_16.145
GS40rajnighu:5495: taptāstu mudgacaṇakāḥ sumanādilaṅkā sadyas tṛṣārtirucipittakṛtaś ca jagdhāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5496: vātālpadāḥ sukhakarā hy abalāśca rūkṣā hṛdyā bhavanti yuvajarjarabālakānām // Rajni_16.149
GS40rajnighu:5500: sphoṭas tu caṇakādīnāṃ dāl iti parikīrtitāḥ // Rajni_16.152
GS40rajnighu:5501: pakvaṃ haritalūnaṃ ca dhānyaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_16.153
GS40rajnighu:5502: śuṣkalūnaṃ tu niḥsāraṃ rūkṣaṃ tatsattvanāśanam // Rajni_16.154
GS40rajnighu:5503: koṣadhānyaṃ navaṃ balyaṃ madhuraṃ vatsaroṣitam // Rajni_16.155
GS40rajnighu:5505: dvyabdoṣitaṃ laghu pathyaṃ trivarṣādabalaṃ bhavet // Rajni_16.156
GS40rajnighu:5508: dhānyaṃ vāpitamuttamaṃ tadakhilaṃ chinnodbhavaṃ madhyamaṃ jñeyaṃ yadyadavāpitaṃ tadadhamaṃ niḥsāradoṣapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5509: dagdhāyāṃ bhuvi yatnato'pi vipine ye vāpitāḥ śālayo ye ca chinnabhavā bhavanti khalu te viṇmūtrabandhapradāḥ kṣārodakasamutpannaṃ dhānyaṃ śleṣmarujāpaham // Rajni_16.159
GS40rajnighu:5512: dhānyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ṣaṣṭikaṃ rājabhogyaṃ māṃsaṃ tv ājaṃ taittiraṃ lāvakīyam /
GS40rajnighu:5513: pānīyaṃ syāt kṛṣṇamṛtsnāsamutthaṃ kṣīrājyādau gavyamājaṃ praśastam //
GS40rajnighu:5515: āmnāya vargam imam āśu labheta vaidyo vidyāṃ viṣaṇṇajanajīvanadānadhanyām // Rajni_16.163
GS40rajnighu:5516: yāni sadā bhujyante bhuñjānajanāśca yāni bhuñjante /
GS40rajnighu:5517: teṣāṃ khalu dhānyānāṃ vargo 'yaṃ bhojyavarga iti kathitaḥ // Rajni_16.164
GS40rajnighu:5518: yenācāracaṇena mugdhamadhuraśrīśālinā sanmahāmānārhā bahudhānyasampaducitā saṃnīyate saṃtatam
GS40rajnighu:5519: tena śrīnṛharīśvareṇa racite nāmokticūḍāmaṇau vargo 'yaṃ sthitam eti nūtanaracano dhānyāhvayaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ // Rajni_16.165
GS40rajnighu:5520: Rājanighaṇṭu, Māṃsādivarga māṃsaṃ tu piśitaṃ kravyaṃ palaṃ tu rasyamasrajam /
GS40rajnighu:5521: palalaṃ jāṅgalaṃ kīram āmiṣaṃ ca tad ucyate // Rajni_17.1
GS40rajnighu:5522: sadyohatasya māṃsaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ hariṇādikasya yūnas tu /
GS40rajnighu:5523: jñeyaṃ sugandhi pathyaṃ jāṅgaladeśasthitasya pathyatamam // Rajni_17.2
GS40rajnighu:5524: bālasya vṛddhasya kṛśasya rogiṇo viṣāgnidagdhasya mṛtasya cāmbuṣu /
GS40rajnighu:5525: tyājyaṃ mṛgādeḥ piśitaṃ tu tasya vigandhi śuṣkaṃ ca cirasthitaṃ ca //
GS40rajnighu:5526: sarvaṃ māṃsaṃ vātavidhvaṃsi vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ rucyaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ tacca māṃsam /
GS40rajnighu:5528: tatrānūpīyamāṃsaṃ gavayarurumṛgakroḍagaṇḍādikānāṃ snigdhaṃ pathyaṃ ca balyaṃ laghu śaśaśikharādyudbhavaṃ jāṅgalīyam /
GS40rajnighu:5529: puṣṭiṃ dīptiṃ ca datte rucikṛdatha laghu svādu sādhāraṇīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ balyaṃ ca rucyaṃ ruruhariṇamṛgakroḍasāraṅgakāṇām māṃsaṃ sārasahaṃsarātrivirahikrauñcādijaṃ śītalaṃ snigdhaṃ vātakaphāpahaṃ guru tataḥ svādu tridoṣāpaham /
GS40rajnighu:5530: pathyaṃ lāvakatittirādijanitaṃ vṛṣyaṃ laghu syāt paraṃ cakrakrauñcamayūratittirabhavaṃ deśatrayādīdṛśam druto vilambitaś caiva plavaś ceti gatais trayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5531: sthānato 'pi trayas te tu bilasthalajalāśrayāḥ // Rajni_17.7
GS40rajnighu:5532: punaste tu prasahanāḥ pratudā viṣkirā iti /
GS40rajnighu:5535: evaṃ navavidhāḥ proktās ta eva mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Rajni_17.9
GS40rajnighu:5536: ajaśaśahariṇādayaḥ svayaṃ ye drutagamanā drutasaṃjñakāḥ smṛtāste /
GS40rajnighu:5537: taduditapalalaṃ ca pathyabalyaṃ racayati vīryamadapradaṃ laghu syāt //
GS40rajnighu:5539: balakṛtpiśitaṃ ca picchalaṃ kaphakāsānilamāndyadaṃ guru syāt //
GS40rajnighu:5541: plavasaṃjñāḥ kathitāste tanmāṃsaṃ gurūṣṇaṃ ca baladāyi // Rajni_17.12
GS40rajnighu:5545: sthaleśayāstu te sarve māṃsaṃ sarvaguṇāvaham // Rajni_17.14
GS40rajnighu:5547: māṃsaṃ teṣāṃ tu saraṃ vṛṣyaṃ guru śiśirabalasamīrakaram // Rajni_17.15
GS40rajnighu:5549: te kīrtitāḥ prasahanāḥ palalaṃ tadīyam arśaḥpramehajaṭharāmayajāḍyahāri //
GS40rajnighu:5550: bhoktā niṣkṛṣyāmiṣaṃ sa pratudaḥ prokto gṛdhraśyenakākādiko yaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5551: māṃsaṃ tasya svādu saṃtarpaṇaṃ ca snigdhaṃ balyaṃ pittadāhāsradāyi //
GS40rajnighu:5552: bhakṣyāśca kukkuṭakapotakatittirādyāḥ kṣauṇīṃ vilikhya nakharaiḥ khalu vartayanti /
GS40rajnighu:5553: te viṣkirāḥ prakathitāḥ piśitaṃ tadīyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ kaṣāyamadhuraṃ śiśiraṃ ca rucyam // Rajni_17.18
GS40rajnighu:5554: ayameva guṇo jñeyaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ ca yathākramam /
GS40rajnighu:5555: sarvasthānaviśeṣeṇa saṃkhyā ca gatir ucyate // Rajni_17.19
GS40rajnighu:5556: yatra sthitā ye gatito 'pi deśādanyatra yātā mṛgapakṣimukhyāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5558: māṃsaṃ khaḍgamṛgotthaṃ tu balakṛd bṛṃhaṇaṃ guru // Rajni_17.21
GS40rajnighu:5559: gavayasyāmiṣaṃ balyaṃ rucyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca bṛṃhaṇam // Rajni_17.22
GS40rajnighu:5561: apūtaṃ gobhavaṃ kravyaṃ guru vātakaphapradam // Rajni_17.24
GS40rajnighu:5562: vanamahiṣāmiṣaṃ syād īṣallaghu dīpanaṃ ca baladāyi // Rajni_17.25
GS40rajnighu:5563: grāmīṇamahiṣamāṃsaṃ snigdhaṃ nidrākaraṃ ca pittaharam // Rajni_17.26
GS40rajnighu:5566: aśvamāṃsaṃ bhaved uṣṇaṃ vātaghnaṃ baladaṃ laghu /
GS40rajnighu:5571: rucyaṃ tu vanyajaṃ śaityaṃ bahuvīryabalapradam // Rajni_17.30
GS40rajnighu:5572: eṇasya māṃsaṃ laghuśītavṛṣyaṃ tridoṣahṛt ṣaḍrasajaṃ ca rucyam //
GS40rajnighu:5573: kuraṅgamāṃsaṃ madhuraṃ ca tadvat kaphāpahaṃ māṃsadapittanāśi //
GS40rajnighu:5574: sāraṅgaṃ jāṅgalaṃ snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ laghu vṛṣyakam // Rajni_17.33
GS40rajnighu:5575: śikharīsambhavaṃ māṃsaṃ laghu hṛdyaṃ balapradam // Rajni_17.34
GS40rajnighu:5576: varāhamāṃsaṃ guru vātahāri vṛṣyaṃ balasvedakaraṃ vanottham // Rajni_17.35
GS40rajnighu:5577: tasmādguru grāmavarāhamāṃsaṃ tanoti medo balavīryavṛddhim // Rajni_17.36
GS40rajnighu:5578: śaraśṛṅgasya māṃsaṃ tu guru snigdhaṃ kaphapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5583: īṣallaghu balaṃ datte tad eva tṛṇacāriṇaḥ // Rajni_17.39
GS40rajnighu:5584: aurabhraṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ guru viṣṭambhi bṛṃhaṇam // Rajni_17.40
GS40rajnighu:5585: āvikaṃ madhuraṃ māṃsaṃ kiṃcid guru balapradam // Rajni_17.41
GS40rajnighu:5586: śalyamāṃsaṃ guru snigdhaṃ dīpanaṃ śvāsakāsajit // Rajni_17.42
GS40rajnighu:5587: picchilaṃ nākulaṃ māṃsaṃ vātaghnaṃ śleṣmapittakṛt // Rajni_17.43
GS40rajnighu:5588: godhāmāṃsaṃ tu vātaghnaṃ śvāsakāsaharaṃ ca tat // Rajni_17.44
GS40rajnighu:5591: māṃsaṃ ca garhitaṃ teṣāṃ māndyaṃ gauravadurjaram // Rajni_17.46
GS40rajnighu:5593: grāmyakukkuṭajaṃ snigdhaṃ vātahṛd dīpanaṃ guru // Rajni_17.48
GS40rajnighu:5599: kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ śītaṃ tridoṣaśamanaṃ param // Rajni_17.52
GS40rajnighu:5600: tadvacca lāvakaṃ māṃsaṃ pathyaṃ grāhi laghu smṛtam // Rajni_17.53
GS40rajnighu:5602: caṭakāyāḥ palaṃ śītaṃ laghu vṛṣyaṃ balapradam // Rajni_17.55
GS40rajnighu:5605: tadvaccakorajaṃ māṃsaṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca balapuṣṭidam // Rajni_17.58
GS40rajnighu:5606: kravyaṃ tu cakravākasya laghu snigdhaṃ balapradam /
GS40rajnighu:5610: snigdhahimaṃ guru vṛṣyaṃ māṃsaṃ jalapakṣiṇāṃ tu vātaharam // Rajni_17.61
GS40rajnighu:5611: teṣvapi ca haṃsamāṃsaṃ vṛṣyatamaṃ timiraharaṇaṃ ca // Rajni_17.62
GS40rajnighu:5613: anuktaṃ tu mṛgādīnāṃ māṃsaṃ grāhyaṃ hitādiṣu // Rajni_17.63
GS40rajnighu:5617: chāgalo raktamatsyo 'tha mahiṣaś cāvilas tathā // Rajni_17.65
GS40rajnighu:5620: kṛṣṇaḥ śalkī śvetakukṣistu matsyo yaḥ śreṣṭho'sau rohito vṛttavaktraḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5621: koṣṇaṃ balyaṃ rohitasyāpi māṃsaṃ vātaṃ hanti snigdhamāpnoti vīryam //
GS40rajnighu:5622: yaḥ pītavarṇo 'pi ca picchilāṅgaḥ pṛṣṭhe tu rekhābahulaḥ saśalkaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5623: sa gargaro barbaranādarūkṣo jaḍaś ca śītaḥ kaphavātadāyī // Rajni_17.68
GS40rajnighu:5624: pṛṣṭhe pakṣau dvau gale pucchakaṃ cet sarpābhaḥ syāt phūtkṛto vṛttatuṇḍaḥ
GS40rajnighu:5625: jñeyaḥ śalkī matsyako bhīruruktaḥ snigdho vṛṣyo durjaro vātakārī //
GS40rajnighu:5626: nātisthūlo vṛttavaktro'pi śasto dhatte dantān śmaśrulo dīrghakāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5627: saṃdhyāyāṃ vā rātriśeṣe ca varyaḥ prokto bālaḥ pathyabalyaḥ suvṛṣyaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5628: pṛṣṭhe kukṣau kaṇṭakī dīrghatuṇḍaḥ sarpābho yaḥ so 'pyayaṃ barbarākhyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5629: vātāṭopaṃ so 'pi datte jaḍaś ca balyaḥ snigdho durjaro vīryakārī //
GS40rajnighu:5630: śvetaṃ sukāyaṃ samadīrghavṛttaṃ niḥśalkakaṃ chāgalakaṃ vadanti /
GS40rajnighu:5631: nale dvikaṇṭaḥ kila tasya pṛṣṭhe kaṇṭaḥ supathyo rucido balapradaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5632: yo raktāṅgo nātidīrgho na cālpo nātisthūlo raktamatsyaḥ sa coktaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5633: śīto rucyaḥ puṣṭikṛddīpano'sau nāśaṃ dhatte kiṃca doṣatrayasya //
GS40rajnighu:5634: yaḥ kṛṣṇo dīrghakāyaḥ syāt sthūlaśalko balādhikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5637: surucyo madhuro balyo guṇāḍhyo vīryapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_17.75
GS40rajnighu:5638: yaḥ sthūlāṅgo māhiṣākārako yas tālusthāne nīrajābhāṃ dadhāti /
GS40rajnighu:5639: śalkaṃ sthūlaṃ yasya vātūkako 'sau datte vīryaṃ dīpanaṃ vṛṣyadāyī //
GS40rajnighu:5642: yo vṛttagaulyaḥ kṛṣṇāṅgaḥ śalkī karṇavaśābhidhaḥ // Rajni_17.78
GS40rajnighu:5643: dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ pathyo vṛṣyo 'sau balapuṣṭidaḥ // Rajni_17.79
GS40rajnighu:5644: niḥśalkā ninditā matsyāḥ sarve śalkayutā hitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5647: te tu jaḍā nādeyā yathottaraṃ laghutarāstu nādeyāḥ // Rajni_17.81
GS40rajnighu:5649: tānaśnatāṃ svādujalasthitā api jñeyā jaḍāste'pi tathā śṛtānimān //
GS40rajnighu:5650: śailāṭavīnagarabhūjalacāriṇo ye ye ke 'pi sattvanivahāḥ khalu saptasaṃkhyāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5651: tanmāṃsamatra na vitathyam athābhyadhāyi granthasya vistarabhayācca navopayogāt // Rajni_17.83
GS40rajnighu:5654: pūrvārdhaṃ puruṣasya tadgurutaraṃ paścārdhabhāgaḥ striyāḥ strī gurvī kila gurviṇī yadi tathā yoṣicca tulyā laghuḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5655: pakṣī cetpuruṣo laghuḥ śṛṇu śiraḥskandhorupṛṣṭhe kramāt māṃsaṃ yacca kaṭisthitaṃ tadakhilaṃ gurveva sarvātmanā // Rajni_17.85
GS40rajnighu:5656: rasaraktādidhātūnāṃ guruḥ syāduttarottaram meḍhravṛkkayakṛnmāṃsaṃ vārṣaṇaṃ cātimātrataḥ //
GS40rajnighu:5658: vargaṃ vicārya bhiṣajā viniyujyamāno bhuktvāśanaṃ na vikṛtiṃ samupaiti martyaḥ // Rajni_17.87
GS40rajnighu:5660: tasyāyaṃ puruṣapratāpasuhṛdaḥ śrīmannṛsiṃheśitur vargaḥ saptadaśo niṣīdati kṛtau nāmādicūḍāmaṇau Rājanighaṇṭu, Manuṣyādivargaḥ manuṣyā mānuṣā martyā manujā mānavā narāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5661: dvipādāś cetanā bhūsthā bhūmijā bhūspṛśo viśaḥ // Rajni_18.1
GS40rajnighu:5662: puruṣaḥ pūruṣo nā ca naraḥ pañcajanaḥ pumān /
GS40rajnighu:5663: arthāśrayo 'dhikārī syāt karmārhaś ca jano 'rthavān // Rajni_18.2
GS40rajnighu:5664: strī yoṣidvanitābalā sunayanā nārī ca sīmantinī rāmā vāmadṛgaṅganā ca lalanā kāntā puraṃdhrī vadhūḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5665: subhrūḥ sā varavarṇinī ca sutanustanvī tanuḥ kāminī tanvaṅgī ramaṇī kuraṅganayanā bhīruḥ priyā bhāminī // Rajni_18.3
GS40rajnighu:5666: yoṣinmahelā mahilā vilāsinī nitambinī sāpi ca mattakāśinī /
GS40rajnighu:5667: janī sunetrā pramadā ca sundarī syād añcitabhrūr lalitā vilāsinī //
GS40rajnighu:5668: māninī ca varārohā natāṅgī ca natodarā /
GS40rajnighu:5669: pratīpadarśinī śyāmā kāminī darśanī ca sā // Rajni_18.5
GS40rajnighu:5670: bhartā patirvaraḥ kāntaḥ pariṇetā priyo gṛhī // Rajni_18.6
GS40rajnighu:5671: bhāryā patnī priyā jāyā dārāśca gṛhiṇī ca sā // Rajni_18.7
GS40rajnighu:5673: ṣaṇḍḥaḥ paṇḍaśca nārī tu poṭā strīpuṃsalakṣaṇā // Rajni_18.8
GS40rajnighu:5674: atha rājñī ca paṭṭārhā mahiṣī rājavallabhā // Rajni_18.9
GS40rajnighu:5675: bhoginyo 'nyā vilāsinyaḥ saṃbhuṅkte yāstu pārthivaḥ // Rajni_18.10
GS40rajnighu:5676: rājabhogyāḥ sumukhyo yāstā bhaṭṭinya iti smṛtāḥ // Rajni_18.11
GS40rajnighu:5677: veśyā tu gaṇikā bhogyā vārastrī smaradīpikā // Rajni_18.12
GS40rajnighu:5678: brahmā tu brāhmaṇo vipraḥ ṣaṭkarmā ca dvijottamaḥ // Rajni_18.13
GS40rajnighu:5679: rājā tu sārvabhaumaḥ syāt pārthivaḥ kṣatriyo nṛpaḥ // Rajni_18.14
GS40rajnighu:5680: vaiśyastu vyavahartā viḍ vārttiko vāṇijo vaṇik // Rajni_18.15
GS40rajnighu:5681: śūdraḥ pajjaścaturthaḥ syāt dvijadāsa upāsakaḥ // Rajni_18.16
GS40rajnighu:5682: vipraḥ kṣatro vaiśyaśūdrau ca varṇāścatvāro'mī tatra pūrve dvijāḥ syuḥ /

GS40rajnighu:5718: śaṅkhaḥ karṇasamīpaḥ syāt śiṅghāṇaṃ nāsikāmale // Rajni_18.39
GS40rajnighu:5719: tuṇḍamāsyaṃ mukhaṃ vaktraṃ vadanaṃ lapanānane // Rajni_18.40
GS40rajnighu:5720: oṣṭhādharastu cibukaṃ gaṇḍo gallaḥ kapolakaḥ // Rajni_18.41
GS40rajnighu:5721: hanūs tadūrdhvaṃ daśanāśca dantā dvijā radāste radanāstathoktāḥ //

GS40rajnighu:5726: grīvā ca kaṃdharā kaṃdhiḥ śirodhiśca śirodharā // Rajni_18.47
GS40rajnighu:5727: kaṇṭho galo nigālo'tha ghaṇṭikā galaśuṇṭhikā // Rajni_18.48
GS40rajnighu:5728: dhamanī tu śirāṃse tu skandho'dhaḥśikharaṃ tathā // Rajni_18.49
GS40rajnighu:5729: tasya saṃdhis tu jatru syātkakṣā dormūlasaṃjñakā // Rajni_18.50
GS40rajnighu:5731: dor doṣā ca praveṣṭaśca bāhurbāhā bhujo bhujā // Rajni_18.52
GS40rajnighu:5732: pāṇis tu pañcaśākhaḥ syāt karo hastaḥ śayastathā // Rajni_18.53
GS40rajnighu:5733: karamūle maṇibandho bhujamadhye kūrparaḥ kaphoṇiśca // Rajni_18.54
GS40rajnighu:5734: tasmādadhaḥ prakoṣṭhaḥ pragaṇḍakaḥ kūrparāṃsamadhyaṃ syāt // Rajni_18.55
GS40rajnighu:5735: aṅgulyaḥ karaśākhāḥ syuḥ pradeśinyāṃ tu tarjanī /
GS40rajnighu:5736: paruḥ syādaṅgulīsaṃdhiḥ parvasaṃdhiś ca kathyate // Rajni_18.56
GS40rajnighu:5738: kaniṣṭhā ceti pañca syuḥ krameṇāṅgulayaḥ smṛtāḥ // Rajni_18.57
GS40rajnighu:5744: stanāgraṃ cūcukaṃ vṛttaṃ śikhā stanamukhaṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.61
GS40rajnighu:5745: vakṣo vatsamuraḥ kroḍo hṛdayaṃ hṛdbhujāntaram // Rajni_18.62
GS40rajnighu:5746: kukṣiḥ piciṇḍo jaṭharaṃ tundaṃ syādudaraṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.63
GS40rajnighu:5747: jīvasthānaṃ tu marma syātkaṭiprānte trikaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_18.64
GS40rajnighu:5749: vastiśca vātaśīrṣaṃ syād garbhasthānaṃ ca tat striyāḥ // Rajni_18.65
GS40rajnighu:5750: garbhāśayo jarāyuśca garbhādhāraśca ca smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.66
GS40rajnighu:5752: pakvāśayo hy adho nābhervastirmūtrāśayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.68
GS40rajnighu:5757: kaṭiprothau sphicau pāyur gudāpānaṃ tadāsanam // Rajni_18.71
GS40rajnighu:5758: gudamuṣkadvayormadhye yo bhāgaḥ sa bhagaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.72
GS40rajnighu:5760: śiśnaṃ śephaśca liṅgaṃ ca meḍhraṃ sādhanamehane // Rajni_18.74
GS40rajnighu:5762: ūrū tu sakthinī śroṇisakthnoḥ saṃdhis tu vaṅkṣaṇaḥ /

GS40rajnighu:5767: vikramaścaraṇaḥ pādaḥ pādāṅghriś ca padaṃ kramaḥ // Rajni_18.80
GS40rajnighu:5769: karo bhavet saṃhitavistṛtāṅgulas talaś capeṭaḥ pratalaḥ prahastakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5771: syāt tarjanī madhyamikā tv anāmikā kaniṣṭhikāṅguṣṭhayutā yadā tadā /
GS40rajnighu:5772: prādeśatālābhidhagosravas tathā vitastir atyartham iha kramādiyam //
GS40rajnighu:5773: hastas tu vistṛte pāṇāv ā madhyāṅgulikūrparam // Rajni_18.84
GS40rajnighu:5774: baddhamuṣṭau saratniḥ syād aratnir akaniṣṭhakaḥ // Rajni_18.85
GS40rajnighu:5776: ūrdhvaṃ vistṛtadoṣpāṇir nṛmānaṃ pauruṣaṃ viduḥ // Rajni_18.86

GS40rajnighu:5780: vaidyāḥ śarekṣaṇamitāni vadanti marmasthānāni cāṅgagatināśakarāṇi martye
GS40rajnighu:5781: lālā bhavenmukhasrāvaḥ sṛṇikā syandinī ca sā // Rajni_18.90

GS40rajnighu:5783: malaṃ viṣṭhā purīṣaṃ ca viṭ kiṭṭaṃ pūtikaṃ ca tat /

GS40rajnighu:5785: valī carmataraṃgaḥ syāt tvagūrmis tvaktaraṃgakaḥ // Rajni_18.93
GS40rajnighu:5786: palitaṃ ca jarā lakṣma keśaśauklyaṃ ca tadbhavet // Rajni_18.94
GS40rajnighu:5788: śarīrasthairyadāḥ samyak vijñeyāḥ sapta dhātavaḥ // Rajni_18.95
GS40rajnighu:5792: śoṇitaṃ lohitaṃ cāsṛk śoṇaṃ lohaṃ ca carmajam // Rajni_18.97
GS40rajnighu:5793: māṃsaṃ tu piśitaṃ kravyaṃ palaṃ tu rasyam asrajam /

GS40rajnighu:5795: medas tu māṃsasāraḥ syānmāṃsasneho vasā vapā // Rajni_18.99
GS40rajnighu:5796: medojam asthidhātuḥ syāt kulyaṃ kīkasakaṃ ca tat // Rajni_18.100
GS40rajnighu:5797: asthisāras tu majjā syāt tejo bījaṃ tathāsthijam /
GS40rajnighu:5799: śukraṃ puṃstvaṃ reto bījaṃ vīryaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ kathitam /

GS40rajnighu:5802: asthno majjā tataḥ śukram ittham eṣāṃ janikramaḥ // Rajni_18.103
GS40rajnighu:5803: tilakaṃ kloma mastiṣkaṃ snehas tu mastakodbhavaḥ // Rajni_18.104
GS40rajnighu:5804: antraṃ purī tad ākhyātaṃ plīhā gulma iti smṛtaḥ // Rajni_18.105
GS40rajnighu:5808: tantukī jīvitajñā ca nāḍī siṃhī ca kīrtitā // Rajni_18.107
GS40rajnighu:5809: kaṇḍarā tu mahāsnāyurmahānāḍī ca sā smṛtā // Rajni_18.108
GS40rajnighu:5811: srotāṃsi khāni chidrāṇi kālakhaṇḍaṃ yakṛnmatam // Rajni_18.109

GS40rajnighu:5814: pṛṣṭhāsthi tu kaseruḥ syātśākhāsthi nalakaṃ smṛtam // Rajni_18.111

GS40rajnighu:5834: vikrānto dviradāntako bahubalo dīpto balī vikramī haryakṣaḥ sa ca dīptapiṅgala iti khyāto mṛgendraśca saḥ // Rajni_19.1

GS40rajnighu:5841: ṛkṣo bhallūko 'tha bhallaḥ saśalyo durghoṣaḥ syāt bhallakaḥ pṛṣṭhadṛṣṭiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5842: drāghiṣṭhaḥ syāt dīrghakeśaś cirāyur jñeyaḥ so 'yaṃ duścaro dīrghadarśī //

GS40rajnighu:5844: śivā tu bhūrimāyaḥ syāt gomāyur mṛgadhūrtakaḥ /

GS40rajnighu:5863: sa bālaḥ kalabho jñeyo durdānto vyāla ucyate /

GS40rajnighu:5865: ibhī tu kariṇī jñeyā hastinī dhenukā vaśā /

GS40rajnighu:5868: gaṇḍako vajracarmā ca khaḍgī vārdhrīṇasaś ca saḥ // Rajni_19.18
GS40rajnighu:5869: uṣṭro dīrghagatir balī ca karabho dāserako dhūsaro lamboṣṭho lavaṇaḥ kramelakamahājaṅghau ca bījāṅghrikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5870: dīrghaḥ śṛṅkhalako mahān atha mahāgrīvo mahāṅgo mahānādaḥ so 'pi
GS40rajnighu:5871: mahādhvagaḥ sa ca mahāpṛṣṭho baliṣṭhaś ca saḥ // Rajni_19.19
GS40rajnighu:5875: lulāpakāntā kaluṣā turaṃgadveṣiṇī ca sā // Rajni_19.21
GS40rajnighu:5876: gaus tu bhadro balīvardo damyo dāntaḥ sthiro balī /
GS40rajnighu:5877: ukṣānaḍvān kakudmān syādṛṣabho vṛṣabho vṛṣaḥ // Rajni_19.22
GS40rajnighu:5880: vṛṣabhastu vṛṣaḥ prokto mahokṣaḥ puṃgavo balī /

GS40rajnighu:5884: vinītaḥ śikṣito dānto dhuryo voḍhā ca dhaurikaḥ // Rajni_19.26
GS40rajnighu:5885: bālo vatsataraḥ prokto durdānto gaḍir ucyate // Rajni_19.27
GS40rajnighu:5886: gaur mātosrā śṛṅgiṇī saurabheyī māheyī syādrohiṇī dhenuraghnyā /
GS40rajnighu:5887: dogdhrī bhadrā bhūrimatyānaḍuhyau kalyāṇī syātpāvanī cārjunī ca //
GS40rajnighu:5888: vanagaur gavayaḥ prokto balabhadro mahāgavaḥ // Rajni_19.29
GS40rajnighu:5889: gavayī vanadhenuḥ syātsaiva bhillagavī matā // Rajni_19.30
GS40rajnighu:5891: tasya strī camarī proktā dīrghabālā giripriyā // Rajni_19.31
GS40rajnighu:5892: varāhaḥ stabdharomā ca romaśaḥ śūkaraḥ kiriḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5893: vakradaṃṣṭraḥ kiṭir daṃṣṭrī kroḍo dantāyudho balī // Rajni_19.32
GS40rajnighu:5895: kolaḥ potrāyudhaḥ śūro bahvapatyo radāyudhaḥ // Rajni_19.33
GS40rajnighu:5897: grāmyakroḍo grāmyakolo viṣṭhāśī dārakaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.34
GS40rajnighu:5899: vāho vājī mudgabhojī vītiḥ saptiśca saindhavaḥ // Rajni_19.35
GS40rajnighu:5903: sāmrāṇaśephakamukhā api deśataḥ syur varṇena te 'pi ca punarbahudhā bhavanti // Rajni_19.37
GS40rajnighu:5904: śvetaḥ karkaḥ so 'tha raktastu śoṇo haimaḥ kṛṣṇo nīlavarṇastu nīlaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5906: itthaṃ nānāvarṇabhedena vājī jñātavyo 'yaṃ lokarūḍhaiḥ sudhībhiḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5909: vājinī vaḍabā cāpi prasūraśvāśvinī ca sā // Rajni_19.41
GS40rajnighu:5914: ajo bukkaśca medhyaḥ syāllambakarṇaḥ paśuśca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5915: chāgalo barkaraś chāgastubho bastaḥ payasvalaḥ // Rajni_19.44
GS40rajnighu:5916: ajā payasvinī bhīruśchāgī medhyā galastanī // Rajni_19.45
GS40rajnighu:5917: meṣo bheḍo huḍo meṇḍhraḥ ūrṇāyur uraṇastathā /
GS40rajnighu:5918: eḍakaḥ śṛṅgiṇo 'viḥ syādurabhro romaśo balī // Rajni_19.46
GS40rajnighu:5923: anyaśca bhāraśṛṅgaḥ syāt mahāśṛṅgo vanapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.49
GS40rajnighu:5928: vānaro markaṭaḥ kīśaḥ kapiḥ śākhāmṛgo hariḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5929: plavaṃgamo vanaukāśca plavaṃgaḥ plavagaḥ plavaḥ // Rajni_19.52
GS40rajnighu:5930: golāṅgūlastu gaurākhyaḥ kapiḥ kṛṣṇamukho hi saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5932: śalyakaḥ syāt śalyamṛgo vajraśuktir bileśayaḥ // Rajni_19.54
GS40rajnighu:5933: śalyo'nyaḥ śvāvidityuktaḥ śalī ca śalalī ca saḥ // Rajni_19.55
GS40rajnighu:5934: śalyalomni tu vijñeyā śalalī śalalaṃ śalam // Rajni_19.56
GS40rajnighu:5936: jñeyaś camarapucchaś ca lomaśo dhūmravarṇakaḥ // Rajni_19.57
GS40rajnighu:5941: pannago vāyubhakṣaśca bhogī syājjihmagaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.60
GS40rajnighu:5942: sarpo daṃṣṭrī bhujaṃgo 'hir bhujagaś ca sarīsṛpaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5943: kañcukī dīrghapucchaś ca dvijhvi uragaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.61
GS40rajnighu:5944: phaṇino dhavalāṅgā ye te nāgā iti kīrtitāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5947: kuliko harito jñeyo rājilaṃ ḍuṇḍubhaṃ viduḥ // Rajni_19.64
GS40rajnighu:5949: karkoṭaḥ kulikaḥ śaṅkha ityamī nāganāyakāḥ // Rajni_19.65
GS40rajnighu:5951: āpahṛt dvimukhī caiva dhāmiṇītyādayaḥ pare // Rajni_19.67
GS40rajnighu:5953: khanako bilakārī ca dhānyāriśca bahuprajaḥ // Rajni_19.68
GS40rajnighu:5955: mahāṅgaḥ sasyamārī ca bhūphalo bhittipātanaḥ // Rajni_19.69
GS40rajnighu:5958: godhā tu godhikā jñeyā dārumatsyāhvayā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:5960: godhājaḥ syāttu gaudheyo gaudhāro godhikāsutaḥ // Rajni_19.72
GS40rajnighu:5963: brāhmaṇī gṛhagodhā ca supadī raktapucchikā // Rajni_19.74
GS40rajnighu:5967: kāmarūpī virūpī ca bilavāsaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Rajni_19.76
GS40rajnighu:5968: pallī tu musalī proktā gṛhagodhā gṛhālikā /
GS40rajnighu:5969: jyeṣṭhā ca kuḍyamatsyā ca pallikā gṛhagodhikā // Rajni_19.77
GS40rajnighu:5971: hālāhalā tv añjalikā girikā bālamūṣikā // Rajni_19.79
GS40rajnighu:5972: vṛścikaḥ śūkakīṭaḥ syād alidroṇaś ca vṛścike // Rajni_19.80
GS40rajnighu:5974: pipīlakaḥ pipīlaśca strīsaṃjñā ca pipīlikā // Rajni_19.82
GS40rajnighu:5976: kṛṣṇānyā ca pipīlī tu sthūlā vṛkṣaruhā ca sā // Rajni_19.84
GS40rajnighu:5979: tatrātikrūrakarmā yaḥ sa jalavyāla ucyate // Rajni_19.86
GS40rajnighu:5983: pāṭhīnaḥ śakulaś caiva nadyāvartaśca rohitaḥ // Rajni_19.88
GS40rajnighu:5988: śiśukaḥ śiśumāraḥ syātsa ca grāho varāhakaḥ // Rajni_19.91
GS40rajnighu:5993: saṃdaṃśakaḥ paṅkavāsas tiryaggāmī sa cordhvadṛk // Rajni_19.94
GS40rajnighu:5994: maṇḍūko darduro maṇḍo harir bhekaśca lūlakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:5995: śālūraḥ sa ca varṣābhūḥ plavaḥ kaṭuravastathā /
GS40rajnighu:5996: samīḍanyaśca muṇḍī ca plavaṃgaśca plavaṃgamaḥ // Rajni_19.95
GS40rajnighu:6001: jalakākastu dātyūhaḥ sa ca syāt kālakaṇṭhakaḥ // Rajni_19.98
GS40rajnighu:6004: jale'pi te ca tāvanto jñātavyā jalapūrvakāḥ // Rajni_19.100
GS40rajnighu:6008: śakuntaḥ patagaḥ picchan pataṃgo vikiraśca saḥ // Rajni_19.102
GS40rajnighu:6011: śyenaḥ śaśādaḥ kravyādaḥ krūro vegī khagāntakaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6016: kaṅkas tu lohapṛṣṭhaḥ syāt saṃdaṃśavadanaḥ kharaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6017: raṇālaṃkaraṇaḥ krūraḥ sa ca syādāmiṣapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.107
GS40rajnighu:6026: valgulī vaktraviṣṭhā sā divāndhā ca niśācarī /
GS40rajnighu:6027: svairiṇī ca divāsvāpā māṃseṣṭā mātṛvāhinī // Rajni_19.112
GS40rajnighu:6030: dināndhā naktabhojī ca bhrāmaṇī karṇikāhvayā // Rajni_19.113
GS40rajnighu:6032: meghānandī kalāpī ca śikhaṇḍī citrapicchakaḥ // Rajni_19.114
GS40rajnighu:6036: pracalākaḥ śikhā jñeyā dhvaniḥ keketi kathyate // Rajni_19.116
GS40rajnighu:6037: kuraraḥ kharaśabdaḥ kruṅ krauñcaḥ paṅkticaraḥ kharaḥ // Rajni_19.117
GS40rajnighu:6039: bakaḥ kaṅko bakoṭaśca tīrthasevī ca tāpasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6040: mīnaghātī mṛṣādhyānī niścalāṅghriś ca dāmbhikaḥ // Rajni_19.119
GS40rajnighu:6041: śakunī potakī śyāmā pāṇḍavī śvetapakṣiṇī // Rajni_19.120
GS40rajnighu:6042: durgā bhagavatī caiva saivoktā satyapāṇḍavī // Rajni_19.121
GS40rajnighu:6043: balākā viṣakaṇṭhī syāt śuṣkāṅgī dīrghakaṃdharā // Rajni_19.122
GS40rajnighu:6045: cakraḥ kokaścakravāko rathāṅgo bhūripremā dvaṃdvacārī sahāyaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6046: kāntaḥ kāmī rātriviśleṣagāmī rāmāvakṣojopamaḥ kāmukaśca // Rajni_19.124
GS40rajnighu:6055: sarājī rājimantaśca jalasarpaḥ sa dundubhiḥ // Rajni_19.130
GS40rajnighu:6056: dvivigoḍo nisaś caiva citrī śalpī ca gomukhaḥ // Rajni_19.131
GS40rajnighu:6057: anye ca plavagā ye ye te sarve kṣudrasārasāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6059: haṃso dhavalapakṣī syāt cakrāṅgo mānasālayaḥ // Rajni_19.133
GS40rajnighu:6061: eteṣu cañcucaraṇeṣvaruṇeṣu rājahaṃso'pi dhūsaratareṣu ca mallikākṣaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6062: kāleṣu teṣu dhavalaḥ kila dhārtarāṣṭraḥ so 'pyeṣa dhūsaratanustu bhaved abhavyaḥ // Rajni_19.135
GS40rajnighu:6063: haṃsī tu varaṭā jñeyā varalā vāralā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6070: raktekṣaṇo madanamohanavāgvilāsī kaṇṭhīravo gṛhakapotaka eṣa uktaḥ //
GS40rajnighu:6072: jalapārāvataḥ kāmī jñeyo galaravaśca saḥ // Rajni_19.141
GS40rajnighu:6073: kokilaḥ parapuṣṭaḥ syāt kālaḥ parabhṛtaḥ pikaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6077: kokilā tv anyapuṣṭā syānmattā parabhṛtā ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6079: vasantadūtī tāmrākṣī pikī sā ca kuhūravā /
GS40rajnighu:6080: vāsantī kāmagā caiva gandharvā vanabhūṣaṇī // Rajni_19.145
GS40rajnighu:6081: śukaḥ kīro raktatuṇḍo medhāvī mañjupāṭhakaḥ // Rajni_19.146
GS40rajnighu:6082: anyo rājaśukaḥ prājñaḥ śatapattro nṛpapriyaḥ // Rajni_19.147
GS40rajnighu:6083: sārikā madhurālāpā dūtī medhāvinī ca sā /
GS40rajnighu:6084: kavarī kutsitāṅgī ca kaṣkalāṅgī ca śārikā // Rajni_19.148
GS40rajnighu:6086: paṭhantī pāṭhavārtā ca buddhimatī bhūsārikā // Rajni_19.149
GS40rajnighu:6091: dhūsarī piṅgalā sūcī bhairavī yoginī jayā /
GS40rajnighu:6092: kumārī suvicitrā ca mātā koṭaravāsinī // Rajni_19.153
GS40rajnighu:6094: bhṛṅgaḥ kuliṅgo dhūmyāṭo dārvāghātaḥ śatacchadaḥ // Rajni_19.155
GS40rajnighu:6098: cāṣaḥ kikīdiviḥ prokto nīlāṅgaḥ puṇyadarśanaḥ // Rajni_19.157
GS40rajnighu:6099: vartako vartiko vartir gāñjikāyaśca kathyate // Rajni_19.158
GS40rajnighu:6101: caṭakā kalaviṅkī syāt cāṭakairastu tatsutaḥ // Rajni_19.160
GS40rajnighu:6106: lāvā tu lāvakaḥ prokto lāvaḥ sa ca lavaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_19.163
GS40rajnighu:6107: tittiris tittiraś caiva taittiro yājuṣo giriḥ // Rajni_19.164
GS40rajnighu:6108: kṛṣṇo 'nyas tittiriḥ śūraḥ subhūtiḥ paripālakaḥ // Rajni_19.165
GS40rajnighu:6112: śyāmā varāhī śakunī kumārī durgā ca devī caṭakā ca kṛṣṇā /
GS40rajnighu:6113: syātpotakī pāṇḍavikā ca vāmā sā kālikā syāt sitabimbinī ca // Rajni_19.167
GS40rajnighu:6115: tailinī tailakīṭaḥ syāt ṣaḍbimbā dadrunāśinī // Rajni_19.169
GS40rajnighu:6121: varvaṇā makṣikā nīlā saraghā madhumakṣikā // Rajni_19.173
GS40rajnighu:6122: gandholī varaṭā kṣudrā krūrā syāt kṣudravarvaṇā /
GS40rajnighu:6125: daṃśo duṣṭamukhaḥ krūraḥ kṣudrikā vanamakṣikā // Rajni_19.175
GS40rajnighu:6126: makṣikā tv amṛtotpannā vamanī cāpalā ca sā // Rajni_19.176
GS40rajnighu:6128: rātrijāgarado dhūmro nīlābhras tv anyajātayaḥ // Rajni_19.177
GS40rajnighu:6129: aṣṭāṅghrir aṣṭapādaśca gṛhavāsī ca kṛṣṇakaḥ // Rajni_19.178
GS40rajnighu:6132: yūkā tu keśakīṭaḥ syāt svedajaḥ ṣaṭpadaḥ smṛtaḥ // Rajni_19.180
GS40rajnighu:6133: pakṣmajā pakṣmayūkā syātsūkṣmā ṣaṭcaraṇāpi sā // Rajni_19.181
GS40rajnighu:6136: tatra tatra budhairjñeyaḥ sa sarvaḥ kīṭasaṃjñakaḥ // Rajni_19.183
GS40rajnighu:6138: kṛśāṅgī tāmasī śūrā kīribhārā mahābalā // Rajni_19.184
GS40rajnighu:6143: kīṭā iti kathitāḥ navadhātra tiryañcaḥ // Rajni_19.187
GS40rajnighu:6145: buddhyā samyak cābhisaṃdhāya dhīmān vaidyaḥ kuryānmāṃsavargaprayogam //
GS40rajnighu:6146: yenebhāsyapitā mṛgāṅkamukuṭaḥ śārdūlacarmāmbaraḥ sarpālaṃkaraṇaḥ supuṅgavagatiḥ pañcānano'bhyarcyate
GS40rajnighu:6147: tasya śrīnṛharīśituḥ khalu kṛtāv ekonaviṃśo 'bhidhācūḍāpīṭhamaṇāv agād avasitiṃ siṃhādivargo mahān // Rajni_19.189
GS40rajnighu:6148: Rājanighaṇṭu, Rogādivarga gado rujā vyādhir apāṭavāmarogāmayātaṅkabhayopaghātāḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6153: śophaḥ śothastu śvayathuḥ kāsaḥ kṣavathurucyate // Rajni_20.3
GS40rajnighu:6154: kṣutaṃ tu kṣavathuḥ kṣucca pratiśyāyastu pīnasaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6157: kuṣṭhaṃ tu puṇḍarīkaḥ syāt śvitraṃ tu carmacitrakam // Rajni_20.5
GS40rajnighu:6158: kilāsasidhme ca śikhī śvāsaḥ pāmā vicarcikā /
GS40rajnighu:6161: pītasphoṭe tu pāmā ca kṣudrasphoṭe tu kañcikā // Rajni_20.7
GS40rajnighu:6163: visphoṭaḥ sphoṭakaḥ sphoṭaḥ keśaghnas tv indraluptakaḥ // Rajni_20.8
GS40rajnighu:6164: galaśuṇḍī tu śuṇḍā syād galagaṇḍo galastanaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6167: paktiśūlaṃ tu śūlaṃ syāt pākajaṃ pariṇāmajam // Rajni_20.10
GS40rajnighu:6168: lūtā carmavraṇo vṛkkaṃ nāḍī nāḍīvraṇo bhavet /

GS40rajnighu:6174: hṛdrogo hṛdgado hṛdrug utprāṇaḥ śvāsa ucyate /

GS40rajnighu:6182: mūrchā tu moho mūḍhiś ca svarasādaḥ svarakṣayaḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6185: kṛcchraṃ tu mūtrakṛcchraṃ syāt mūtrarodho 'śmarī ca sā // Rajni_20.19
GS40rajnighu:6187: kampastu vepanaṃ vepaḥ kampanaṃ vepathustathā // Rajni_20.20
GS40rajnighu:6188: jṛmbhā tu jṛmbhikā jambhā jṛmbhaṇaṃ jambhikā ca sā /

GS40rajnighu:6194: vidradhiḥ syādvidaraṇaṃ hṛdgranthir hṛdvraṇaś ca saḥ /
GS40rajnighu:6195: vraṇo bhagapradeśe yaḥ sa bhagaṃdaranāmakaḥ // Rajni_20.24
GS40rajnighu:6197: ittham anye'pi boddhavyā bhiṣagbhir dehato gadāḥ // Rajni_20.25
GS40rajnighu:6198: saṃtāpaḥ saṃjvarastāpaḥ śoṣa uṣmā ca kathyate /

GS40rajnighu:6202: tandrā tu viṣayājñānaṃ pramīlā tandrikā ca sā /
